40001001	Bai aa ndo at'u a lukolo arilombola Jesu Masihi. Jesu Masihi wambola kahi za lukolo lwa Daudi, na Daudi naye akimbola kahi za lukolo lwa Burahemu.
40001002	Burahemu wamuzhala Isaka. Isaka akimuzhala Jakobu. Jakobu akimuzhala Juda na nduguze a kilume.
40001003	Juda akimuzhala P'erezi na Zera (mameye P'erezi na Zera were anaifwa T'amari). P'erezi, akimuzhala Hezironi. Hezironi, akimuzhala Aramu.
40001004	Aramu, akimuzhala Aminadabu. Aminadabu, akimuzhala Nashoni. Nashoni akimuzhala Salimoni,
40001005	Salimoni akimuzhala Boazi (mameye Boazi were anaifwa Rahabu). Boazi, akimuzhala Obedi (mameye Obedi were anaifwa Ruth'u). Obedi, akimuzhala Jese,
40001006	babaye muthawali Daudi. Daudi akimuzhala Selemani, (ho kwandza mameye Selemani wakala ni mukaza Uria).
40001007	Selemani naye akimuzhala Rehoboamu. Rehoboamu akimuzhala Abija. Abija akimuzhala Asafu.
40001008	Asafu akimuzhala Jehoshafati. Jehoshafati akimuzhala Joramu. Joramu akimuzhala Uzia.
40001009	Uzia akimuzhala Jothamu. Jothamu akimuzhala Ahazi. Ahazi akimuzhala Hezekia.
40001010	Hezekia akimuzhala Manase. Manase akimuzhala Amoni. Amoni akimuzhala Josia.
40001011	Josia akimuzhala Jekonia na nduguze a kilume makathi Ayahudi marihokala manahalwa mateka kwenda Babiloni.
40001012	Bada ya kuhalwa mateka kwa Ayahudi kugoma, Jekonia akimuzhala Salathieli. Salathieli akimuzhala Zerubabeli.
40001013	Zerubabeli akimuzhala Abiudu. Abiudu akimuzhala Eliakimu. Eliakimu akimuzhala Azori.
40001014	Azori, akimuzhala Zadoki. Zadoki akimuzhala Akimu. Akimu akimuzhala Eliudi.
40001015	Eliudi akimuzhala Eliazari. Eliazari akimuzhala Mathani. Mathani akimuzhala Jakobu.
40001016	Na Jakobu akimuzhala Josefu. Josefu nde ariyekudzakala mulume wa Maryamu, mameye Jesu. Na Jesu nde iye Masihi.
40001017	Kwa vizho kula Burahemu hatha muthawali Daudi, kwakala na vizhazi kumi na vine. Na kula Daudi hatha kuhalwa mateka kwa Ayahudi kuhirikwa Babiloni, kukikala na vizhazi kumi na vine kaheri. Na kula wakathi wa kuhalwa mateka kwa Ayahudi kuhirikwa Babiloni hatha kuzhalwa kwa iye Masihi, nako kukikala na vizhazi kumi na vine.
40001018	Vikara kuzhalwa kwa Jesu Masihi kwakala vivi: Maryamu ariye were andakala mameye Jesu were analolwa ni Josefu, ela kabila k'adzamuhala, akimanywa kukala ana mimba kwa nguvu za Roho Mweri.
40001019	Bai kwa kukala Josefu were ni mut'u muhachi k'ahendzeze kumugwiza aibu muchewe mbere za at'u bule, waona ni baha amuriche kisiri-siri.
40001020	Vikara arihokala achere kuviaza, lola malaika wa Bwana akimwambolera ndosoni akimwamba, "Josefu mwana wa Daudi, sogohe kumuhala mucheo Maryamu, mana yo mimba ariyo nayo be waipata kwa nguvu za Roho Mweri.
40001021	Naye andazhala mwana mulume, na mwana iye undamwiha Jesu, mana iye nde andeaokola at'ue kula kahi za dambi zao."
40001022	Bai vivi zhosi zhakala ili ro neno ririronenwa ni Bwana kukira kwa nabii rithimire. Kwani nabii wanena akiamba,
40001023	"Lolani, bikira andahenda mimba na andazhala mwana mulume na dzinare andaifwa Imanueli, yani Mulungu hamwenga naswi."
40001024	Vikara Josefu ariholamuka, akihenda vizho arizhokala adzalagizwa ni ye malaika. Wamuhala Maryamu,
40001025	ela k'alalire naye hatha akimuzhala ye mwana wa kilume. Na Josefu akimwiha Jesu.
40002001	Jesu wazhalwa mudzi wa Beth'elehemu, uriwo kahi za jimbo ra Judea, makathi ga muthawali Herode. Vikara Jesu arihozhalwa, lola kwakudza at'u alachu kuko mudzi mubomu wa Jerusalemu. At'u aa were madzambola ts'i za mwambolero wa dzuwa.
40002002	Bai marihofika Jerusalemu mauza, "Yuno muthawali wa Ayahudi ariyezhalwa a hiko? Kwani fwayona yo nyenyezi ya kwakwe kuko mwambolero wa dzuwa, naswi hudzire humuvoye."
40002003	Bai muthawali Herode hamwenga na at'u osi a Jerusalemu mabudzyika sana marihosikira uv̱oro uwo.
40002004	Na kwa ut'u uwo, Herode akiaiha alombi abomu na alimu a Sheria a Kiyahudi, akiauza kala Masihi were andazhalwa hiko.
40002005	Makiamba, ni Beth'elehemu, mudzi uriwo Judea. Kwani vizho ndo nabii arizhoora akiamba,
40002006	"Mudzi wa Beth'elehemu kahi za ts'i ya Juda, si mudzi muthithe kamare kahi za athawali a Juda; kwani kula kuko kundambola muthawali andiyekala murisa wa at'u a kwangu, Aiziraeli."
40002007	Herode arihosikira viryahu, akiavuha k'anda aryahu at'u alachu akiauzat'o wo wakathi irihombolera yo nyenyezi. Nao marihogonya kumwambira,
40002008	akiahuma ko Beth'elehemu, akiamba, "Kauzeni-uzeni hatha mumone. Mukikala mudzamona, ndzoni munambire, ili nami nende nikamuvoye."
40002009	-
40002010	Bai Herode arihogonya kunena nao, o at'u alachu makigwira ngira ya kwenda Beth'elehemu. Na lola mo ngirani, yo nyenyezi mariyoyona ko mwambolero wa dzuwa ikiambolera kaheri, nao makifwahirwa zhomu kuyona kaheri. Bai nyenyezi iyo yaalongoza hatha ichendaima haho arihokala ye mwana mutsanga.
40002011	Bai marihongira mo nyumbani machendamona ye mwana mutsanga na mameye, makimuzamira makimuvoya. Gonya makivugula mikoba yao, makimunosa dhahabu, na uvumba, na manemane.
40002012	Bai marihokala madzagonya kumunosa, Mulungu akiaonya kahi za ndoso kukala masiuye kwa Herode bule. Kwa vizho makiuya kwao na ngira nyingine.
40002013	Vikara marihokala aryahu at'u alachu madzakwenda, lola malaika wa Bwana akimwambolera Josefu ndosoni akimwamba, "Herode, anamumala ye mwana amwalage. Kwa vizho, uka umuhale ye mutsanga na mameye, muchimbirire Misiri. Kakaleni kuko vivii hatha ho nindihomwamba muuye."
40002014	Josefu ariholamuka, akimuhala ye mutsanga na mameye, makigwira ngira na usiku, sio, machenda Misiri.
40002015	Bai makala kuko Misiri hatha Herode akifwa, ndo makiuya. Na vivi zhosi zhakala ili riryahu neno ririronenwa ni Mulungu kukirira kwa nabii rithimire. Kwani nabii wanena akiamba, "Namwiha Mwanangu kula Misiri."
40002016	Vikara Herode arihoona kukala aryahu at'u alachu mamuv̱urya, watsukirwa zhomu na akihuma shikari Beth'elehemu na midzi iriyo k'anda-k'andaze makalage ahoho osi a kilume a kula miaka miri kwenda ts'ini. Vivi wavihenda kulingana na haho nyenyezi irihombolera, here arizhoambirwa ni o at'u alachu.
40002017	Vivi zhahendeka kwamba ro neno ririronenwa ni nabii Jeremia rithimire. Kwani Jeremia wanena akiamba,
40002018	"Kwasikirwa k'ululu kuko Rama; mut'u anarira zhomu na kuthapathapa, Raheli anakakwa ni anae. Atsosha kunyamazwa k'anyamala, andanyamaladze bai, naye k'andaaona kaheri?"
40002019	Bai Josefu wakala Misiri vivii hatha Herode anafwa, lola malaika wa Bwana akimwambolera ndosoni
40002020	akimwamba, "Uka umuhale ye muhoho na mameye muuye ts'i ya Iziraeli kwani o mariokala manamala roho ya ye muhoho mafwa."
40002021	Kwa vizho Josefu akiuka akimuhala ye mwana na mameye makiuya Iziraeli.
40002022	Arihofika Iziraeli, Josefu akisikira kukala Arikelao mwana wa Herode nde athawalaye Judea hat'u ha babaye. Kwa vizho akigoha kuuya ko kwao Judea. Bai Mulungu akimwambolera kahi za ndoso akimwamba ende jimbo ra Galilaya, naye akihenda vizho.
40002023	Arihofika Galilaya, Josefu wakwendatoa kahi za mudzi uifwao Nazareth'i. Vivi zhakala ili ro neno ririronenwa ni manabii dzulu za iye Jesu, rithimire. Kwani manabii manena makiamba, "Andaifwa Munazareth'i."
40003001	Bai bada ya miaka ya kuthala, kwambola mwanamulume ariyekala anaifwa Johana Mubat'izaji. Johana wahubiri ko nyika ya Judea na kuamba,
40003002	"Thubuni, kwani uthawali wa mulunguni udzafika hehi."
40003003	Yuyu Johana ndiye ariyeambwa ni nabii Isaya haryahu arihonena akiamba, "Mut'u analuta mumirowe ko nyika na kuamba, 'Mutengezereni ngira Bwana, Mutengezereni ngira ya kugoloka.' "
40003004	Valo ra Johana were ni ra nyoga za ngamira. Na wakala akidzifunga ukanda wa k'ingo chununi mwakwe. Chakuryache were ni kw'eth'eth'e na uchi wa nyuchi.
40003005	K'uzhona zho, at'u osi a Jerusalemu na a midzi mingine yosi ya Judea, na at'u osi mariokala makitoa kahi za midzi iriyo k'anda-k'anda za muho wa Jorodani marihovisikira, bagabaga makimuthuwa.
40003006	Nao maziungama dambi zao, na Johana akiabat'iza kahi za wo muho wa Jorodani.
40003007	Ela arihokala anaenderera kubat'iza, kukidza Mafarisayo na Masadukayo anji, nao makikala madzirebat'izwa. Bai Johana arihoaona, akiadumulira akiamba, "H'enwi kizhazi cha nyoka nwi! Ni h'ani ariyemwambira kukala muzichimbire zo k'oro za Mulungu zidzazo?
40003008	H'aya mahendo genu naganyese kukala mudzathubu dambi jeri.
40003009	Na musidzikenge bule mukaamba mu ana a Burahemu. Kwani namwambira kamare kukala, Mulungu anadima kumuumbira ana Burahemu hatha kula kwa gaga mawe!
40003010	Na vivi be tsoka ri ho kolo kare, na kila muhi usiwozhala matunda madzo, undathemwa utsufwe mohoni.
40003011	Mino ninamubat'iza kwa madzi kamwe, kunyesa kukala mudzathubu dambi zenu, ela ye andiyekudza nyuma zangu ni mubomu kukira mimi. Kwandza mosi sifika hatha mut'u wa kumuvula virahuzhe. Iye andamubat'iza kwa Roho Mweri na kwa moho.
40003012	Na adzagwirira lungo anahehet'a ngano. Akigonya kuhehet'a andahala yo ngano ayangize lutsagani, gonya ahale wo wiswa autsuhe kahi za moho usiwozima."
40003013	Bai makathi garyahu Johana arihokala anabat'iza at'u, Jesu wambola jimbo ra Galilaya achenda Jorodani ili naye akabat'izwe ni Johana.
40003014	Vikara Johana arihoona kukala Jesu naye anamala kubat'izwa akimwamba, "Mino namala nibat'izwe ni uwe, we unadza kwangu?" Kwa vizho akikala anamala kukahala kumubat'iza.
40003015	Ela Jesu akimudzigidzya akimwamba, "Vihende kwa rero, kwani vizho ndo hundakala hunathimiza hachi yosi." Johana arihosikira viryahu akikubali kumubat'iza Jesu.
40003016	Bai, Jesu arihokala adzagonya kubat'izwa wambola mo madzini. Bai arihombola thu, lola ko mulunguni kukigunuka, na akiona Roho wa Mulungu anatharamuka here giya hatha akidzamuthulama.
40003017	Na lola haho henye mumiro uchambola kula ko mulunguni ukiamba, "Yuyu ni Mwanangu muhendzwi, anifwahizaye."
40004001	Bai Jesu akilongozwa ni Roho na achenda nyika kwendajezwa ni Shethani.
40004002	Wafunga kwa siku mirongo mine, usiku na mutsana na badaye akisikira ndzala.
40004003	Shethani akimuthuwa akimwamba, "Chamba u Mwana wa Mulungu jeri, gambire gaga mawe gakale mikahe."
40004004	Jesu akimudzigidzya akimwamba, "Zhaorwa kukala, 'Mudamu k'andakala moyo kwa mukahe thu, ela kwa kila neno rimbolaro kanwani mwa Mulungu.' "
40004005	Shethani akimuhala hatha kuko mudzi mueri wa Jerusalemu, akimukweza dzulu za wo munara wa ro Hekalu,
40004006	akimwamba, "Chamba u Mwana wa Mulungu jeri, dzitsuhe ko ts'i, kwani zhaorwa kukala, 'Andaalagiza malaikae makurinde, mandakwanula na mikono yao, p'ore ukakwala iwe.' "
40004007	Jesu akimudzigidzya akimwamba, "Zhaorwa kaheri kukala, 'Usimujeze Bwana Mulunguo bule!' "
40004008	K'uzhona anambola haho, Shethani akimuhala Jesu achenda naye hatha dzulu za murima mure zhomu. Akimwanyesa ts'i zosi za urumwengu na ngumaze.
40004009	Akimwamba, "Ukinizamira ukinivoya, vivi zhosi uzhonazho nindakup'a."
40004010	K'ona Jesu akimudzigidzya akimwamba, "Hauke Shethani, kwani zhaorwa kukala, 'Muvoye Bwana Mulunguo na umuhumikire iye h'akeye!' "
40004011	Ndo Shethani akimuricha, na lola kukidza malaika makidzamuhumikira.
40004012	Bai Jesu wakala ko jimbo ra Judea, ela arihosikira kukala Johana Mubat'izaji wagwirwa achangizwa jela, akikumbola kuko, akiuya Galilaya.
40004013	Arihofika Galilaya, kuko Nazareth'i akikwambola, achendatoa Kaperinaumu. Mudzi uwo, were u k'anda-k'anda ya ziya ra Galilaya, kahi za muhaka wa lalo ra Zabuloni na lalo ra Nafutali.
40004014	Bai Jesu wakwendatoa kuko, ili riryahu neno ririronenwa ni nabii Isaya rithimire. Kwani Isaya wanena akiamba,
40004015	"Lalo ra Zabuloni na lalo ra Nafutali, kulaizira k'anda-k'anda za ziya ra Galilaya, kwenda hatha kuthalala muho wa Jorodani, na ts'i ya Galilaya, kuriko pia kunatoa at'u mario si Ayahudi,
40004016	at'u mariokala ma kizani, vivi madzaona mulangaza munji. Na at'u mariokala manatoa kahi za lalo ra kivurivuri cha kifwa mulangaza udzang'ala kahikahi zao."
40004017	Bai kula haho Jesu akikwatya kuhubiri akiamba, "Thubuni, mana uthawali wa mulunguni udzafika hehi."
40004018	Siku mwenga, Jesu arihokala anatsembera k'anda-k'anda za ziya ra Galilaya, wakwendamuthekeza mut'u na nduguye manatsuha vimia zhao mavuhe makumba, kwani were ni avuhi. Mumwenga were anaifwa Simoni, ariye were pia anaifwa P'et'ero. Ye mungine ye were anaifwa Anderea.
40004019	K'uzhona arihoaona akiambira, "Nithuwani, nami nindamuhendya mukale avuhi a at'u."
40004020	Marihosikira vizho thu, Simoni na Anderea makigwaga kare zho vimia zhao makimuthuwa.
40004021	Anala haho achenda hatha anafika ho mbere, achendamuthekeza mut'u na nduguye kaheri. Mumwenga were anaifwa Jakobu, na ye mungine akikala anaifwa Johana. At'u aa were ni ana a Zebedayo. Hatha zho Jesu anendaathekeza, be were manafuma-fuma vimia zhao hamwenga na babiyao mo dauni mwao. Bai Jesu arihoaiha thu,
40004022	Jakobu na Johana makimuricha ye babiyao hamwenga na ro dau makimuthuwa Jesu.
40004023	K'uzhona zho Jesu ariholaa haho, wadengereka Galilaya yosi, kuhubiri na kufundisha at'u kahi za masinagogi gao dzulu za Uv̱oro Udzo wa uthawali wa mulunguni. Kidza akihoza at'u anji mariokala na makongo na manyonge ga kila namuna.
40004024	Kwa ut'u uwo wenye bai, Jesu akihenda nguma kahi za ts'i yosi ya Siria. Na lola at'u makimurehera akongo na anyonge a kila namuna. A p'ep'o, a vitsala, na akuholoza, na osi Jesu akiahoza.
40004025	Bai wathuwiwa ni rikundi ribomu ra at'u kila arikokwenda. Kula mumo Galilaya hatha Midzi Kumi. Kula Jerusalemu na Judea yosi na hatha kuvuka muho wa Jorodani.
40005001	Lola siku mwenga, at'u anji makala manamudzalira Jesu. Vikara arihoona viryahu, akikwera dzulu za murima akikelesi. Bai anafundzie makimuthuwa kuko.
40005002	Marihofika kuko Jesu wakelesi na akikwatya kuafundisha akiamba,
40005003	"Baha ao akiya kahi za roho, mana uthawali wa mulunguni ni wao.
40005004	Baha ao mario na huzuni, mana mandafarijiwa.
40005005	Baha ao mario ni ap'eho, mana ts'i indakala yao.
40005006	Baha ao mario na ndzala na k'ihu ya hachi, mana mandakushwa.
40005007	Baha ao maaonerao mbazi andziyao, mana nao mandaonerwa mbazi.
40005008	Baha ao mario ni aeri mioyoni mwao, mana mandamona Mulungu.
40005009	Baha ao magwizanyao at'u, mana mandaifwa ana a Mulungu.
40005010	Baha ao mateswao kwa ut'u wa kuhenda hachi mbere za Mulungu, mana uthawali wa mulunguni ni wao.
40005011	Baha ninwi mundiohukanwa, na kuteswa, na kusingizirwa kila namuna ya maut'u mai kwa ut'u wangu mimi.
40005012	Fwahirwani zhomu na kulika, mana zawadi yenu ni bomu kuko mulunguni. Mana vizho ndizho ao at'u marizhoahendera o manabii mariomuthangulia."
40005013	"Ninwi be mu munyu wa urumwengu. Vikara munyu ukikala udzauya k'aukoza, undahendwadze hatha ukoze kaheri? Jibu ni k'aufwaha kit'u bule, hatha kazi ni kutsufwa uzhogwe-zhogwe ni at'u.
40005014	Ninwi be mu mulangaza wa urumwengu. Mudzi uriwoakwa hat'u kirimani k'aufitsika bule.
40005015	Kidza mut'u k'adima kugwiza taa gonya akaribiningiza na muvure, ela nikurika nyambaroni, ili riang'alire at'u osi mo nyumbani.
40005016	Kwa vizho ninwi nanwi here mulangaza, ng'alirani kila mut'u, ili at'u magaone mahendo genu madzo na mamulike Babiyenu wa mulunguni."
40005017	"Sioneni kukala nakudzagaluza Sheria ya Musa, na mafundisho ga manabii, hatha! Sidziregagaluza bule, nakudza nigathimize.
40005018	Na jeri wenye, kabila mulunguni na ts'i kukira, k'ahana hatha kadono kamwenga ka yo Sheria kandikokira bila kuthimira.
40005019	Na mut'u yoyosi andiyekoseza yo Sheria th'ith'e ya zosi, na aafundishe andziye mahende dzazho arizhohenda iye, andakala mut'u muthithe sana kahi za uthawali wa mulunguni. Ela mut'u andiyethuwa na kuzigwira sheria zosi, na kuafundisha andziye ili nao mazithuwe na kuzigwira, andakala mut'u mubomu sana kahi za uthawali wa mulunguni.
40005020	Namwambira kamare, kala uhachi wenu k'aundashinda uryahu wa Mafarisayo na alimu a Sheria, uthawali wa mulunguni k'amundawangira bule."
40005021	"Mwasikira kukala haho kapindi at'u maambwa, 'Usalage' na 'Ukilaga undahukumiwa.'
40005022	Ela mimi ninamwambira kukala, mut'u andemutsukirirwa mwandziwe andahukumiwa. Mut'u andiyemuv̱udhya mwandziwe andashithakiwa kwa ro Baraza ra athumia. Na mut'u andiyemuhukana mwandziwe amwambe, 'Mut'u u mujinga zhomu uwe!' andatsufwa kahi za moho wa Jehanamu.
40005023	Kwa vizho ukikala mwenye udzakwendamboza sadaka dzulu za cho kijaja cha kulazhira sadaka kiricho kahi za ro Hekalu, na ukumbukire kukala wamuhendera vii mwandziyo,
40005024	iriche haho kijajani yo sadaka, wende ukapatane na iye mwandziyo kwandza ndo udze uyamboze.
40005025	Mut'u akikala anakuhirika kotini, baha mugamarigizire mo ngirani, mana usihohenda vizho, andakufisha kwa jaji, na iye jaji andakulazha kwa shikari wangizwe ndani.
40005026	Nami nakwambira ujeri wenye, k'undarichirwa uwe hatha umarigize kuriha p'esa zosi."
40005027	"Mwasikira zhanenwa kukala, 'Usizinge.'
40005028	Ela vivi ninamwambira kukala, mut'u yoyosi andiyemulola mwanamuche na kumumizira mahe, andakala moyoni mwakwe adzagonya kare kuzinga naye.
40005029	Dzitsoro ra mukono wa kurya rikikala rinakuhendya uhende dambi, rishukule uritsuhe. Kwani hatha baha kutsowa kilungo kimwenga kuriko mwiriwo wosi utsufwe Jehanamu.
40005030	Mukonowo wa kurya, ukikala unakuhendya uhende dambi utose uutsuhe. Kwani ni baha kutsowa kilungo kimwenga kuriko mwiriwo wosi utsufwe Jehanamu."
40005031	"Kahi za Sheria ya Musa zhaambwa kaheri kukala, 'Mut'u andehendza kumuricha muchewe naamup'e cheti cha kunyesa kukala madzarichana.'
40005032	"Ela vivi be namwambira kukala, mut'u andemuricha muchewe kwa sababu yoyosi nyingine, hasihokala uzindzi, anamuhendya ahende dambi ya uzindzi, ahalwaho kaheri. Na kila andiyemuhala ye muche wa kumbola kwa mulume ni muzindzi."
40005033	"Mwasikira kukala haho kapindi at'u maambwa, 'Ukiapa mbere za Bwana usilahe ulongo bule, thimiza kila kit'u undichokala udzakiapa.'
40005034	Ela vivi ninamwambira kukala musiape kamare. Musiape dzulu mulunguni kwa kukala kuko ndo Mulungu ariko, kahi za kihiche cha uthawali.
40005035	Na musiape dzulu za ts'i, kwani ndo hat'uhe ha kuika magulu. Musiapire Jerusalemu, mana ni mudzi wa muthawali mubomu.
40005036	Kidza musiape dzulu za kwenu enye kwa kukala k'amudima kuhenda changari ludzere lumwenga lukakala lwiru hedu lwaruhe.
40005037	Kwa vizho ukiamba, 'Ee,' navikale ndozho jeri. Na ukiamba, 'Hatha,' vikale sozho. Zaidhi ya vizho vilaa kwa ye Mui."
40005038	"Mwasikira zhaorwa kukala, 'Mut'u akikubola dzitso nawe mwabole. Akikung'ola dzino nawe mung'ole.'
40005039	Ela vivi be namwambira kukala mut'u akikuhendera vii, usimurihize bule. Mut'u akikupiga kofi nyendze ya mukono wa kurya, mugaluzire yo nyendze nyingine nayo apige.
40005040	Mut'u akikushithaki akuhoke k'andzuyo, ro amba naro murichire.
40005041	Mut'u akikulazimisha mwende mwendo wa maili mwenga, enda naye maili mbiri zenye.
40005042	Mwandziyo akidzakuvoya kit'u hedu akidzakumala p'asha, mup'e, usimulashe bule."

40009033	Bai, Jesu akimwamboza ye p'ep'o na ye bwibwi akikwatya kunena. Bai zhaangalaza at'u anji sana hatha makikwatya kunena h'akiyao na kuamba, "Zho zha bwibwi kunena k'ahudzazhona bule kahi za ts'i ya Iziraeli!"
40009034	Ela Mafarisayo makiamba, "Yuyu anamboza p'ep'o kwa kuhumira nguvu za mubomu wa p'ep'o."

40009036	Ela arihoona go makundi ga at'u, waalola na akiaonera mbazi, kwa viryahu marizhokala manasirima na k'amamanya mahendedze, here ng'ondzi zisizo na murisa.

40010001	Bai Jesu akiaiha aryahu anafundzie kumi na airi na akiap'a wadimi wa kumboza p'ep'o na kuhoza makongo na manyonge ga kila namuna.

40010015	Kwani namwambira kamare kukala yo siku ya hukumu vindakala vii-vii zhomu kwa mudzi uwo, kukira zho vindizhokala kwa midzi ya Sodomu na Gomora."

40010024	"Mwanafundzi k'adima kumukira mwalimuwe, na mutumwa k'adima kumukira bwanawe.
40010025	Vinathosha kare zho zha mwanafundzi akale here mwalimuwe, hedu mutumwa akale here bwanawe. Vikikala mwenye nyumba mwenye thu, kisha manamwiha Belizebuli, h'e seze nwi adamue?"
40010026	"Musiogohe bule, kila kit'u kidzichobiningizwa kindagunulwa, na kila kit'u kidzichofitswa kindaonewa.

40010038	Mut'u yoyosi ariye k'andahala musalabawe na kunithuwa, k'av̱irya kukala wangu bule.
40010039	Kwani kila andiyeyona rohoye andayangamiza, na andiyeyangamiza rohoye kwa ut'u wangu, andayona."
40010040	"Kila mut'u amuhokeraye ninwi, ananihokera mimi, na iye anihokeraye mimi, anamuhokera iye ariyenihuma.
40010041	Kila mut'u amuhokeraye nabii kwa kukala ni nabii, andapata zawadi ya nabii, na kila mut'u andiyemuhokera mut'u muhachi, kwa kukala ni muhachi, andapata zawadi ya mut'u muhachi.

40011001	Vikara Jesu arihokala adzagonya kualagiza o anafundzie kumi na airi, akihauka haryahu arihokala, achangira kahi za midzi mingine ya Galilaya, kuhubiri na kufundisha kuko.
40011002	Wakathi uryahu, Johana Mubat'izaji were a jela. Bai arihosikira gago maut'u gosi arigokala akigahenda ye Masihi, wahuma anafundzie makamuze Jesu mamwambe,

40011008	Hedu mwakwendalola mut'u adzevala nguwo mbidzo? Hatha, mavalao nguwo mbidzo k'amakala nyika bule, makala kahi za madzumba ga athawali.
40011009	H'aya nambirani bai cho murichokwendalola ko nyika. Vidze mwakwendamulola nabii? Ee, ni vizho mwakwendamulola nabii. Nami ninamwambira kamare kukala mwakwendamulola mut'u ariye ni zaidhi ya nabii.
40011010	Kwani iye Johana ndiye ariyenenwa kahi za Maoro kukala, 'Lola ninahuma mujumbe wangu mberezo, andiyekutengezera ngirayo kimbere.'
40011011	Nami namwambira kamare kukala haha urumwenguni be k'ahadzazhalwa mut'u mubomu kumukira Johana, ela ye muthithe mwenye kamare kahi za uthawali wa mulunguni be ni mubomu kumukira ye Johana.
40011012	Na hangu Johana aandze kuhubiri na kubat'iza at'u, wo uthawali wa mulunguni be udzakala ukipigwa viha, na ni o masitao ndo mandiowangira kwa nguvu.

40011019	Vino Mwana wa Mudamu wakudza, anarya na ananwa munamwamba kukala adzatona, kidza ni murevi na musena wa athozi a kodi, na enye dambi angine. Ela ulachu wa Mulungu unamanywa ni wa ujeri, kukirira kwa mahendo ga ao maukubalio."
40011020	Vikara Jesu akikwatya kuidumulira iryahu midzi ariyo were wakwendahenda miujiza mibomu-mibomu, ela at'u a kuko hatha bada ya kuona miujiza iyo, makikahala kuthubu vizho.
40011021	Bai waamba, "Shauri yenu ninwi at'u a Korazini na Beth'isaida. Kwani kala yo miujiza niriyoihenda ko kwenu be naihenda kahi za midzi ya Tiro na Sidoni be o andziyenu ngere mavala nguwo za magunia, na kukala ivuni kapindi kunyesa kuthubu kwao.

40012001	Vikara makathi garyahu, Jesu hamwenga na anafundzie makala manakira kahikahi za minda ya ngano siku ya Sabato. Bai marihokala makukirani, o anafundzie makikala manasikira ndzala, kwa vizho makikwatya kuhuta masuche ga ngano na kwafuna.

40012018	"Lolani ye muhumiki wangu niriyemutsagula. Ninamuhendza na ananifwahiza. Nindamwangiza nguvu za Roho wangu ili atangazire at'u mario si Ayahudi, kukala hukumu indakala ya hachi.
40012019	K'andapigana k'anani na at'u hedu kupiga k'ululu. Kidza k'andanena zhomu-zhomu bule mo ngira-ngira.
40012020	At'u mario k'amana nguvu k'andaabanda moyo bule. Naye andaenderera vizho muhaka ahakikishe kukala hachi idzashinda.
40012021	Na kukirira na dzinare, at'u mario si Ayahudi mandahendywa makale na th'amaa ya hakika."
40012022	Vikara kahi za wakathi uwo, Jesu akireherwa mut'u ariyekala wapagawa ni p'ep'o. Mut'u yuyu were ni kipofu, na ni bwibwi. Ela arihorefwa kwa Jesu, Jesu akimuhoza na ye bwibwi akikwatya kuona na kunena.

40012033	"Kila muhi umanyikana kwa gago matundage uzhalago. Muhi ukiutengezerat'o undazhala matunda madzo. Ela kala k'aundatengezerwat'o undazhala matunda mai-mai.

40012045	Vikara aonaho vizho nikwendahala p'ep'o angine afungahe, ai kumukira ye mwenye, akadza nao, makadzangira, makatoa mumo. Bai hali ya mut'u iye ni kukala mbii-mbii hatha kukira zho arizhokala chaho. Na vizho ndo vindizhokala kwa kizhazi kiki kithiriri."

40012049	Arihouza vizho, akienderera kunena kuno anaaloha o anafundzie akiamba, "Aa be ndo m'ama na ndo ndugu zangu.
40012050	Kwani kila ahendaye mahendzo ga Baba ariye mulunguni, nde m'ama na nde ndugu yangu."
40013001	Bai siku iyo vizho, Jesu achambola mumo nyumbani arimokala na achendakelesi k'anda-k'anda ya ro ziya ra Galilaya.
40013002	K'uzhona arihokwendakelesi kuko, rikundi ribomu ra at'u rikimudzalira hatha akiona ni baha akwere dauni akelesi mumo. Bai wakelesi dauni kuno at'u angine osi makiima ko k'anda-k'anda ya ro ziya.
40013003	Akiambira maut'u manji kwa kuhumira mafumbo. Akiamba, "Mut'u mumwenga wauka kwendamwaga-mwaga mbeyu mundani kwakwe.
40013004	Vikara arihokala akuzimwagani-mwagani, mbeyu nyingine zikigwa k'anda-k'anda ya ngira. Unyama ukidzazit'ot'a.
40013005	Nyingine zikigwa kahi za mutsanga wa mawe-mawe, harihokala hana mutsanga muchache. Bai zikimera malo-malo kwa kukala were hana mutsanga muchache.
40013006	Ela zirihopigwa ni dzuwa thu zikinyala kare, kwa kukala were k'azina miziji ya kwenda kure.
40013007	Mbeyu nyingine zikigwa miyani. Zirihomera, miya iryahu ikikula na ikizizia-zia hatha k'azipatire nafasi ya kumbola ndze bule.
40013008	Ela mbeyu nyingine zo zikigwa kahi za mutsanga mudzo, na zikizhalat'o sana. Nyingine zazhala gana-gana, nyingine mirongo mihandahu, na nyingine zo zikizhala mirongo mihahu."
40013009	Arihogonya kunena viryahu akiamba, "Mwenye masikiro, naasikire."
40013010	Bai, ariholaa haho, o anafundzie makimuza makimwamba, "Kwanoni unahendza kuhumira mafumbo kala unanena na o at'u?"
40013011	Jesu akiadzigidzya akiamba, "Ninahenda vizho kwa kukala ninwi mwajaliwa kumanya siri za uthawali wa mulunguni, ela aryahu k'amajaliwirwe bule.
40013012	Kwani kila ariye nacho andangezwa, akale na vinji, ela ariye k'ana kit'u kamare, hatha cho kichache aricho nacho kidza andakihokwa.
40013013	At'u aryahu ninanena nao kwa mafumbo, kwa kukala manalola, ela k'amaona bule, kidza manasikiza, ela k'amasikira hedu kuelewa.
40013014	Na garyahu maneno garigonenwa ni nabii Isaya haho kapindi vivi gadzathimira kwao. Kwani Isaya wanena akiamba, 'Mundasirikiza na kusirikiza ela k'amundang'alirwa bule. Mundalola na kulola ela k'amundaona bule.
40013015	Mana mioyo ya at'u aa idzakala mikomu, masikiro gao madzagagandiza, matso gao madzagafinya, masidze makaona na go matso gao, makasikira na go masikiro gao, makang'alirwa na yo mioyo yao, makanigalukira mimi, nikaahoza.'
40013016	Baha ninwi, kwani masikiro genu ganasikira na matso genu ganaona.
40013017	Kwani be namwambira kamare kukala, manabii anji na at'u ahachi angine, mathamani kuona gaga mugaonago, ela k'amagaonere, kidza mathamani masikire gago mugasikirago, ela k'amagasikirire bule."
40013018	Jesu akienderera kunena na anafundzie akiamba, "Vikara, sirikizani nimwambire mana ya ro fumbo ra mulayi.
40013019	Kila mut'u ariye akisikira neno ra Mulungu k'arielewa, ye Mui nikudza na kurusa ho moyoni ririholaywa. Bai mut'u dza iye nde iryahu mbeyu iriyogwa haryahu k'anda-k'anda ya ngira.
40013020	Ziryahu mbeyu zirizogwa mutsanga wa mawe-mawe, ni mut'u ariye akisikira neno thu, anarihokera kare mara mwenga, kidza anarihokera na raha.
40013021	Ela kwa kukala neno riryahu k'arina miziji moyoni mwakwe, mut'u yuyahu k'atoa naro bule. Kwani thabu, hedu mateso gakimudzirira kwa ut'u wa ro neno, k'avumirira bule, anaviricha kare.
40013022	Mungine ye ni here iryahu mbeyu iriyogwa miyani. Mut'u iye nikusikira ro neno ra Mulungu, ela v̱ata za urumwengu, na ukengi wa mali, nikurikonya-konya ro neno hatha rikakala k'arindazhala kit'u.
40013023	Ela mut'u mungine ye ni here iryahu mbeyu iriyogwa kahi za mutsanga mudzo. Mut'u yuyu nikurisikira ro neno ra Mulungu, akarielewat'o. Bai at'u mario dza vizho yuyu, nikuzhala matunda. Yuno gana, yuya mirongo mihandahu, na mungine mirongo mihahu."
40013024	Bai kula haho, Jesu akiambira o at'u fumbo ringine akiamba, "Uthawali wa mulunguni udzahalana na mut'u ariyekwendalaya ngano mundani kwakwe.
40013025	Vikara siku iyo vizho, hadhui wa kwakwe naye, akithariza hatha at'u machangira ndazini, achendamwaga-mwaga ngano ya vuweni kahi za yo ngano yenye.
40013026	Bai, mbeyu zizi zamera na zikikula hatha ngano inaamba inafumula, yo ngano ya vuweni nayo ikifumula.
40013027	K'uzhona aryahu ahumiki marihoona viryahu machendamuza ye mwenye munda makiamba, 'Bwana, samba walaya ngano yenye we murya mundani mwako! Be mbona vino muna ngano ya vuweni?'
40013028	Ye mwenye munda akiamba, 'Hadhui ndiye ariyekudzailaya.' O ahumiki makimwamba, 'Vikara vino hukaing'ole hedu huhendedze?'

40013031	Bai Jesu arihogonya kuambira ro fumbo riro, akihamboza fumbo ringine kaheri akiamba, "Uthawali wa mulunguni udzahalana na katembe kathithe ka haradali, kariko mut'u mumwenga wakahala achendakalaya mundani mwakwe.
40013032	Katembe kaka ni kathithe kukira t'embe zosi. Ela kakimera, nikukula zhomu hatha kakakira mimera mingine yosi ya mundani. Kidza nikukala muhi mubomu hatha unyama ukadzaaka vitsunji zhao mo vitaini."
40013033	Jesu akiambozera fumbo ringine, akiamba, "Uthawali wa mulunguni udzahalana na ts'ats'u iriyohalwa ni mwanamuche akivugira p'ishi t'ahu za unga wa ngano na ukikutuka wosi."
40013034	Bai kila kit'u arichokifundisha Jesu kwa o at'u, wakifundisha kwa kuhumira mafumbo, k'akuna kit'u hatha kimwenga arichokifundisha bila kuhumira mafumbo.
40013035	Bai wahenda vivi ili maneno garigonenwa ni nabii mumwenga ho kapindi gathimire. Kwani nabii iye wanena akiamba, "Nindahumira mafumbo kunena maut'u garigofitswa hangu kuumbwa kwa urumwengu."
40013036	Vikara Jesu arihogonya kunena akiaricha o at'u na akiuya ko nyumbani arikokala adzambola. Bai arihofika kuko anafundzie makimuthuwa makimwamba, "Bwana, rirya fumbo ra ngano ya vuweni manaye ni noni? Fambire."
40013037	Jesu akiadzigidzya akiamba, "K'amuona h'e, mulayi wa yo mbeyu mbidzo ni Mwana wa Mudamu.
40013038	Wo munda ni uu urumwengu. Mbeyu mbidzo ni ana a Uthawali, na ngano ya vuweni ni ana a ye Mui.
40013039	Iye nde mulayi wa yo ngano ya vuweni. Wakathi wa kuvuna ni siku ya mwisho, na avuni ni malaika.
40013040	Siku ya mwisho vindakala dza vizho zhenye, zha ngano ya vuweni kung'olwa na kwangizwa mohoni.
40013041	Kwani Mwana wa Mudamu andaalagiza malaikae makundzumanye ahendi a mai osi, hamwenga na aryahu maahendyao andziyao mahende mai, na maamboze ndze ya uthawali wa kwakwe.
40013042	Makila haho maahale makaatsuhe mohoni. Na kuko mandarira na kufuna meno.
40013043	Ela ahachi o, mandang'ala here dzuwa kahi za uthawali wa Babiyao. Mwenye masikiro, naasikire."
40013044	Jesu akienderera kumboza mafumbo mangine akiamba, "Uthawali wa mulunguni udzahalana na ushaha uriwokala wafitswa hat'u mundani vivi. Vikara mut'u mumwenga arihokwendaupesa akikaza kuufitsa. Na kwa ro fwahiro bomu arirokala naro achendaguza vit'uzhe zhosi, akidzagula wo munda."
40013045	Bai Jesu akihamboza fumbo ringine kaheri akiamba, "Uthawali wa mulunguni udzahalana na mut'u mumwenga, ariyekala kaziye ni kumala lulu na kwendaguza.
40013046	K'ona siku mwenga achendaona lulu ya kima kibomu sana. Bai achendaguza vit'u zhosi arizhokala nazho, akidzaigula."
40013047	Kidza Jesu akimboza fumbo ringine, akiamba, "Pia uthawali wa mulunguni udzahalana na nyavu bomu sana, iriyogwagwa ziyani na ikigwira makumba ga kila namuna.
40013048	Bai irihokala idzadzala o avuhi makiimboza ndze, gonya makikelesi kutsagula makumba ga kuriwa na gasigoriwa. Garyahu ga kuriwa makigangiza k'ahuni mwao, garya gasoriwa makigatsuha.
40013049	Na siku ya mwisho vindakala dza vizho zhenye. Malaika mandaathenga at'u, ai lwao, na ahachi lwao.

40013051	Jesu arihogonya kuathalira mafumbo gaga akiauza akiamba, "Vidze mudzagasikira gano nidzigomwambira?" Na anafundzie makimudzigidzya makiamba, "Ee hudzagasikira."
40013052	Bai marihokala madzadzigidzya, Jesu akiambira, "H'aya bai, kila mwalimu wa sheria adziyefundishwa ujeri dzulu za uthawali wa mulunguni, a karakara na mut'u ariye na akibaze nyumbani mwakwe. Ni kwangira akamboza mbisha na za kapindi."

40013054	achenda kwao. Vikara arihofika kuko, achangira kahi za sinagogi ra at'u a kuko na akikwacha kufundisha. K'uzhona o at'u makingalala zhomu makiamba, "Uno ulachu be tha waupatahi? Na zino nguvu za kutengezera miujiza nazo wazilazhahi?
40013055	Yuno si yuyahu mwana wa fundhi wa kutsonga bule yuno? Samba tha mameye ni Maryamu yuno. Hatha nduguze osi a kilume hunaamanya: Jakobu, na Josefu, na Simoni, na Juda.
40013056	H'e o nduguze a kiche, samba osi ma haha! Vikara maut'u gano gosi wagapatahi?"

40014020	Nao osi makirya hatha makivilola. Bai marihogonya kurya, o anafundzi makitsola-tsola zho visiku-visiku virizhokala vidzasala na makidzaza k'ahu kumi na mbiri.

40016001	Siku mwenga Mafarisayo na Masadukayo makwendamujeza Jesu makimwamba aanyese muujiza wa kula mulunguni.

40020001	"Kwani uthawali wa mulunguni udzahalana na mwenye nyumba ariyekala na munda wa mizabibu. Mut'u iye warauka madzach'a maitsi genye kwendamala vibaruwa mende makamuhendere kazi mundani kwakwe.

40020005	Bai vivi wavithuwa hatha mara mbiri, murongo wa saa t'andahu na murongo wa saa chenda.

40020008	"Bai, at'u aryahu mahenda kazi vivii hatha kukitswa. K'ona yuyahu mwenye munda akimulagiza munyaparawe akaihe o ahendzi a kazi adze aarihe. Bai, waandza na aryahu arioapata mwisho, hatha akimarigiza na aryahu arioapata kwandza.

40020026	Ela ninwi musikale vizho bule. Iye ahendzaye kukala mubomu suthi akale muhumiki wenu.

40021020	K'uzhona o anafundzi marihoona viryahu machangalala zhomu, makiamba, "Muhi uno be tha udzanyaladze haraka vino?"

40023015	Shauri yenu ninwi alimu a Sheria na Mafarisayo, kudzihendya kwenu nwi! Mu thayari kuvuka bahari na kwenda ts'i za kure, kwa kumala mwanafundzi mumwenga thu. Ela mukimupata, munamuhendya akale mui zaidhi na zo nafasi za kwangira Jehanamu zikale k'ana mbiri ya zo zenu."
40023016	"Shauri yenu ninwi vilongozi vipofu. Mut'u akilaha kwa Hekalu munaamba kuko si kulaha, ela munaamba kulaha jeri ni kwa mut'u adziyelaha kwa dhahabu ya Hekalu.

40023018	Munaamba kukala mut'u akilaha kwa cho kijaja cha kwambozera sadaka k'alahire kit'u. Ela akilaha kwa yo sadaka iriyo ho kijajani munaamba kuko ndo kulaha jeri.
40023019	Vipofu nwi, cho kijaja na yo sadaka kibomu ni hicho? Samba cho kijaja ndo kihendacho yo sadaka ikale eri!
40023020	Kwa vizho mut'u alahaye kwa cho kijaja, analaha kwa kicho kijaja hamwenga na vit'u zhosi vindizhombozwa haho.

40023029	"Shauri yenu ninwi alimu a Sheria na Mafarisayo, kudzihendya kwenu nwi! Munahala mbira za manabii na za at'u ahachi, munazijengera na kuzidona

40024004	Jesu akiadzigidzya akiamba, "Dzimanyirireni hasidze mut'u akamukenga.

40024006	Na mundasikira uv̱oro wa viha vihefwazho hehi na vingine mundahenda kuvisikira uvumi, ela sogoheni, kwani ni hatha gakale gago, ela wo mwisho wa urumwengu undakala uchere mbere.
40024007	Kabila rindauka kwendapigana na kabila ringine. Uthawali undapigana na uthawali mungine. Kundakala na ndzala na ts'i indathethema hat'u-hat'u.

40025001	"Haho siku andihokudzirira Mwana wa Mudamu, uthawali wa mulunguni undahalana na asichana kumi marioasha mataa gao mende makamutsangire bwana harusi.

40025014	Jesu akienderera kunena akiamba, "Wakathi uwo be udzahalana na mut'u mumwenga ariyekala anamala kufunga charo cha kwenda ts'i za kure. Bai kabila k'adzauka, waaiha ahumikie akiap'a malize mamutsundzire.
40025015	Waaiha hamwenga, na kila mut'u akimup'a t'alant'a kulengana na wadimiwe. Wa kwandza wamup'a t'alant'a ts'ano. Wa hiri akimup'a mbiri, na wa hahu akimup'a mwenga. Arihogonya vizho akiuka achenda.

40025023	Ye bwanawe akiamba, 'U muhumiki mudzo na mwaminifu, uriyehenda kazi ya kunifwaha moyo wangu. Wakala mwaminifu kwa maut'u mathithe nami nindakuhendya uimirire maut'u mabomu. H'aya ndzo kuno wangire kahi raha ya bwanao.'
40025024	Kula iye, akidza ye wa t'alant'a mwenga. Akiamba, 'Bwana, uwe be ninakumanyat'o sana mino. U mut'u mwomu. Unahendza kuvuna hat'u uriho k'uhalayire, na kuzola mutsere uriwo k'uuhululire.

40025026	K'ona ye bwanawe anambola kunena akiamba, 'Muhumiki muthiriri na mukaha we. Be hatha navikale unanimanyat'o sana kukala nivuna hat'u niriho silayire, na kuzola mutsere hat'u niriho sihululire.

40025031	Jesu akienderera kunena akiamba, "Haho Mwana wa Mudamu andihokudza na malaika osi kahi za nguma ya kwakwe, andakelesi dzulu za kihi cha kwakwe cha kithawali, kihi chenye nguma.
40025032	Bai andihokala yukelesi, at'u a makabila gosi mandakudzaima mbereze, naye andaathanya k'ana mbiri dza viryahu murisa athanyazho mbuzi na ng'ondzi.

40025035	Kwani nirihokala nina ndzala, ninwi mwanip'a chakurya nikirya. Nirihokala nina k'ihu, mukinip'a madzi nikinwa. Na nirihokala ni mujeni mukinikaribishat'o.

40025038	Urihokala u mujeni fukikukaribishat'o. Urihokala una wira fukikup'a nguwo ukivala.
40025039	Urihokala u mukongo fukidzakulola, na urihokala u jela nazho dzazho. Be hatha fwakona rini sino hatha fukikuhendera maut'u gano gosi?'

40025042	Kwani nirihokala nina ndzala, k'amunip'ere chakurya nikarya. Nirihokala nina k'ihu k'amunip'ere madzi nikanwa.
40025043	Nirihokala ni mujeni k'amunikaribishire. Nirihokala nina wira k'amunip'ere nguwo nikavala. Nirihokala ni mukongo k'amudzire nilola, na nirihokala jela nazho dzazho.'

40025045	Ye andaadzigidzya aambe, 'Ninamwambira kamare kukala, zho murizho k'amuahenderere aa ndugu zangu athithe, be hatha mimi nami k'amunihenderere.'
40025046	Nao mandihoambwa vizho, mandakwendangira kahi za hukumu ya kare na kare, ela ahachi o, mandangira kahi za uzima wa kare na kare."
40026001	Vikara Jesu arihokala adzagonya kunena maneno gaga gosi, waambira anafundzie,
40026002	"Here mumanyazho, muhondo ni sikuk'uu ya P'asaka. Na Mwana wa Mudamu andalazhwa ili asulubiwe."
40026003	Wakathi uwo, alombi abomu na athumia a Kiyahudi mathunganana nyumbani kwa Kayafa. Mut'u yuyu Kayafa were nde Mulombi mubomu mwenye wakathi uwo.
40026004	Bai at'u ao mathunganana kuko ili mamale ngira ya kilachu ya kumugwirira Jesu na mamwalage.
40026005	Ela marihothunganana, mapatana kukala masimugwire Jesu wakathi wa P'asaka bule, p'ore at'u makathinya bugwa.
40026006	Bai siku mwenga, Jesu wakwenda nyumbani kwa mwanamulume mumwenga ariyekala akiifwa Simoni Mahana. Mwanamulume yuyu were anatoa kahi za kadzidzi ka Beth'ania.
40026007	Bai arihokala haho, mwanamuche mumwenga akidza na th'up'a iriyokala i thele mafuha ga marashi kidza ga gali sana. Th'up'a ii yere yatengezwa na iwe ra alabasita. Bai arihofika haho, akimumwagira Jesu go mafuha mo kitswani kuno Jesu mwenye anahumira chakurya.
40026008	Bai o anafundzi marihoona viryahu, k'aviafwahire bule, maamba, "Kuno be tha si kwanonga kuno?
40026009	Mafuha gaga kala gadzaguzwa gakambola p'esa nyinji zenye na makagerwa masikini?"
40026010	Jesu arihovimanya akiamba, "Mbona munamubudzya ye mwanamuchengwa? Iye adzanihendera kit'u kidzo.
40026011	Masikini munao siku zosini, ela mimi k'amundakala nami siku zosini bule.
40026012	Ut'u uu wa kunimwagira mafuha, yuyu mwanamuche adzauhenda ili anithayarishe kwa kuzikwa kwangu.
40026013	Nami namwambira ujeri, zho adzizhohenda mwanamuche yuyu vivi rero, nazho vindathalwa na kukumbukirwa kila undihohubiriwa wo Uv̱oro Udzo kahi za urumwengu muzima."
40026014	Bai wakathi uwo, mumwenga wa aryahu anafundzi kumi na airi a Jesu aifwaye Juda Isikariote, wauka achenda kwa alombi abomu.
40026015	Anafika kuko akiamba, "Vidze mut'u yuno nikimulazha kwenu, mundanip'ani?" K'ona arihonena vizho, aryahu alombi abomu makimuthalira visiku mirongo mihahu zha fedha makimup'a.
40026016	Na kulaizira haho, Juda akikala anamala nafasi mbidzo ya kumusalitira Jesu.
40026017	Vikara siku ya kwandza ya sikuk'uu ya Mikahe Iso Ts'ats'u, anafundzi makwendamuza Jesu makiamba, "P'asaka ino undairyahi, fukakuthayarishire?"
40026018	Jesu akidzigidzya akiamba, "Ngirani wo mudzi wa Jerusalemu mwende hatha kwa yuyu mut'u yuyu. Mukifika kuko mwambeni kukala, 'Mwalimu anaamba wakathi wangu u hehi, kwa vizho nindarya P'asaka na anafundzi angu kwako nyumbani.' "
40026019	Bai o anafundzi makihenda here marizhokala madzalagizwa ni Jesu. Manafika kuko makithayarisha yo P'asaka.
40026020	Kurihofika dziloni, Jesu na anafundzie kumi na airi makelesi marye chakurya.
40026021	Marihokala makuryani Jesu akinena akiamba, "Ninamwambira ujeri wenye kukala mumwenga wenu haha andanisaliti."
40026022	O anafundzi marihosikira vizho makishikithika sana na makikwacha kumuza Jesu mumwenga-mumwenga makiamba, "Vidze ni mimi, Bwana?"
40026023	Ela Jesu akidzigidzya akiamba, "Iye atsotsaye nami kahi za muvure mumwenga nde andiyenisaliti.
40026024	Mwana wa Mudamu anenda kare kamwe here Maoro gaambazho, ela shauriye iye mut'u amusalitiye! Vingakala baha kala k'azhalirwe."
40026025	Vikara Jesu arihonena viryahu, ye musaliti wa kwakwe naye akiuza akiamba, "Vidze ni mimi Mwalimu?" Jesu akimudzigidzya akiamba, "Udzanena."
40026026	Bai marihokala makuryani, Jesu wahala mukahe, akimboza muv̱era kwa Mulungu, gonya akiumogola-mogola akiap'a o anafundzie akiamba, "Halani murye, uu ndo mwiri wangu."
40026027	Na arihogonya kuap'a wo mukahe, akihala cho kikombe cha divai, akimboza muv̱era kwa Mulungu, gonya akiap'a o anafundzie akiamba, "Halani kikombe kiki mutsumbulirane,
40026028	kwani ii ndo milatso yangu ya cho kilagane, imwagwayo ili at'u anji madime kusamehewa dambi zao.
40026029	Nami namwambira ujeri, sindanwa divai ii kaheri muhaka siku iyo nindihonwa divai mbisha hamwenga nanwi kahi za uthawali wa Baba."
40026030	Gonya makiimba wira na makiuka kwenda Murima wa Mizeituni.
40026031	Jesu akiambira kukala, "Usiku wa rero, ninwi nyosi mundaniricha h'akiyangu. Kwani Maoro ganaamba, 'Nindamupiga ye murisa na zo ng'ondzi zosi zindatsamukana.'
40026032	Ela haho nikikala nidzafufulwa, nindamuthangulia kwenda Galilaya."
40026033	P'et'ero akimudzigidzya akiamba, "Hatha kala osi mandakuricha, mimi sindakuricha ng'o."
40026034	Jesu akimudzigidzya akiamba, "Nakwambira ujeri, usiku wa rero kabila jogolo k'aridzaika, undanikana k'ana t'ahu."
40026035	P'et'ero akimwamba Jesu, "Hatha kala ni kufwa nanifwe, ela sindakukana ng'o!" Na o anafundzi angine nao makinena dza vizho.
40026036	Gonya Jesu na anafundzie makwenda hat'u haifwaho Geth'isemane. Marihofika kuko, akiambira o anafundzie akiamba, "Kelesini haha munitharize nami nasongera mbere vichache nikavoye."
40026037	Arihokala akwendani akimuhala P'et'ero na o ana airi a Zebedayo, Jakobu na Johana achenda nao. Naye wakathi uwo washononeka zhomu na kubudzyika moyo.
40026038	Bai makwenda hatha manafika ko mbere, akiambira kukala, "Ninashononeka zhomu moyoni mwangu hatha ni here nindiyefwa. Bai kalani haha muchese nami."
40026039	Gonya Jesu akiaricha ano P'et'ero haho na akisongera mbere vichache. Achendagwa na moyo akivoya akiamba, "Baba, chamba vinadimikika mateso gaga naganiukire, gasinipate bule. Ela navikale here uhendzazho uwe, visikale here nihendzazho mimi bule."
40026040	Kula haho akiauyira o anafundzie, naye akidzaaona marere. Akimwamba P'et'ero, "Yani k'amudimire kuchesa nami hatha ngaa saa mwenga?
40026041	Chesani na muvoye sidze mukangira majezoni, kwani roho inahendza kamare, ela mwiri ni munyonge."
40026042	Naye arihogonya kunena, akiaricha haho kaheri na achendavoya dza vizho zha kwandza akiamba, "Baba, chamba vinadimikika, mateso gaga gasinipate bule. Ela visikale here nihendzazho mimi, navikale here uhendzazho uwe."
40026043	Arihogonya kuvoya vizho, akiauyira o ano P'et'ero. Anafika kuko, achendaathekeza marere kaheri. K'amadimire kukala matso kwa wo uts'indzizi mariwokala nawo.
40026044	Bai Jesu akiaricha kaheri, na achendavoya mara ya hahu, dza vizho zha mara ya kwandza.
40026045	Arihogonya kuvoya, akiauyira o anafundzie akiambira, "Muchere kulala na kudzioyeza? Lolani wakathi wa Mwana wa Mudamu kusalitiwa kwa enye dambi udzafika.
40026046	Lamukani fwende, kwani ye andiyenisaliti akudzani."
40026047	Bai arihokala achere kunena, lola Juda mumwenga wa o anafundzie kumi na airi akidza na kundi bomu ra at'u mariokala madzatsukula mishu na njogoma. At'u aa were mala kwa alombi abomu na athumia a Kiyahudi.
40026048	Iye musaliti were waap'a muv̱ano kukala, "Ye nindiyemudonera nde mumumalaye, mugwireni."
40026049	Juda achenda mara mwenga na akiamba, "Dheri narikale kwako Mwalimu," gonya akimudonera.
40026050	Jesu arihoona viryahu, akimwamba Juda, "Henda zho vidzizhokufisha musenangu." Bai o at'u makimwangiza magandzani Jesu.
40026051	Lola mumwenga kahi za o at'u mariokala na Jesu, akitsolola mushuwe na akimuthema muhumiki wa ye Mulombi mubomu mwenye akimutosa sikiro.
40026052	Jesu arihoona viryahu, akimwamba ye mwenye mushu, "Wudzye chowani mwakwe wo mushuwo. Kwani kila ahumiraye mushu, andalagwa kwa mushu.
40026053	K'umanya kukala nikamwambira Baba anirehere maalifu ga malaika madze mafuhehere, ananirehera mara mwenga?
40026054	Ela nikihendazho, go Maoro gaambago kukala ni hatha vivi vikale gandathimiradze?"
40026055	Bai Jesu arihogonya kunena vizho, akiagalukira o at'u akiamba, "Mbona mudzambola na mishu na njogoma kudzanigwira dza here mudzaogwira jambazi? Kila siku nidzakala nikikelesi kahi za ro Hekalu kufundisha na k'amunigwirire?
40026056	Ela gaga gosi ganakala kwamba garyahu garigoorwa ni manabii gathimire." Bai o anafundzie osi makimuricha makichimbira.
40026057	Bai aryahu at'u mariomugwira Jesu, mamuhala vivii hatha nyumbani kwa Kayafa, ye Mulombi mubomu mwenye, mana kuko ndo o alimu a Sheria, na athumia marikokala madzathunganana kumuthariza.
40026058	Marihokala makwendani, P'et'ero wamuthuwa Jesu kwa kure. Wakwenda hatha achendangira muhalani ha ye Mulombi mubomu mwenye, akikelesi na o arindzi ili alolere chamba vindakaladze.
40026059	Bai aryahu alombi abomu na ro Baraza ra athumia, majeza zhomu kumala ushahidhi wowosi wa ulongo wa kuthosha kumwalagira Jesu,
40026060	ela k'amaupatire. At'u anji majeza kumboza ushahidhi wao wa ulongo, ela k'aufwahire kit'u. Mwisho kamare, kuchambola anaalume airi
40026061	makiamba, "Mwanamulume yuyu waamba kukala ro Hekalu ra Mulungu anadima kuribanda-banda na akariaka kwa siku t'ahu."
40026062	Bai ye Mulombi mubomu mwenye akirungarara, na akimuza Jesu akiamba, "Mbona k'udzigidzya kit'u. Zho manenazho ano at'u ni jeri?"
40026063	Ela Jesu akinyamala zii. Ye Mulombi mubomu mwenye akinena kaheri akiamba, "Ninakulahiza kahi za dzina ra Mulungu ariye moyo, ufwambire chamba uwe ndiwe Masihi Mwana wa Mulungu."
40026064	Jesu akimwamba, "Udzanena. Nami namwambira ujeri, kula vivi mundamona Mwana wa Mudamu akelesi mukono wa kurya wa Mulungu mwenye nguvu, na anadza kuno a dzulu za maingu."
40026065	Kusikira vizho thu, ye Mulombi mubomu mwenye akigwira nguwo za kwakwe akizitharura kwa kutsukirwa, kuno ananena na kuamba, "Iyo ni kufuru kamare iyo. K'amudzamusikira zho? Vino funa haja ya mashahidhi angine?
40026066	Hedu munaambadze nwi?" Na osini makiamba, "Anav̱irya kwalagwa."
40026067	Ndo makimutsuhira mahe ga uso na kumupiga makonde. Angine makimupiga makofi,
40026068	kuno manamwamba, "We Masihi, fwambire adzekupiga ni h'ani kala u nabii jeri!"
40026069	Wakathi uu wosi P'et'ero were akelesi ko muhalani. Bai arihokala kuko muhendzi wa kazi wa kiche wa ye Mulombi mubomu mwenye wakudzamwamba P'et'ero, "We nawe samba were u hamwenga na yuyu Jesu wa Galilaya?"
40026070	P'et'ero akikana mbere zao akiamba, "Maneno gago mino sigamanya."
40026071	Kula haho, P'et'ero akimbola achenda ko muv̱iryani. Anafika kuko, musichana mumwenga akimona na akiambira o at'u mariokala haho kukala, "Yuyu naye were a hamwenga na Jesu wa Nazareth'i benwi."
40026072	P'et'ero akikanaiza kaheri kwa kuapa akiamba, "Mwanamulume iye simumanya kamare."
40026073	Ela k'avitoere, o at'u mariokala maimire haho makimwamba P'et'ero, "Uwe be unakana ulongo, ela u mumwenga waho. Hatha yo minenereyo inanyesa t'i."
40026074	P'et'ero akikwatya kulani na kulaha, akiamba, "Mwanamulume iye be simumanya." Na haho henye jogolo rikiika.
40026075	P'et'ero akikumbukira viryahu arizhoambwa ni Jesu kukala, "Kabila jogolo k'aridzaika undanikana k'ana t'ahu." Bai achambola ko ndze achendarira na utsungu munji.
40027001	Kurihocha, o alombi abomu na athumia a Kiyahudi mathunganana kaheri makipanga viryahu mandizhohenda hatha mamwalage Jesu.
40027002	Bai mamuhala makimufunga, na makimuhirika kwa luwali P'ilato.
40027003	Juda arihoona kukala ro Baraza ratosa kukala mamwalage Jesu, wadziutha sana, hatha akihala zho visiku mirongo mihahu zha fedha achenda nazho kuko kwa alombi abomu na athumia a Kiyahudi ili akaaujire.
40027004	Arihofika kuko waagolozera akiamba, "Nahenda dambi bomu kumusaliti mut'u asiye dambi na mut'u." O makimwamba, "Gago be ni gako gago, sino k'ahugamanya."
40027005	Naye kusikira vizho, akihala zho visiku zha fedha akivitsuha mo Hekaluni, achambola achendadzifunga lugwe.
40027006	Vikara o alombi abomu makivitsola-tsola viryahu visiku zha fedha gonya makiamba, "P'esa zizi be zina kilatso, na Sheria yehu k'aihuruhusu kuika p'esa dza zizi kahi za akiba ya mumu Hekaluni."
40027007	Kwa vizho bada ya kuojana-ojana makivihala machendagula hat'u harihokala hakiifwa Munda wa Muumbi wa Nyungu, hakale hat'u ha kuzikwa ajeni.
40027008	Na kulaiza siku iyo hatha rero munda uwo unaifwa Munda wa Milatso.
40027009	Kwa ut'u uwo wenye bai, garyahu maneno garigonenwa ni nabii Jeremia gakithimira. Kwani Jeremia wanena akiamba, "Mahala vizho visiku mirongo mihahu zha fedha, iriyo were ndo bei ya kugulira mut'u iriyoikwa ni o ana a Iziraeli,
40027010	makivigula wo Munda wa Muumbi wa Nyungu here Bwana arizhonilagiza."
40027011	Vikara Jesu arihohirikwa kwa P'ilato, waimishwa haho mbereze na P'ilato akimuza akiamba, "Vidze we ndiwe muthawali wa Ayahudi?" Jesu akimudzigidzya akimwamba, "Uwe udzanena."
40027012	Ela o alombi abomu na athumia a Kiyahudi marihomushithaki, Jesu wanyamala zii kamare.
40027013	P'ilato arihoona viryahu, akimuza Jesu akiamba, "Go maut'u manji genye madzigoamba wagahenda unagasikira?"
40027014	Ela Jesu ye akithuwa kunyamala vizho bila kudzigidzya hatha ango mwenga, hatha ye P'ilato vikimwangalaza zhomu zhenye.
40027015	Kila sikuk'uu ya P'asaka, P'ilato were ana mazowera ga kuambozera Ayahudi mufungwa mumwenga mandiyemutsagula enye.
40027016	Bai kahi za wakathi uwo, kwere kuna mufungwa ariyekala adzaluta nguma, dzinare ni Baraba.
40027017	Kwa vizho o Ayahudi marihokundzumanyikana hamwenga, P'ilato akiauza akiamba, "Nimwambozere Baraba hedu nimwambozere Jesu aifwaye Masihi?"
40027018	Kwani P'ilato wamanya kukala o athumia a Kiyahudi madzamushithaki Jesu kwa sababu ya wivu thu.
40027019	Bai P'ilato arihokala anakeresi kahi za kihiche cha hukumu alamule, muchewe akilagiza uv̱oro akiamba, "Maut'u gago be usigangirire kamare, kwani mut'u yuyu be ni muhachi. Mana usiku nidzaloha ndoso mbii-mbii sana dzulu za kwakwe. Nayo ndoso iyo idzanisirinya."
40027020	Ela o alombi abomu na o athumia a Kiyahudi makiangola-ngola o at'u kukala maambe mambozerwe Baraba, ela Jesu ye alagwe.
40027021	Kwa vizho P'ilato arihouza kaheri na kuamba, "Kahi za ano at'u airi munahendza nimwambozere h'ani?" O at'u makiamba, "Baraba."
40027022	P'ilato akiauza akiamba, "Na yuno Jesu aifwaye Masihi ye nimuhendedze?" Nao makinena kwa umwenga makiamba, "Naasulubiwe!"
40027023	P'ilato akiauza kaheri akiamba, "Kwani adzakosani kibomu?" Ela o hatha makikaza kupiga k'ululu makiamba, "Naasulubiwe!"
40027024	Bai P'ilato arihoona kukala hatha akaenderera kunena nao kidza k'avindafwaha kit'u na kidza o at'u were madzakwacha kuhenda fujo, akihala madzi akioga mikono mbere za ro kundi ra at'u, akiamba, "Milatso ya mut'u yuyu k'aidzulu yangu bule, i dzulu zenu."
40027025	Na lola o at'u makidzigidzya kwa umwenga makiamba, "Milatsoye naikale dzulu zehu siswi na dzulu za ana ehu."
40027026	Kwa vizho P'ilato akiambozera Baraba, gonya akiamuru Jesu apigwe vikotho, ndo alazhwe akasulubiwe.
40027027	Jesu arihokala adzalazhwa akasulubiwe, o shikari a luwali P'ilato mamuhala machangira naye mumo nyumbani mwa luwali, na cho kikosi chosi cha shikari kikimudengereka.
40027028	Bai mamuhala makimuvula nguwo, gonya makimuvika k'andzu th'une.
40027029	Manambola haho makitengeza kiremba cha miya makimuvika. Gonya makihala kidhath'a cha mwandzi makimugwiza kahi za wo mukonowe wa kurya. Bai marihogonya vizho makikwacha kupiga mavindi na kumuv̱udhya Jesu na kumwamba, "K'una ut'u muheshimiwa muthawali wa Ayahudi?"
40027030	Bai mamutsuhira mahe, gonya makimunyagula cho kidhath'a makimupiga nacho mo kitswani.
40027031	Marihokala madzamuv̱udhya zha kuthosha, mamuvula yo k'andzu th'une, makimuvika zo nguwoze kaheri, makimuthongozha kwendamusulubisha.
40027032	Vikara marihokala madzambola kwa P'ilato makwendani, mumo ngirani mathungana mwanamulume mumwenga Muk'irene aifwaye Simoni. Bai o shikari makimulazimisha autsukule wo musalaba wa Jesu.
40027033	Bai makwenda vivii hatha hat'u haifwaho Gologoth'a, yani Ribeshe ra Kitswa.
40027034	Makimup'a Jesu divai ya kutsanganywa na ut'u wa utsungu sana, ela arihoithatha akikahala kuinwa.

40027036	Gonya makikelesi haho kumurinda.
40027037	Dzulu za cho kitswa cha Jesu haikwa kibao kirichoorwa kosa mariromushithakira. Nacho chere kinaamba vivi: Yuyu Ni Jesu, Muthawali Wa Ayahudi.
40027038	Jesu wasulubiwa hamwenga na aivi airi. Mumwenga mukono wa kurya, na mungine mukono wa kumots'o.
40027039	At'u mariokira na haho arihosulubiwa Jesu, mamusholera, makithukusa vitswa zhao kikav̱udhye,
40027040	makiamba, "Kw'aamba undaribanda ro Hekalu na uriake kwa siku t'ahu vino? H'aya dziokole mwenye be vivi. Chamba u Mwana wa Mulungu jeri, thima kula ho musalabani."
40027041	Na lola o alombi abomu, na alimu a Sheria, na athumia a Kiyahudi nao makimusholera dza vizho zha akizi a ngira. Makiamba, "Waokola at'u angine, ela vino k'adima kudzakola mwenye.
40027042	Samba ni muthawali wa Iziraeli ye, naathime kula ho musalabani, naswi fundamuamini.
40027043	Amba ye were anamukuluhira Mulungu sana; hatha anaamba kukala ni Mwana wa Mulungu. H'aya kala ye Mulungu anamuhendza jeri, be vivi naamwakole."
40027044	Hatha aryahu aivi airi mariosulubiwa hamwenga naye kidza nao mamusholera dza vizho zha o angine.
40027045	Bada ya Jesu kusulubiwa, ts'i yosi yagit'ana kiza kuandzira saa sitha muhadhi saa chenda.
40027046	Inafika mwendo wa saa chenda Jesu akirira kwa sauthi bomu akiamba, "Eloi Eloi, lama sabakithani?" Yani, "Mulungu wangu, Mulungu wangu, mbona udzaniricha?"
40027047	Kusikira vizho, angine kahi za ao at'u mariokala maimire haho makiamba, "Sirikizani, anamwiha Elija benwi!"
40027048	Na haho na haho, mumwenga wao akikot'a malo achendavwika buwa kahi za siki, akiridunga mudhath'ani akimup'a Jesu anyunye.
40027049	Ela andziye makimwamba, "Richa hulole chamba Elija andakudzamuthizha." [Na mumwenga wao akihala fumo akimudunga lubavuni, akimbola milatso na madzi.]
40027050	Bai Jesu akipiga k'ululu kaheri na akitoka roho.
40027051	Na lola yo p'azia kahi za ro Hekalu yapashuka ikigazhika p'ande mbiri, kula dzulu hatha ts'ini. Ts'i ikithethema na mawe gakibandika-bandika.
40027052	Mbira nyinji za at'u a Mulungu zikigunuka na o at'u enye makifufuka,
40027053	na machambola mo mbirani. Na lola Jesu arihofufuka, at'u aa mangira kahi za mudzi mueri wa Jerusalemu na makionewa ni at'u anji enye.
40027054	Bai o shikari mariokala manamurinda Jesu, hamwenga na ye mubomu wao marihoona zho ts'i irizhokala inathethema, hamwenga na go maut'u mangine gosi, mangirwa ni woga sana hatha makiamba, "Yuyu were ni Mwana wa Mulungu jeri."
40027055	Kwere kuna anaache mariomuthuwa Jesu hangu Galilaya. Anaache aa ndo mariokala makimwaviza Jesu na mahitaji ga kwakwe. Bai makala maimire kure vichache kulolera kila kirichokala.
40027056	Kahi zao were hana Maryamu Magidalena, Maryamu mameye Jakobu na Josefu, na mameye Jakobu na Johana, ana a Zebedayo.
40027057	Kurihokala kunakala kidziloni, kukidza mwanamulume mumwenga wa kula Arimath'ea ariyeifwa Josefu. Mwanamulume yuyu were naye ni mwanafundzi wa Jesu na were ni thajiri.
40027058	Bai wakwenda hatha kwa P'ilato achendamuvoya P'ilato amup'e mwiri wa Jesu akauzike. Naye P'ilato akilagiza agerwe.
40027059	Kwa vizho Josefu akiuhala akiulinga-linga ts'andza ya kitani safi,
40027060	na achendauzika kahi za mbiraye mwenye, ariyokala waitsonga iweni. Mbira ii were ni mbisha yenye hatha were k'aidzazikwa mut'u. Bai wamwangiza mumo na akisukuma ro iwe akifunga, gonya akihauka.
40027061	Wakathi uwo Josefu arihokala anamuzika Jesu, Maryamu Magidalena na ye Maryamu mungine were makelesi kulolana na iyo mbira manalolera.

41004001	Siku nyingine Jesu wakwenda kaheri k'anda-k'anda ya ro ziya akikwatya kufundisha. Bai rikundi ribomu ra at'u rikimudzalira hatha akiona ni baha angire dauni akelesi mumo. Naye wakelesi mo dauni kuno o at'u osi makikala ma ko ts'i furufu.
41004002	Na Jesu waafundisha maut'u manji kwa kuhumira mafumbo. Kahi za mafundishoge akiambira,
41004003	"Sirikizani! Mut'u mumwenga wauka kwendamwaga-mwaga mbeyu mundani kwakwe.
41004004	Bai arihokala akuzimwagani-mwagani, mbeyu nyingine ikigwa k'anda-k'anda ya ngira na unyama ukidzait'ot'a.
41004005	Mbeyu nyingine ikigwa kahi za mutsanga wa mawe-mawe, harihokala hana mutsanga muchache. Bai ikimera malo-malo kwa kukala were hana mutsanga muchache.
41004006	Dzuwa ririhokola zhomu yo mitse ikinyala na ikifwa kwa kukala were k'aina miziji mire.
41004007	Mbeyu nyingine ikigwa miyani. Irihomera, miya iryahu ikikula na ikiizia-zia hatha k'aipatire nafasi ya kumbola ndze bule, bai kwa ut'u uwo k'aizhalire kit'u.
41004008	Ela nyingine zikigwa kahi za mutsanga mudzo nazo zikimerat'o, zikikula na zikizhala. Nyingine zazhala mirongo mihahu-mihahu, nyingine zikizhala mirongo mihandahu-mihandahu, na nyingine zikizhala gana-gana."
41004009	Jesu akimarigiza na kuamba, "Mwenye masikiro ga kusikirira, naasikire."
41004010	Badaye Jesu arihokala adzarichana na yo ngororoki ya at'u, aryahu anafundzie kumi na airi na angine kahi za ao mariokala madzagasikira go mafundishoge, mamuza Jesu kwamba mambirwe mana ya go mafumbo.
41004011	Jesu akiambira, "Ninwi mwajaliwa kuimanya yo siri ya uthawali wa Mulungu. Ela o mario ndze ya wo uthawali, manasikira kwa ngira ya mafumbo,
41004012	kwamba malole na kulola, ela masione, masirikize na kusirikiza, ela masing'alirwe. Kwani kala makaona na kung'alirwa makamuuyira Mulungu, naye akaausiza dambi zao."
41004013	Gonya Jesu akiauza akiamba, "Fuambe k'amung'alirwa ni fumbo riri? Bai mundang'alirwadze ni mafumbo mangine?
41004014	Ye mulayi, analaya neno ra Mulungu.
41004015	At'u angine ma here ziryahu mbeyu zirizogwa k'anda-k'anda ya ngira. At'u aa makigonya kusikira neno ra Mulungu, Shethani nikudza mara mwenga na kurusa riro neno ririrolaywa mo mioyoni mwao.
41004016	Ziryahu zirizogwa kahi za mutsanga wa mawe-mawe, ni at'u mario makisikira neno thu, manarihokera kare mara mwenga, kidza manarihokera na raha.
41004017	Ela kwa kukala k'arina miziji ndani mwao k'amatoa naro bule. Thabu hedu mateso gaadziriraho kwa ut'u wa ro neno manaviricha kare.
41004018	Na at'u angine ma here yo mbeyu iriyogwa miyani. Aa ni kusikira ro neno ra Mulungu,
41004019	ela v̱ata za urumwengu, na ukengi wa mali, na th'amaa za maut'u mangine zikiangira, nikurikonya-konya ro neno hatha rikakala k'arindazhala kit'u.
41004020	Ela at'u angine ma dza here iryahu mbeyu iriyogwa kahi za mutsanga mudzo. At'u aa nikurisikira ro neno na kurikubali na kuzhala matunda. Yuno mirongo mihahu, yuya mirongo mihandahu na mungine gana zima."
41004021	Jesu akienderera kufundisha akiamba, "K'akuna mut'u adimaye kugwiza taa gonya akaribiningiza na muvure hedu hatha kurika muvunguni! Nikurika dzulu ya nyambaro.
41004022	Mana kila kiricho hafufu kindambozwa halamu, na kila siri indamanywa.
41004023	Mut'u mwenye masikiro ga kusikirira, naasikire."
41004024	Kidza akiambira, "Sirikizani zhomu na mugagwire gaga nimwambirago. Cho kipimo mupimiracho andziyenu ndicho mundichopimirwa ninwi, kidza hatha mwangezezwe.
41004025	Kwani kila ariye nacho andangezwa, na ariye k'ana kit'u, andahokwa hatha cho aricho nacho."
41004026	Gonya Jesu akiamba, "Uthawali wa Mulungu u dza here viryahu mut'u amwagazho-mwagazho mbeyu mundani.
41004027	Usiku ukifika analala, mutsana anahenda makazige. Muda uu wosi t'embe zinamera na kukula, kuno ye k'amanya vinakuladze.
41004028	Wo mutsanga h'akeye unaihenda yo mimera ikule na kuzhala mazhalo, unambola wo mutse chaho, gonya ro suche, na kusindikiza na zo t'embe.
41004029	Suche rindihouma, mwenye munda ni kudzavuna kwa kukala wakathi wa kwakwe udzafika."
41004030	Kidza Jesu akiamba, "Huambedze kaheri dzulu za kuhalanisha uthawali wa Mulungu? Fuhumire fumbo rani?
41004031	Tha ni here katembe ka haradali kariko nikulaywa. Katembe kaka ni kathithe kukira t'embe zosi haha urumwenguni.
41004032	Bada ya makathi fulani ni kumera na ukakala mumera mubomu kukira mimera yosi ya mundani, kwani ni kwamboza vitai ambazho unyama nikudza na kuaka vitsunji mumo."
41004033	Bai Jesu waafundisha at'u kuhumira mafumbo mangine manji here gaga. Naye waafundisha here wadimi wao wa kung'alirwa urizhokala.
41004034	Jesu k'afundishire at'u bila kuhumira mafumbo, ela wakathi arihokala ana anafundzie were anaang'azira kila kit'u.
41004035	Bai dzulo ra yo siku iyo vizho Jesu akiambira anafundzie, "Nahuvuke ng'ambo."
41004036	Kwa vizho o anafundzi makiaricha o at'u, na makipanda ro dau arirokala Jesu adzapanda na machenda naye. Kidza were kuna madau mangine ga nyuma-nyuma.
41004037	Ela k'avitoere kukidza luv̱utho lwa kitai na maimbi gakipiga ro dau hatha rikikwatya kudzala madzi.
41004038	Wakathi uu Jesu were hatha a ko mwisho wa ro dau, adzaika kitswache muthoni na arere. Bai o anafundzie makimuthukusa makiamba, "Mwalimu, hunahoha, k'ujali we?"
41004039	Bai Jesu akilamuka, akiluchemera lo luv̱utho na akirambira ro ziya, "H'aya hurira!" Na lo luv̱utho lukiricha na go madzi gakihurira hu.
41004040	Gonya Jesu akiauza anafundzie akiamba, "Mbona mu aoga? Hedu k'amuna kuluhiro?"
41004041	Nao makikala manavinwa ni miri k'azhadimikika. Makikwatya kuuzana-uzana na kuamba, "Ni h'ani yuno ariye hatha luv̱utho na maimbi vinamusikira?"
41005001	Jesu na anafundzie makivuka ziya ra Galilaya makifika ts'i ya Agerasi.
41005002	Na arihothima mo dauni thu akithunganana na mut'u ariyekala adzalaa makaburini, naye were ana p'ep'o.
41005003	Mut'u yuyu were siku zosi akala ko makaburini, kidza k'ahana mut'u ariyedima kumufunga hatha kwa minyororo.
41005004	Akwao mere majeza zhomu kumufunga magulu na mikono, ela kila marihomufunga waitosa yo minyororo na zho zhuma marizhomufunga maguluni. Mut'u yuyu were yuna nguvu zhomu hatha were k'ahana amwadimaye.
41005005	Usiku na mutsana wakala akidengereka ko makaburini na ko virimani kuno anapiga londzo na kudzikop'ola vii-vii na mawe ga maso.
41005006	Bai arihomona Jesu kwa kure, achenda malo na akigwa mbereze,
41005007	na akipiga k'ululu akiamba, "Unani nami we Jesu Mwana wa Mulungu ariye dzulu ya zhosi? Bai ninakuvoya kwa dzina ra Mulungu usinitese!"
41005008	Ye p'ep'o wanena vivi kwa kukala Jesu were anaamba, "P'ep'o mukolo mwambole mut'u yuyu!"
41005009	Jesu akimuza akiamba, "Dzinaro ndiwe h'ani?" Ye p'ep'o akiamba, "Dzina rangu ndimi majeshi kwa kukala hu anji mumu!"
41005010	Akimudhedheja zhomu ye Jesu kwamba asiainge kwenda ndze ya yo ts'i ya Agerasi.
41005011	Vikara haho were hana badhi bomu ra nguluwe rinarisa k'anda-k'anda ya karima.
41005012	O p'ep'o makimuvoya Jesu makiamba, "Fwambe fwende hukaangire aryahu nguluwe."
41005013	Jesu akiaruhusu na o p'ep'o akolo makimwambola ye mwanamulume na machendaangira o nguluwe. Ro badhi ra nguluwe here alifu mbiri rikitharamuka malo kula ko ngokani rikivoromoka mo ziyani rikihoha.
41005014	Kuona vizho, o arisa makichimbira na machenda ko midzini na mindani machendasema go garigokala gadzahendeka. Na at'u duu makidzalola.
41005015	Makidza ho arihokala Jesu, na makimona ye ariyekala ana p'ep'o anji akilize ni ndzima na were adzavala nguwo na akelesi haho, na makingirwa ni woga.
41005016	Aryahu mariokala madzazhona zho virizhokala vidzahendeka, makiambira o at'u zho virizhokala vidzakala kwa ye mut'u na kwa o nguluwe.
41005017	Na o at'u marihosikira vizho makimuvoya Jesu akulae kuko kwao.
41005018	Vikara Jesu arihokala anangira mo dauni, ye mut'u ariyembozwa p'ep'o wavoya ende na Jesu.
41005019	Ela Jesu akimukahaza, akimwamba, "Enda kwenu ukaambirize asenao go adzigokuhendera Bwana, na viryahu adzizhokuonera mbazi."
41005020	Kwa vizho ye mwanamulume akiuka, achangira kahi za ro jimbo ra Midzi Kumi, na akiambira at'u garyahu arigokala adzahenderwa ni Jesu. Osi mariosikira uv̱oro uu machangalala.
41005021	Jesu akivuka kaheri ro ziya muhaka ko nyangamoni. Na ngororoki bomu ya at'u ikidza ho k'anda-k'anda ya ro ziya na makikala madzamuzunguluka.
41005022	Mut'u mumwenga aifwaye Jairo ariyekala ni mumwenga kahi za abomu a masinagogi akidza haho. Arihomona Jesu wagwa mbereze,
41005023	na akimuvoya akiamba, "Musichana wangu akufwani. Bai vichadimikika nafwende ukamwikire mikono apate kuthia."
41005024	Jesu akiuka kumuthuwa ye Jairo, na at'u anji makimuthuwa ko arikokala anenda. At'u aa were ni anji hatha angine were manamukwala-kwala kamare.
41005025	Bai mo kahi ya yo ngororoki ya o at'u mwere muna mwanamuche mumwenga ariyekala adzakala mukongo wa kumbola milatso, kwa miaka kumi na miri.
41005026	Wathapathapa kwa aganga kuzikifwa vivii hatha vikishinda. Hatha were malize zosi wazigonya kwa kuzikifwa, ela hat'u ha ahende kabaha, ye akikala tha anakazizwa.
41005027	-
41005029	Vikara mwanamuche yuyu were wasikira nguma ya Jesu, bai wamuthuwa Jesu ko nyuma, kuno ananena kimoyo-moyo na kuamba, "Nikigut'a ngaa ro valore thu, nindahola." Kwa vizho akirigut'a ro valo ra Jesu na yo milatso ikithuma kare saa iyo na akidzisikira adzahola.
41005030	Haho henye Jesu akisikira nguvuze zidzamuhungukira. Akiahundukira o at'u na akiauza akiamba, "Ni h'ani adziyegut'a valo rangu?"
41005031	O anafundzie makimudzigidzya makiamba, "Unauza ni h'ani adzekugut'a, k'uona bule zho marizho at'u ni anji hatha manakukwala-kwala?"
41005032	Ela Jesu k'aadzigidzire akienderera kutsuha matso kuno na kuno aone ni h'ani adzevihenda.
41005033	Ye mwanamuche kuona zho vidzizhokala achenda mbere za Jesu kuno anathethemwa ni mwiri kwa woga na akidzigwaga mbereze na akimwambira Jesu gosi garigo were gadzahendeka.
41005034	Jesu akimwamba, "Mwanangu kuluhiro ra kwako ridzakuhoza. Enda na dheri ukale muzima na mashakago gadzagoma."
41005035	Bai Jesu arihokala ananena gaga, poo at'u kula nyumbani kwa Jairo, makimwamba Jairo, "Ye musichanao be adzamarigizika, kwa vizho k'avimala umubudzye kaheri ye mwalimu."
41005036	Jesu hatha k'agatiire shuhuli go maronena o at'u, ela wamwamba Jairo, "Tha usogohe bewe, kuluhira thuwe."
41005037	Bai arihokala anenda kuko kwa Jairo, akiakahaza at'u masimuthuwe asihokala P'et'ero, Jakobu na Johana nduguye ye Jakobu.
41005038	Marihofika nyumbani kwa Jairo, makwendathekeza ha thele at'u mariokala manapiga k'ululu na kurira zhomu zhenye.
41005039	Jesu achangira mo ndani, akiambira o at'u, "Mbona munapiga k'ululu na kurira? Ye muhoho k'afwere bule, arere thu."
41005040	O at'u kusikira vizho makimutseka. Bai Jesu akiambira o at'u osi mambole ko ndze, akiahala o azhazi a ye muhoho na o anafundzie ahahu na achenda mo chumbani arimokala ye muhoho.
41005041	Jesu akimugwira mukono ye muhoho akimwamba, "Talitha Koum." Ambazho manaye ni, "Musichana, nakwambira uka!"
41005042	Haho henye ye musichana arekala adzafwa akiungarara na akikwatya kunenda (iye were ni muhoho wa miaka kumi na miri). Bai o at'u marihoona zho vidzizhokala, machangalala zhomu.
41005043	Bai Jesu akiakokot'era zhomu, masimwambire mut'u. Gonya akiambira mamup'e ut'u wa kurya.
41006001	Jesu akiuka kuuya mudzi wa kwao Nazareth'i iye hamwenga na anafundzie.
41006002	Na irihofika siku ya Sabato, achangira sinagogini kufundisha. Anji mariomusikira mangalazwa ni go mafundisho hatha makikwatya kuuzana-uzana, "Maut'u gano gosi be tha wagapatahi? Na ni ulachu wani arougerwa mut'u yuno? Ni miujiza yani ariyothalwa aihende yuno?
41006003	Vidze yuno si yuyahu fundhi wa kutsonga, mwana wa Maryamu? Na samba nduguze ni Jakobu, Jose, Juda na Simoni? Na nduguze a kiche samba fu hosi haha hehu?" Bai k'aviafahire.
41006004	Ela Jesu akiambira, "Nabii anaishimiwa kila hat'u isihokala kahi za ts'i ya kwao, na kahi za amanyie, na mudzini kwao."
41006005	Na kuko bai k'ahendere miujiza yoyosi, isihokala waaikira mikono at'u achache mariokala ni akongo na akiahoza.
41006006	Jesu achangalazwa zhomu ni kutsakuluhira kwao. Gonya akidengereka mo midzi-midzi kufundisha.
41006007	Siku mwenga Jesu waaiha aryahu anafundzi kumi na airi na akiahuma airi-airi. Akiap'a wadimi dzulu za p'ep'o akolo.
41006008	Akiambira masitsukule kit'u chochosi mo charoni, isihokala mudhath'a thu h'akeye. Masitsukule leu, hedu mukoba, hedu hatha p'esa zozosi mabindoni mwao.
41006009	Masivale k'andzu mbiri, ela mavale sapata.
41006010	"Hat'u mundihoambwa 'Karibuni' h'aya kalani kahi za nyumba iyo hatha mundihouka kut'u kuko.
41006011	Mwangiraho mudzini na o at'u masimwambe hatha 'Karibuni' hedu kumusirikiza bai hat'u haho haukeni kidza mukut'e-kut'e vumbi ra maguluni mwenu kunyesa kukala go gandigoapata k'amumo na mandamanya enye."
41006012	Kwa vizho o anafundzi makiuka kwendahubiri na kuambira at'u mariche mahendo gao mai na mathubu.
41006013	Nao makwendamboza at'u p'ep'o anji na makiamwagira mafuha akongo anji na makiahoza.
41006014	Bai muthawali Herode akigasikira gosi gaga kwani dzina ra Jesu were ridzaenera kila hat'u hatha at'u angine were manaamba ni, "Johana Mubat'izaji, wafufuka, ndo hatha ana wadimi wa kuhenda maut'u mabomu-mabomu."
41006015	Angine o makikala manaamba, "Ni Elija" na angine makiamba, "Ni nabii dza here mumwenga wa o manabii a ho kapindi."
41006016	Ela Herode arihosikira vivi akiamba, "Iye ni Johana Mubat'izaji niriyemutosa kitswa, wafufuka!"
41006017	Kwani Herode were walagiza kukala Johana afungwe minyororo na angizwe jela. Vivi wavihenda kwa ut'u wa Herodia mwanamuche ariyekala Herode wamuhoka nduguye ariyekala anaifwa Filipu.
41006018	Kwani Johana Mubat'izaji wakala akimwambira Herode kukala, "Si hachi bule uwe kumuhala mukaza nduguyo."
41006019	Vivi zhamuhendya Herodia akale na kitsukizi na akimala amwalage, ela k'azhadimire bule.
41006020	Kwani Herode wamwagoha Johana kwa kukala Johana were ni mut'u muhachi na mweri, kwa vizho akimurinda. Were kila arihomusirikiza anabudzyika moyo, ela hatha hamwenga na vizho were anahendza kusirikiza mafundishoge.
41006021	Mwishowe, Herodia wapata mwanya wa kumwalaga Johana. Herode waasunga asenae sherehe ya siku ya kukumbukira kuzhalwakwe. Bai mut'u iye waalika at'u osi a zheo uthawalini, abomu a majeshi na abomu a yo ts'i ya Galilaya.
41006022	Ndo musichana wa Herodia akidzaavinira. Bai wavinat'o zhomu hatha Herode na ajenie makifwahirwa. K'uzhona zho muthawali Herode akimwamba ye musichana, "Nambira chochosi uhendzacho nami nindakup'a."
41006023	Akimulahira akimwamba, "Chochosi undichomala nindakup'a, hatha kala ni nusu ya uthawali wangu."
41006024	Ndo ye musichana akiuka kwendamuza mameye. Akiamba, "Nimale ut'u wani m'ama?" Ye mimut'u akimwamba, "Mala kitswa cha Johana Mubat'izaji."
41006025	Ye musichana akiuya malo ko kwa muthawali achendamwamba, "Nahendza vivi kare unip'e kitswa cha Johana Mubat'izaji ndani za bunguu."
41006026	Kudzasikira vivi, Herode washononeka zhomu, ela kwa were adzalaha mbere za ajeni kukala kila andichomalwa andalazha k'adimire kumukahaza bule.
41006027	Kwa vizho bai akilagiza shikari mara mwenga achenda ko jela akakirehe cho kitswa cha Johana. Ye shikari achenda ko jela achendamutosa kitswa Johana,
41006028	akidza nacho ndani za bunguu, akidzamup'a ye musichana na ye musichana akikihala akimup'a ye mameye.
41006029	Badaye anafundzi a Johana marihosikira gaga makidzamuhala machendamuzika.
41006030	Vikara o ahumwi a Jesu makiuya kula charo chao cha kuhubiri nao makidzamwambira viryahu marizhohubiri na marizhohenda.
41006031	Kwa ut'u wa at'u anji, ano manadza arya manauya, Jesu na anafundzie k'amadimire kurya. Bai Jesu akiambira o anafundzie, "Nahumbole-mbole vichache hedu fwende kut'u kwa h'akiyehu hukapate ngaa kudzioyeza."
41006032	Kwa vizho machangira dauni ao kare na makiuka kwenda hat'u ha h'akiyao, kure na at'u.
41006033	Ela hatha hamwenga na vizho at'u anji maaona marihokala makuukani na makiamanya. Ndo makiuka malo kula midzi yosi kwenda ko arikokala Jesu na anafundzie manenda, nao makifika na mbere.
41006034	K'uzhona Jesu arihothima kula mo dauni akirona ro kundi bomu ra at'u, naye akiaonera mbazi kwa viryahu marizhokala ni here ng'ondzi zisizo na murisa. Bai akikwatya kuafundisha maut'u manji.
41006035	Mutsana urihokala udzaenderera zhomu nako kunenda kutswani, o anafundzi makimwamba Jesu, "Hat'u haha be ni nyika zhomu nako kunatswa.
41006036	Kwa vizho baha uafumule aa at'u mende kahi za midzi na minda iriyo hehi na haha makadzigulire ut'u wowosi wa kurya."
41006037	Naye Jesu arihombola kudzigidzya akiamba, "Ap'eni chakurya ninwi." Ndo o anafundzie makimudzigidzya makimwamba, "Vidze unahendza hukagule mikahe ya kima cha dinari magana mairi at'u ano mathosheke kurya?"
41006038	Jesu akiauza akiamba, "Kwani vino muna mikahe mingahi? Hedu kaloleni," machendalola na marihogonya kulola makimwambira, "Ni mitsano na makumba mairi."
41006039	Bai Jesu akiambira o anafundzie, "Ambireni o at'u madzigazhe vithundhu-vithundhu na makelesi ho nyasini."
41006040	Kwa vizho o at'u makikelesi, vithundhu-vithundhu zha at'u gana-gana na zha at'u mirongo mitsano-mitsano.
41006041	Gonya akihala yo mikahe mitsano na go makumba mairi, akilola dzulu mulunguni, akimboza muv̱era kwa Mulungu, gonya akiimogola-mogola yo mikahe na akiap'a o anafundzie maagazhire o at'u na go makumba mairi.
41006042	Nao osi makirya hatha makivilola.
41006043	Bai marihogonya kurya o anafundzi makitsola-tsola zho visiku-visiku zha mikahe na zha go makumba mairi virizhokala vidzasala, na makidzaza k'ahu kumi na mbiri.
41006044	Na isabu ya ao mariokala madzarya yo mikahe were ni at'u alifu ts'ano, alume.
41006045	Bai o at'u marihogonya kurya thu, Jesu waalagiza o anafundzie mangire dauni na mavuke mathangulie kwenda Beth'isaida, kuno ye anaafumula o at'u.
41006046	Arihogonya kulagana na o at'u, wakwenda murimani kwendavoya.
41006047	Dzulo ririhongira, dau rere ri kahikahi ya ro ziya, ela Jesu were achere ko ts'i furufu h'akeye.
41006048	Arihokala a kuko, akiaona o anafundzie manathabika kupiga makasia kwani lupeho lwere lunambola ko mendako. Bai urihofika wakathi wa jogolo ra kwandza kuika, akiambolera kuno ananenda dzulu za madzi. Akidzihendesha here anaakira.
41006049	Ela o anafundzi marihomona ananenda dzulu ya madzi, makiona ni p'ep'o be o, makipiga k'ululu.
41006050	Kwani osi mamona, na makihondoka. Jesu akinena nao mara mwenga akiamba, "Sogoheni ndimi, musihondoke."
41006051	Gonya achangira mo dauni na lo luv̱utho lukihurira hu! O anafundzi makingalala kamare,
41006052	kwa kukala hatha bada ya kuona wo muujiza wa mikahe kidza were k'amadzangwe kung'alirwat'o bule kwani zo akili zao zere zidzaziywa.
41006053	Bai Jesu na anafundzie makivuka ro ziya na makifika ts'i ya Genezarethi makirifunga kuko ro dau.

41010004	Makiamba, "Musa walazha ruhusa mut'u aore cheti cha kurichana gonya umuriche."
41010005	Jesu akiamba, "Musa wamuorera malagizo gaga kwa kukala mu at'u a singo nyomu.
41010006	Ela hangu chaho cha kuumbwa urumwengu, 'Mulungu waaumba muche na mulume.'
41010007	Kwa ut'u uu mut'u andamuricha babaye na mameye agwirane na muchewe,
41010008	na ao airi mandakala mwiri mumwenga. Bai madzauya si airi kaheri, ni mwiri mumwenga.
41010009	Kwa vizho adzichokigwizanya Mulungu, mudamu asikitose bule."
41010010	Badaye marihongira nyumbani kaheri, o anafundzie mamuza Jesu dzulu za ut'u uu kaheri.
41010011	Jesu akiambira, "Mut'u amurichaye muchewe na kuhala muche mungine nikukala anazinga.
41010012	Na muche amurichaye mulumewe na kuhalwa ni mulume mungine nikukala anazinga."
41010013	Gonya at'u mere manamurehera Jesu ahoho athithe aagut'e, ela o anafundzi makiadumulira o at'u.
41010014	Jesu arihoona viryahu, akitsukirwa akiamba, "Aricheni ahoho athithe madze kwangu, musiakahaze bule, kwani uthawali wa Mulungu ni wa at'u dza vizho aa.
41010015	Namwambira ujeri wenye, mut'u ariye k'andauhokera uthawali wa Mulungu dza here muhoho muthithe, k'andawangira ng'o."
41010016	Gonya Jesu akiahala o ahoho akianula, akiaikira mikonoye akiahasa.
41010017	Badaye Jesu arihouka kwenda mo ngirani, mut'u mumwenga akidza malo, akimupigira mavindi akimuza akiamba, "Mwalimu mudzo, nihendedze hatha nipate uzima wa kare na kare?"
41010018	Jesu akimwamba, "Kwanoni unaniha mudzo? K'akuna mudzo, asihokala Mulungu h'akeye.
41010019	Uwe unamanya malagizo ga Mulungu: Usalage, usizinge, usiiye, usimboze ushahidhi wa ulongo, usikenge, aishimu babayo na mameyo."
41010020	Ye mut'u kusikira vivi akiamba, "Mwalimu, gaga gosi nagagwira hangu nichere muhoho."

41010022	Ye mut'u kudzasikira vizho, uso gii, akihauka k'ana raha mana were ana mali nyinji zhomu.
41010023	Jesu akitsuha matso kuno na kuno, akiambira o anafundzie, "Vindakala vikomu kwa mashaha kwangira uthawali wa Mulungu."
41010024	O anafundzi makingalala zhomu marihosikira maneno gago. Jesu akienderera kuamba, "Anangu ni vikomu zhomu kwa ao makuluhirao ushaha kwangira kahi za uthawali wa Mulungu.
41010025	Ni rahisi ngamira kukira kahi za t'undu ya shindano, kuriko shaha kwangira kahi za uthawali wa Mulungu."
41010026	Kusikira vizho, o anafundzi makingalala zhomu, makimwamba, "Hatha ni h'ani adimaye kuokoka be zho?"
41010027	Jesu akialola gonya akiamba, "Kwa nguvu za mudamu k'azhadimikika, ela si kwa Mulungu bule, mana kwa Mulungu kila kit'u kinadimikika."
41010028	Ndo P'et'ero akimwamba Jesu, "Lola, fwaricha zhosi fukikuthuwa uwe."
41010029	Jesu akiamba, "Namwambira ujeri, k'akuna mut'u ariyericha nyumbaye, nduguze, babaye, mameye, anae hedu minda kwa ut'u wangu mimi na kwa ut'u wa Uv̱oro Udzo,
41010030	ariye k'andarifwa kahi za wakathi uu kare. Andapata mara gana ya vit'uzhe zhosi: nyumba, ndugu, mameze, ana, minda hamwenga na mateso nago. Na kidza andapata uzima wa kare na kare kahi za urumwengu udzawo.
41010031	Ela anji mario vivi ni a kwandza, mandakala a mwisho, na a mwisho, mandakala a kwandza."
41010032	Vikara makikala ma ngirani manenda Jerusalemu. Jesu were nde ariye mbere na o anafundzie makingalala, na ao at'u mariokala nyuma zao were mathele woga. Jesu akiavuha k'anda kaheri o anafundzi kumi na airi na akiathalira garyahu maut'u gandigomupata.
41010033	Akiamba, "Lolani, vivi hunenda Jerusalemu. Na kuko Mwana wa Mudamu andalazhwa kwa alombi abomu na alimu a Sheria. Ao mandamuhukumu kwalagwa na mamulazhe kwa at'u mario si Ayahudi.
41010034	Mandamusholera mamutsuhire mahe, mamupige na mamwalage, ela bada ya siku t'ahu andafufuka."
41010035	Jakobu na Johana ana a Zebedayo makimwenderera Jesu, makimwamba, "Mwalimu, huna ut'u humalao uhuhendere."
41010036	Jesu akiauza akiamba, "Munamala nimuhendereni?"
41010037	Makimwamba, "Hunamala haho kala udzire kahi za ngumayo, uhuruhusu mumwenga wehu akeresi mukonowo wa kurya na mungine akeresi mukonowo wa kumots'o."
41010038	Jesu akiambira, "Ninwi be tha k'amukimanya bule cho mukivoyacho. Vidze cho kikombe ninwacho munadima kukinwa nwi? Hedu munadima kubat'izwa na wo ubat'izo nibat'izirwao?"
41010039	O ana a Zebedayo makiamba, "Ee hunadima." Jesu akiambira, "Cho kikombe ninwacho nanwi mundakinwa, na wo ubat'izo nibat'izirwao nanwi mundabat'izwa na uwo.
41010040	Ela kukeresi mukono wangu wa kurya hedu mukono wa kumots'o, sina wadimi nazho bule. Kwani kuko Baba wakutengezera at'ue, na ao ndo mandiokala kuko."

41010042	Ela Jesu akiaiha, akiambira, "Munamanya kukala ao mav̱iryao kuathawala at'u mario si Ayahudi manahendza kuthawala at'u ao na ukali munji. Na aryahu abomu mario ts'ini zao nao, manahendza kuhumira wadimi wao wosi kuatumisha o at'u.
41010043	Ela ninwi musikale vizho bule. Iye ahendzaye kukala mubomu be suthi akale muhumiki wenu.
41010044	Na kila ahendzaye kukala kitswa kahi zenu suthi akale mutumwa wa osi.
