41010046	Badaye Jesu na anafundzie makwenda mudzi wa Jeriko. Bai arihokala anambola Jeriko na anafundzie hamwenga na kundi bomu ra at'u, haho k'anda-k'anda za ngira, were hakelesi kipofu mumwenga ariyekala kaziye ni kuvoya-voya. Kipofu yuyu were anaifwa Bat'imayo, yani mwana wa T'imayo.
41010047	Arihosikira kukala ni Jesu wa Nazareth'i nde ariyekala anakira, wakwatya kuluta mumiro akiamba, "Jesu mwana wa Daudi, nionera mbazi!"
41010048	Na at'u anji makimudumulira makimwamba anyamale, ela ye tha akikaza kuluta mumiro akiamba, "Mwana wa Daudi, nionera mbazi!"
41010049	Jesu akiima akiamba, "Hedu mwiheni hano." Bai makimwiha ye kipofu makiamba, "Sikale moga uka, anakwiha."
41010050	Akiritsuha ro ambare, akiuka haraka, akimwendera Jesu.
41010051	Jesu akimuza akiamba, "Vidze unamala nikuhendereni?" Ye kipofu akidzigidzya akiamba, "Bwana, namala nione!"
41010052	Jesu akimwamba, "Enda, kuluhiroro ridzakuhoza." Na haho henye, akikwacha kuona na akimuthuwa Jesu mo ngirani.
41011001	Na marihokala hehi na Jerusalemu makiona kwa kure Beth'ifage na Beth'ania, kahi za Murima wa Mizeituni, ndo akiahuma anafundzie airi
41011002	akiambira, "Endani hatha mwangire ko kadzidzi mudzikoerekezana nako. Mukikala munangira thu, mundaona mwana wa ndzowe ariye k'adzapandwa ni mut'u adzafungwa. Muvuguleni mumurehe.
41011003	Mut'u yoyosi akimuza, 'Kwanoni munahendazho?' mwambeni, 'Bwana ana haja naye, na andamudzya kare.' "
41011004	Kwa vizho machenda na machendaona mwana wa ndzowe adzafungwa ndze ya mulomo wa nyumba ho ngirani. Makimuvugula.
41011005	O at'u mariokala haho makiauza makiamba, "Mbona munamuvugula ye mwana wa ndzowe kaheri?"
41011006	O anafundzie makiambira zho arizhokala adzaalagiza Jesu, na o at'u makiarichira machenda.
41011007	Bai machenda naye ye mwana wa ndzowe hatha kwa Jesu, makihandika maamba gao mongoni mwakwe na Jesu akikelesi dzuluze.
41011008	At'u anji makihandika maamba gao mo ngirani, angine o makitandaza viv̱ungo marizhovitosa mo mindani.
41011009	Na at'u mariokala ma mbere, na ao mariokala nyuma zao mapiga k'ululu makiamba, "Hosana! Naalikwe iye adzaye kwa dzina ra Bwana!
41011010	Nauhaswe wo uthawali udzawo wa mukare wehu Daudi. Hosana kwakwe iye ariye dzulu!"
41011011	Bai Jesu achangira Jerusalemu na achenda kahi za ro Hekalu, akimulolat'o sana mo ndani, ela kwa kukala dzuwa were rinenda kutswani, akihambola haho na achenda Beth'ania hamwenga na o anafundzie kumi na airi.

41011016	k'amuruhusire mut'u hatha mumwenga kutsukula kit'u chochosi kukirira wo muhala wa ro Hekalu.
41011017	Gonya akikwatya kuafundisha akiamba, "Zhaorwa kukala, 'Nyumba yangu indaifwa nyumba ya mavoyo kwa at'u osi!' Ela ninwi mudzaihendya p'anga ya kuzama aivi."
41011018	Bai o alombi abomu na alimu a Sheria makivisikira na makikwatya kumala ngira ya kumwalagira, kwani mamwagoha kwa kukala kundi rosi ra at'u rere rinangalazwa ni mafundishoge.
41011019	Kurihokala kunatswa Jesu na anafundzie makiwombola wo mudzi wa Jerusalemu.

41011023	Namwambira ujeri, mut'u andewambira murima uu, 'Ng'oka na ukagwe baharini,' na kala k'andaamba, 'Ela vindakala?' moyoni mwakwe, ela akuluhire kukala zho adzizhoamba vindakala, be andahenderwa jeri.
41011024	Kwa vizho namwambira, kila mundichokivoya, kuluhirani kukala mudzakihokera, nanwi mundakipata.
41011025	Nanwi kila muimaho kuvoya, na kumbe muna neno na mut'u, musameheni, kwamba na Babiyenu ariye mulunguni apate kumusamehe makosa genu. [
41011026	Ela musihosamehe, ye Babiyenu ariye mulunguni naye k'andamusamehe makosa genu."]

41011030	Vidze wo wadimi ariohumira Johana Mubat'izaji kubat'izira at'u, wala kwa Mulungu hedu wala kwa anadamu? Nidzigidzyani."

41011032	Na hukiamba, 'Wala kwa anadamu,' be fu hatharini, kwani at'u osi mandahutsukirirwa." (Manena vivi kwa kukala were ni aoga na at'u, kwa kukala o at'u osi mamona Johana kukala ni nabii jeri.)
41011033	Kwa vizho makimwamba Jesu, "K'ahumanya." Jesu naye akiamba, "Hatha mimi nami sindamwambira wo wadimi nihumirao kuhendera maut'u gaga."
41012001	Gonya Jesu akikwatya kunena nao na mafumbo akiamba, "Kwere kuna mut'u mumwenga ariyerima mundawe akiulaya mizabibu, akiudengelezera wiyo, akitsimba wina wa kukamulira zabibu, kidza akiaka uringo wa kurindira. Kugonya vizho, wo munda akiukodishira ak'urima, ye mwenye achenda ts'i nyingine.
41012002	Makathi ga mavuno garihofika akihuma muhumikiwe ende kwa aryahu ak'urima, akagerwe fungu ra zo zabibu.
41012003	Ye muhumiki arihofika, o ak'urima makimuhala makimupiga, gonya makimuja kihuhu.
41012004	Kuona vizho, ye mut'u akihuma muhumiki mungine. Iye naye makimwangiza ranga ra kitswa na makimuhendera makuruhu.
41012005	Akihuma mungine, na o ak'urima makihenda kumwalaga kamare, na angine anji mariohumwa mapigwa na angine makilagwa.
41012006	"Vikara ariyekala asere wa kumuhuma were ni mumwenga thu. Naye were ni mwanawe mwenye amuhendzaye. Bai akimuhuma akale wa mwisho, akiamba kimoyo-moyo, 'Bila shaka mandamuishimu.'
41012007	"Ela o ak'urima marihomona ye mwana, makiambirana, 'Yuno be hatha se andiyeuhala ufwa uno munda? Alume nahumwalage yuyu, na uu munda undakala wehu.'
41012008	Bai makimugwavukira makimwalaga, gonya makimwamboza ndze ya wo munda.
41012009	"Vidze munaona ye mwenye munda andahendadze?" Jesu akienderera kuamba, "Ye mwenye munda andakudzaalaga o ak'urima na wo munda aap'e at'u angine.
41012010	Vidze k'amudzagashoma gano Maoro gaambago, 'Ro iwe ririrokahalwa ni aaki vivi be ridzagaluka ndo iwe bomu ra p'embeni.
41012011	Ut'u uwo wahendwa ni Bwana, Na fukiulola unafwangalaza?' "
41012012	Marihosikira vizho o athumia a Kiyahudi makijeza kumugwira Jesu, kwani mamanya kukala ro fumbo ridzanenwa kwao ao, ela makigoha wo muthunganano wa o at'u. Kwa vizho makimuricha makihauka.
41012013	Ndo gonya makiahuma angine kahi za o Mafarisayo na at'u a Herode, mende makamuhege na maswali.
41012014	Hatha marihofika makimwamba, "Mwalimu, hunamanya kukala uwe u mujeri. K'ugoha mut'u yoyosi hatha kala ana cheo chani, mana k'ulola at'u kwa uso. Unafundisha ngira ya Mulungu jeri. Bai fwambire. Kuriha kodi kwa Kaisari ni karakara hedu si karakara?"
41012015	Jesu akikumanya kare ko kudzihendya kwao, akiamba, "Kwanoni munanijeza? Nip'ani yo p'esa hedu niilole."

41012017	Jesu akiambira, "H'aya bai, zha Kaisari mup'eni Kaisari mwenye, na zha Mulungu nazho mup'eni Mulungu." Nao machangalazwa zhomu ni zho arizhodzigidzya.

41012019	"Mwalimu, Musa wafuorera kukala, mut'u akifwererwa ni nduguye, na akisiya muche ela asisiye ahoho, ye nduguye mut'u ni amuhale ufwa ili amuzhalire ahoho ye mufwadzi.
41012020	Vikara kwere kuna ndugu afungahe, ye mukulu wao akihala muche, ela akifwa bila kuzhala naye.
41012021	Ye wa hiri akimuhala, naye akifwa bila kusiya ahoho, na wa hahu naye dzazho.
41012022	Osi afungahe makigoma kufwa bila kusiya ahoho. Mwisho ye muche naye akiathuwa.
41012023	Vidze makathi at'u mandihofufuka, andakala mukaza h'ani? Kwani o ndugu osi afungahe mamuhala."
41012024	Jesu akidzigidzya akiamba, "Ndo sababu munahenda makosa, kwa kukala k'amumanya Maoro, kidza k'amumanya nguvu za Mulungu zirizho.

41012026	Bai dzulu za at'u kufufuka, naamba, k'amudzashoma kahi za chuwo cha Musa dzulu za kitsakuzi kirichokala kinaaka na viryahu Mulungu arizhonena na Musa akiamba, 'Ndimi Mulungu wa Burahemu, na Isaka, na Jakobu'?
41012027	Vivi vinanyesa kukala Mulungu ni Mulungu wa at'u mario moyo si wa at'u mariofwa. Ninwi Masadukayo munakosa sana."
41012028	Bai mumwenga wa aryahu a alimu a Sheria were a haho na akisikira zho marizho were manauza-uza na akimanya kamare kukala Jesu adzadzigidzyat'o. Kwa vizho naye akimuza rakwe akiamba, "Amuri ya kwandza ya zosi ni hiyo?"
41012029	Jesu akimudzigidzya akiamba, "Bomu ni ii iambayo, 'Sirikizani h'enwi Aiziraeli, Bwana wehu Mulungu ni mumwenga na nde Bwana h'akeye.
41012030	Muhendze Bwana Mulunguo na moyowo wosi, na rohoro rosi, na akilizo zosi, na nguvuzo zosi.'
41012031	Amuri ya hiri ni ii, 'Muhendze mwandziyo here udzihendzazho mwenye.' K'akuna amuri bomu kukira zizi mbiri."

41012033	Na mut'u ni amuhendze na moyowe wosi na akilize zosi na nguvuze zosi na aahendze andziye dza zho adzihendzazho mwenye. Kugwira malagizo gaga kudzakira kumboza sadaka za kuocha na nyingine-nyingine."

41012036	Daudi mwenye kahi za nguvu za Roho Mweri waamba, 'Bwana Mulungu wamwamba Bwana wangu, "Kelesi mukono wangu wa kurya, muhaka mahadhuio niathambaraze kamare ts'ini za magulugo." '
41012037	Vikikala Daudi mwenye amwiha 'Bwana,' anadimadze kukala mwanawe?" Bai wo muthunganano mubomu ukimusirikiza na raha zhomu.

41012039	na kidza manahendza kugerwa vihi zha mbere kahi za masinagogi na kahi za sherehe.
41012040	Kidza ao nikuahoka ache magungu vit'u zhao, na kudzihendesha kukala ni adzo kwa kuvoya mavoyo mare-mare. Adhabu yao indakala k'ali zaidhi."
41012041	Gonya Jesu achenda kahi za ro Hekalu na achendakelesi hehi na cho kiya cha kwangizira sadaka na akilolera viryahu at'u magwagazho p'esa. Vikara akiona mashaha managwaga nyinji-nyinji.
41012042	Na hakidza mwanamuche ariye were ni gungu kidza mukiya na akigwaga vipeni viri.

41013001	Bai arihokala anambola kula kahi za ro Hekalu, hakimbola mumwenga wa o anafundzie akiamba, "Mwalimu, lola zho garizho madzo go mawe ga ro Hekalu! Lola wo mujengo nawo!"
41013002	Jesu akidzigidzya akiamba, "Munagaona gano majengo mabomu gosi? Be namwambira ujeri wenye k'ahana iwe hatha mwenga rindirosala dzulu za mwandziwe, kila kit'u kinadzabandwa-bandwa."
41013003	Bai Jesu arihombola haho wakwendakelesi kahi za Murima wa Mizeituni uriwo unalolana na ro Hekalu, hakidza P'et'ero, Jakobu, Johana na Anderea, makimuza kinjama makiamba,
41013004	"Maut'u gano gandahendeka rini? Vidze ni muv̱ano wani undiwonyesa kukala makathi gadzafika ga maut'u gaga kuhendeka?"
41013005	Jesu akiambira, "Dzimanyirireni hasidze mut'u akamukenga.
41013006	Kwani at'u anji mandakudza kwa dzina rangu, na mandadziamba kukala ao ndo ye Masihi na mandakenga at'u anji.
41013007	Na mundasikira uv̱oro wa viha vihefwazho hehi na vingine mundahenda kuvisikira uvumi, ela sogoheni, kwani ni hatha gakale gago, ela wo mwisho wa urumwengu undakala uchere mbere.
41013008	Kabila rindauka kwendapigana na kabila ringine. Uthawali undapigana na uthawali mungine. Ts'i indathethema hat'u-hat'u na kundakala na ndzala. Ela gago gosi gandakala ni mwandzo wa utsungu thu.
41013009	"Nanwi dzimanyirireni kwani at'u mandamugwira mamuhirike manenoni. Mandamupiga kahi za masinagogi na mundaima mbere za maluwali na athawali kwa ut'u wa dzina rangu, na mwamboze ushahidhi mbere zao.
41013010	Nawo Uv̱oro Udzo suthi kwandza wambirizwe at'u osi a kila samupuli kabila wo mwisho k'audzafika.
41013011	Na mandihomugwira kwenda nanwi manenoni, musikale na wasiwasi dzulu za zho mundizhoadzigidzya, ela nenani gago mundigogerwa. Kwa kukala gago mundigoadzigidzya gandakala si genu, ela ni ga Roho Mweri.
41013012	"Mut'u andamulazha nduguye mwenye hedu mwanawe mwenye alagwe. Ana nao mandaagalukira azhazi ao enye, maalazhe malagwe.
41013013	Nanwi mundamenwa ni at'u osi kwa ut'u wa dzina rangu. Ela andiyevumirira hatha mwisho andaokoka.
41013014	"Mundaona kit'u cha kutsukiza na cha kwanonga kiimire hat'u ambaho k'akiv̱irya kuima. (H'ewe mushomi, shomat'o ung'alirwe.) Bai mundihoona vizho, at'u osi mandiokala Judea namachimbirire ko mirimani.
41013015	Mut'u andiyekala a dzulu za nyumba ya kwakwe asiuye mo nyumbani kwendahala kit'u chochosi.
41013016	Mut'u andiyekala a mundani asiuye mudzini kwendahala valore.
41013017	Wakathi uwo vindakala vii-vii zaidhi kwa ano m'ama mandiokala mana mimba na mandiokala manaamwisa.
41013018	Bai voyani kwamba gaga gasihendeke makathi ga p'eho.
41013019	Kwani wakathi uwo kundakala na mateso mabomu garigo k'agadzaonewa hangu Mulungu aumbe urumwengu na k'agandaonewa kaheri haha urumwenguni.
41013020	Siku zizo za mateso Bwana wazihunguza kwa ut'u wa at'u arioatsagula, ela kala si vizho k'ahana hatha mut'u mumwenga angayeokoka.
41013021	Bai makathi gago mut'u akimwamba, 'Lola thiyuno ye Masihi!' hedu, 'Thiyuya kurya,' sikuluhireni bule.
41013022	Mana kundambola ano Masihi anji a ulongo, na manabii anji a ulongo. At'u ao osi mandahenda miv̱ano na maajabu ili vichadimikika maakenge hatha o at'u mariotsagulwa ni Mulungu.
41013023	Bai ninwi kalani matso, nidzamwambira maut'u gaga kimbere."
41013024	"Siku zizo bada ya mateso garyahu kukira, dzuwa rindangira kiza, na mwezi k'aundaala kaheri.
41013025	Nyenyezi zindagwa ts'i na nguvu za dzulu mulunguni zindathukuswa.
41013026	Ndo mandihomona Mwana wa Mudamu akudzani kahi za maingu, hamwenga na nguvu nyinji na nguma.
41013027	Naye andaahuma malaikae maakundzumanye o at'u osi mariotsagulwa ni Mulungu kula kila p'embe ya dhunia.
41013028	"Bai dzifundisheni kula kwa mutini. Mutini t'aize zikikala nyolovu na kukwatya kumboza makodza munamanya kare wakathi wa mavuno udzafika hehi.
41013029	Kwa vizho ninwi nanwi mukiona maut'u gaga gosi, manyani kukala wakathi wa kudza Mwana wa Mudamu udzafika hehi.
41013030	Nami namwambira kamare, kizhazi kiki k'akindakira kabila maut'u gaga gosi kuthimira.
41013031	Mulunguni na ts'i, vindahenda mwisho, ela maneno gangu k'agana mwisho bule!
41013032	"Na k'ahana mut'u amanyaye ni siku yani hedu saa yani gandihokalira maut'u gaga, hatha o malaika na ye Mwana wa Mudamu k'amaimanya bule, Baba h'akeye nde aimanyaye.
41013033	Kwa vizho musilale, kalani thayari wakathi wosi, mana k'amumanya maut'u gaga gandakala rini.
41013034	Vindakala ni here mut'u aukaye charo cha kure, ariyehala nyumbaye akiarichira ahumikie mamutsundzire. Kidza kila mumwenga akimup'a kaziye ya kuhenda, gonya akimulagiza ye murindzi akale matso muhaka andihouya.
41013035	Bai hatha ninwi kalani matso, mana k'amumanya andakudza rini ye bwana mwenye nyumba. Anadima akadza na dziloni, hedu usiku ukulu hedu akadza jogolo rinaika hedu hatha akadza na madzach'a.
41013036	Bai akihenda poo hasiho kukala na mbadha naye, asidzemudulukiza murere.
41013037	Gaga namwambira ninwi na hatha at'u osi. Kalani matso."
41014001	Bai were zisere siku mbiri ndo iryahu sikuk'uu ya P'asaka na ya Mikahe Iso Ts'ats'u ifike, nao o alombi abomu na alimu a Sheria makikala manamala ngira ya kilachu ya kumugwirira Jesu na mamwalage.
41014002	Makiambirana vivi, "Ut'u uu be nifusiuhende wakathi uu wa ii sikuk'uu, p'ore at'u makathinya bugwa."
41014003	Makathi gago Jesu were a nyumbani mwa mut'u ariyeifwa Simoni Mahana ko Beth'ania. Vikara marihokala makuryani hakidza mwanamuche kuno adzatsukula ts'azi iriyotengezwa kula kwa iwe ra alabasita ya mafuha masafi ga marashi, nago were ni ga gali sana. Ye mwanamuche akihala yo ts'azi akibanda cho kifundiroche na akimumwagira Jesu go mafuha mo kitswani.
41014004	At'u angine mariokala haho kudzaona vizho, k'aviafwahire bule kwani maamba, "Kuno be si kwanonga kuno?
41014005	Mafuha gaga kala gadzaguzwa gangambola zaidhi ya dinari magana mahahu na makagerwa masikini." K'uzhona o at'u makikwatya kumudumulira ye mwanamuche.
41014006	Ela Jesu arihoona vizho akiakanya akiamba, "Muricheni ye mwanamuche, mbona munamubudzya? Iye adzanihendera kit'u kidzo.
41014007	Masikini munao siku zosini. Bai kila muhendzaho munadima kuahendera zho muhendzazho, ela mimi bai k'amundakala nami siku zosini bule.
41014008	Adzahenda here adzizhodima, kwani adzahenda vizho anithayarishe kwa kuzikwa kwangu.
41014009	Nami namwambira ujeri kukala, zho adzizhohenda mwanamuche yuyu vivi rero, be vindathalwa na kukumbukirwa kila undihohubiriwa wo Uv̱oro Udzo kahi za urumwengu muzima."
41014010	Ndo Juda Isikariote, mumwenga wa aryahu anafundzi kumi na airi a Jesu akiuka na achendaambira o alombi abomu viryahu mangazhodima kumugwira Jesu kirahisi.
41014011	Na o alombi abomu marihosikira vivi makifwahirwa sana na makilagana naye kumup'a p'esa. Kwa vizho Juda Isikariote akiandza kumala nafasi mbidzo ya kumusalitira Jesu.
41014012	Bai siku ya kwandza ya sikuk'uu ya Mikahe Iso Ts'ats'u, ambayo ndo siku ya kutsindza ng'ondzi za sikuk'uu ya P'asaka, o anafundzi mamuza Jesu makiamba, "P'asaka ino undairyahi, fukakuthayarishire?"
41014013	Arihosikira vizho Jesu akiahuma anafundzie airi akialagiza akiamba, "Endani hatha mumo mudzini nanwi mundathungana mwanamulume adzatsukula muthanga wa madzi. Vikara mundihomona, muthuweni nyuma
41014014	muhaka yo nyumba andiyongira. Muchangira mwambeni ye mwenye nyumba vivi, 'Mwalimu adzaamba, cho chumba cha ajeni ambacho iye na anafundzie mandarya sikuk'uu ya P'asaka ni hicho?'
41014015	Andihosikira vizho andamwanyesa chumba kibomu cha gorofani kiricho kina kila kit'u. Bai mukichona kwatyani kupanga-panga mumo."
41014016	Kwa vizho o anafundzi airi machenda mo mudzini na makiona vizho arizho were Jesu adzaamba zhenye. Ndo makipanga-panga kwa ut'u wa yo sikuk'uu ya P'asaka.
41014017	Na kurihokala kudzakala dziloni, Jesu achenda mo mudzini hamwenga na o anafundzie kumi na airi.
41014018	Marihokala madzakelesi na makuryani, Jesu akiamba, "Namwambira ujeri, mumwenga wenu ariye tha hunarya naye haha, andanisaliti."
41014019	Kusikira vizho o anafundzi makidzalwa ni kigondzi na makiuza mumwenga-mumwenga makiamba, "Vidze, ni mimi mwalimu?"
41014020	Jesu akiambira, "Iye ni mumwenga wa ninwi kumi na airi, iye atsotsaye muvureni hamwenga nami.
41014021	Ni jeri Mwana wa Mudamu anenda kare kamwe here Maoro gaambazho, ela shauriye iye mut'u amusalitiye! Vingakala baha kala k'azhalirwe."
41014022	Vikara marihokala makuryani, Jesu wahala mukahe akimboza muv̱era kwa Mulungu, gonya akiumogola-mogola akiap'a o anafundzie, akiamba, "Halani, uu ndo mwiri wangu."
41014023	Arihogonya kuap'a wo mukahe, akihala cho kikombe cha divai akimboza muv̱era kwa Mulungu, gonya akiap'a makinwa osini.
41014024	Akiambira, "Ii ndo milatso yangu imwagikayo kwa ut'u wa at'u anji na inanyesa kilagane kisha kahi za Mulungu na mudamu.
41014025	Nami namwambira ujeri, sindanwa divai ii kaheri muhaka siku iyo nindihonwa divai mbisha kahi za uthawali wa Mulungu."
41014026	Gonya makiimba na makiuka kwenda Murima wa Mizeituni.
41014027	Jesu akiambira anafundzie akiamba, "Usiku wa rero ninwi nyosi mundaniricha h'akiyangu. Kwani Maoro ganaamba, 'Nindamupiga ye murisa na zo ng'ondzi zosi zindatsamukana.'
41014028	Ela haho nikikala nidzafufulwa, nindamuthangulia kwenda Galilaya."
41014029	P'et'ero akimwamba, "Hatha kala osi mandakuricha, mimi sindakuricha ng'o!"
41014030	Jesu akimwambira P'et'ero, "Simoni nakwambira ujeri, usiku wa rero kabila jogolo k'aridzaika k'ana mbiri, undanikana k'ana t'ahu."
41014031	P'et'ero arihosikira vizho akinena kwa nguvu akiamba, "Hatha kala ni kufwa nanifwe, ela sindakukana ng'o!" Na o anafundzi angine nao makinena dza vizho.
41014032	Gonya Jesu na anafundzie machenda hat'u haifwaho Geth'isemane. Marihofika haho, akiambira o anafundzie akiamba, "Kelesini haha nami ninavoya haryahu."
41014033	Akimuhala P'et'ero, Jakobu na Johana achenda nao. Wakathi uwo washononeka zhomu na kubudzyika moyo.
41014034	Akiambira o ahahu akiamba, "Ninashononeka zhomu moyoni mwangu hatha ni here nindiyefwa. Bai kalani haha muchese."
41014035	Gonya Jesu akiaricha o ano P'et'ero haho, ye akisongera mbere vichache. Achendagwa na moyo akivoya kwamba vichadimikika mateso gago gakire na k'anda.
41014036	Akiamba, "Aba! Baba! K'akuna ut'u usiwodimikika kwako. Bai navoya uniusire mateso gaga, ela navikale here uhendzazho uwe, visikale here nihendzazho mimi bule."
41014037	Gonya akiauyira o anafundzie na achendaathekeza marere. Kuona vizho akimwamba P'et'ero, "Simoni hatha urere kamare! Yani k'udima kukala matso ngaa saa mwenga?
41014038	Chesani na muvoye sidze mukangira majezoni, kwani roho inahendza kamare, ela wo mwiri ni munyonge."
41014039	Gonya akiuka kaheri kwendavoya, naye wavoya mavoyo dza gago ga chaho.
41014040	Naye arihoauyira achendaathekeza marere kaheri. K'amadimire kukala matso kwa wo uts'indzizi mariwokala nawo. Nao k'amapatire ra kumudzigidzya.
41014041	Arihouka na kudza kaheri lwa hahu akidzaambira, "Muchere kulala na kudzioyeza? Vinathosha. Lolani wakathi wa Mwana wa Mudamu kusalitiwa kwa enye dambi udzafika.
41014042	H'aya ukani fwende. Siyu kare iye anisalitiye!"
41014043	Bai arihokala achere kunena, poo, Juda mumwenga wa o anafundzi kumi na airi na kundi bomu ra at'u. Angine were madzatsukula mishu na angine were madzatsukula njogoma. At'u aa were mala kwa alombi abomu, na alimu a Sheria na athumia a Kiyahudi.
41014044	Bai ye musaliti were adzaap'a muv̱ano kukala, "Ye nindiyemudonera nde mumumalaye, mugwireni na mwende naye ts'ini za urindzi mukali."

41014049	Kila siku nidzakala nikiima mbere yenu kahi za ro Hekalu kufundisha na k'amunigwirire? Ela gaga ganakala kwamba Maoro gathimire."
41014050	Bai o anafundzie osi makimuricha makichimbira.
41014051	Vikara hakikala hana muvulana mumwenga ariyekala adzadzikut'a shuka ya kitani naye wakala anamala kumuthuwa Jesu, o at'u makijeza kumugwira naye,
41014052	ela akidziv̱itha, akiitsulusiza yo shuka ya kitani akichimbira huhu.
41014053	Bai makimuthongozha Jesu hatha ko kwa Mulombi mubomu mwenye, kuriko were ndo kudzikokundzumanyika o alombi abomu, alimu a Sheria, na athumia angine a Kiyahudi.
41014054	Naye P'et'ero akimuthuwa nyuma kwa kure hatha haryahu muhalani ha ye Mulombi mubomu mwenye, bai akikelesi hamwenga na o arindzi a ye Mulombi mubomu mwenye na akikwatya kuoha moho.
41014055	O alombi abomu na ro Baraza rosi ra athumia, mamala kosa ra kumwalagira Jesu, ela k'amapatire bule.

41014057	Angine maungarara makimboza ushahidhi wa ulongo dzulu za Jesu makiamba,
41014058	"Famusikira anaamba vivi, 'Nindaribanda-banda riri Hekalu ririroakwa ni at'u, nami nindaaka ringine risiroakwa ni at'u kwa siku t'ahu thu.' "
41014059	Hatha wo ushahidhi uwo nawo k'augwiranire bule.
41014060	Ndo ye Mulombi mubomu mwenye akirungarara mbere za ro Baraza ra athumia na akimuza Jesu akiamba, "Mbona k'udzigidzya kit'u. Zho manenazho ano at'u ni jeri?"
41014061	Ela Jesu akinyamala zii, k'adzigidzyire kit'u. Ye Mulombi mubomu mwenye akimuza kaheri, akiamba, "We ndiwe ye Masihi Mwana wa Mulungu?"
41014062	Jesu akidzigidzya akiamba, "Ee ndimi. Nanwi mundamona Mwana wa Mudamu akelesi mukono wa kurya wa Mulungu mwenye nguvu, na anadza kuno a dzulu za maingu ga ko dzulu."
41014063	Kusikira vizho ye Mulombi mubomu mwenye akitharura nguwoze kwa kutsukirwa, akiamba, "Vino funa haja ya mashahidhi angine?
41014064	Nyosi mudzasikira zho amukufuruzho Mulungu. Vidze munaona baha humuhendedze be vino?" Na osi makikira luhande lumwenga lwa kuamba anav̱irya alagwe.
41014065	Angine o hatha makikwatya kumutsuhira mahe na makimufunga kizuzu, makimupiga makonde kuno manamwamba, "H'aya nena ni h'ani ye adziyekupiga?" Na o shikari makimuhala na makimupiga mahi.
41014066	P'et'ero were achere ko muhalani kwa ye Mulombi mubomu mwenye, hakidza muhendzi wa kazi wa kiche wa ye Mulombi mubomu.

41014068	P'et'ero akikanaiza akiamba, "Simumanya, kwandza hatha go unenago k'aganing'alira." Naye tw'ee achambola ko ndze ko muv̱iryani, na jogolo rikihenda hee.
41014069	Ye musichana akimona haho naho na akikwatya kuambira ao mariokala maimire haho, akiamba, "Yuyu naye ni mumwenga waho."

41015001	Vikara kurihocha na madzach'a maitsi genye, o alombi abomu, alimu a Sheria, athumia a Kiyahudi hamwenga na baraza rosi, mahenda mipango yao. Bai makimuhala, makimufunga na makimuhirika kwa P'ilato ariye were nde luwali wa jimbo riro.
41015002	Marihofika kuko P'ilato akimuza Jesu akiamba, "Vidze we ndiwe muthawali wa Ayahudi?" Jesu akimudzigidzya akimwamba, "Uwe udzanena."
41015003	O alombi abomu makimusingizira maut'u manji gasigofwaha. Ela iye Jesu mwenye tha k'ajibire kit'u, wanyamala zii.
41015004	Ye P'ilato akimuza kaheri akiamba, "Udzagasikira go maut'u manji madzigokushithakira?"
41015005	Na here ho chaho Jesu akithuwa kumunyamalira. Vivi vikimumasha P'ilato.
41015006	Bai here adha ra P'ilato were kila makathi ga sikuk'uu ya P'asaka ni kuavugulira mufungwa mumwenga mandiyemutsagula enye.
41015007	Vikara kwereko mut'u mumwenga kifungoni ariyeifwa Baraba. Iye na andziye mere mapatikana na makosa ga kugwaga rabusha na kwalaga kwa ut'u wa kukahala uthawali wa Kirumi.

41015010	Kwani P'ilato wamanya kukala o alombi abomu madzamushithaki Jesu kwa sababu ya wivu thu.
41015011	Ela o alombi abomu makiavuga akili o at'u kwamba hat'u ha kuamba arichizwe Jesu, maambe mavugulirwe Baraba.
41015012	P'ilato akiauza kaheri o at'u akiamba, "Vikara yuno mumwihaye muthawali wa Ayahudi nimuhendedze?"
41015013	O at'u makipiga k'ululu kaheri na kuamba, "Musulubishe!"
41015014	P'ilato akiauza akiamba, "Kwani adzakosani kibomu?" Ela o hatha makikaza kupiga k'ululu kuamba, "Musulubishe!"
41015015	Vikara kwa kukala P'ilato were anamala kufwahiza ro kundi ra at'u waambozera Baraba, gonya akiamuru Jesu apigwe vikotho, ndo akimulazha ende akasulubiwe.
41015016	Bai Jesu akihalwa ni shikari na machenda naye muryahu muhalani mwa nyumba ya luwali ambamo mumo ndo k'ambi ya jeshi, gonya makiaiha o andziyao osi.
41015017	Makihala riguwo ra rangi ya zambarau makimuvika, makitengeza kiremba cha miya makimuvika kitswani.
41015018	Gonya makikwatya kumuv̱udhya na kumulamusa makiamba, "K'una ut'u muheshimiwa muthawali wa Ayahudi!"

41015020	Marihokala madzamuv̱udhya zha kuthosha, mamuvula ro riguwo ra zambarau, makimuvika zo nguwoze kaheri, makimuthongozha kwendamusulubisha.
41015021	Marihokala makwendani, makimuthungana mut'u aifwaye Simoni Muk'irene ala mashambani, naye makimulazimisha autsukule wo musalaba wa Jesu. Yuyu Simoni nde babaye Alekizanda na Rufo.
41015022	H'aya ndoo vivi hatha makimufisha Jesu hat'u haifwaho Gologoth'a, ambaho manaye ni Ribeshe ra Kitswa.
41015023	Na haho bai makimup'a divai ya kutsanganywa na manemane anwe, ela Jesu akiikahala.
41015024	Marihogonya kumusulubisha, mahala zo nguwoze makizigazha kwa kuhenda kuzipigira k'ura maone ni h'ani andahala hiyo.
41015025	Wakathi manamusulubisha were ni saa t'ahu za madzach'a.
41015026	Ho dzulu za wo musalaba makihala kibao makindhika ro kosa mariromushithakira: Muthawali Wa Ayahudi.
41015027	Na kidza makiasulubisha aivi airi hamwenga na Jesu, mumwenga mukono wa kurya, na mungine mukono wa kumots'o. [
41015028	Kahi za ngira ii go Maoro gakithimira garigoamba, "Wathalwa jao mwenga na enye dambi."]
41015029	Bai o at'u mariokira na haho arihosulubiwa Jesu, mamusholera, makithukusa vitswa zhao kikav̱udhye, makiamba, "H'aya, kw'aamba undaribanda ro Hekalu na uriake kwa siku t'ahu vino?
41015030	H'aya dziokole mwenye be vivi. Thima kula ho musalabani."
41015031	Na o alombi abomu na alimu a Sheria nao makimusholera dza vizho zha akizi a ngira. Makiamba, "Waokola at'u angine, ela vino k'adima kudzakola mwenye.
41015032	Vikara nahulole chamba ye Masihi muthawali wa Iziraeli, andathima kula ho musalabani. Akithima fundaona na fundamuamini." Na o at'u airi mariosulubiwa hamwenga naye kidza nao mamusholera dza vizho zha o angine.

41015037	Jesu akipiga k'ululu na akimarigizika.

41015039	Ye mubomu wa shikari ariyekala aimire haho hehi naye, arihoona viryahu adzizhorira na kumarigizika akiamba, "Mut'u yuyu were ni Mwana wa Mulungu jeri."
41015040	Na haho were hana anaache manavilolera kwa kure. Kahi za ao mariokala haho were ni Maryamu Magidalena, na Maryamu mameye Jakobu muthithe na Jose, na mwanamuche mungine aifwaye Salome.

41015044	P'ilato wamashwa ni zho zha kukala adzafwa kare. Kwa vizho akimwiha ye mubomu wa shikari akimuza chamba adzamarigizika kare.

41016001	Vikara siku ya Sabato irihokala idzakira, Maryamu Magidalena, Salome na Maryamu mameye Jakobu machendagula mavumba kwamba makamumwagire.

41016009	[Arihokala adzafufuka yo siku ya kwandza ya wiki na madzach'a, bai kwandza kamare wamwambolera Maryamu Magidalena ariyekala wamwamboza p'ep'o afungahe ho nyuma-nyuma.
