42024032	Na lola makikwatya kuuzana-uzana na kuamba, "Vidze kurya ngirani amba mioyo yehu were ina raha zhomu, adzihokala ananena naswi na kufung'azira garya garigo kahi za Maoro?"
42024033	Bai makiungarara kare na makikwatya kuuya Jerusalemu. Marihofika kuko makionana na aryahu ahumwi kumi na mumwenga hamwenga na anafundzi angine a Jesu.

42024035	Gonya o airi nao makithala garyahu ambago were gadzaakalira mo ngirani kwenda Emau, na viryahu ambazho mamumanya ye Jesu arihomogola mukahe.

42024037	Lola makihondoka na makidzalwa ni woga, kwani maona manaona p'ep'o be o.
42024038	Ela Jesu akiauza akiamba, "Mbona munabudzyika kaheri? Kwanoni mioyo yenu i thele kutsakuluhira?
42024039	H'aya nilolani go magulu na yo mikono yangu hedu, samba ndimi mino! Nigut'ani mulole hedu, kwani p'ep'o k'ana mwiri hedu hatha misoza, dza here nirizho mimi."
42024040	Arihogonya kunena vizho, akianyesa go magandzage na go maguluge.
42024041	Ndo marihokala machere k'amadzakuluhira kwa ut'u wa ro fwahiro bomu na ko kushangaa, Jesu akiauza akiamba, "Vidze muna ut'u wowosi wa kurya hano?"
42024042	Bai makihala kisiku cha kumba ra kukanja makimup'a.
42024043	Jesu akikihala cho kisiku cha kumba na akikirya manalola.

42024045	Gonya akiahendya madime kung'alirwa ni go Maoro.
42024046	Kidza akiambira, "Vivi ndizho ambazho zhaorwa, kukala ye Masihi were suthi apate thabu na kidza afwe na siku ya hahu afufuke kula kifwani.
42024047	Na at'u osini a kila kabila, kuandzira mudzi wa Jerusalemu mahubiriwe kahi za dzinare kwamba mathubu na mausizwe dambi zao.
42024048	Ninwi bai mu mashahidhi a maut'u gaga.
42024049	Na lolani mimi mwenye bai nindamuhirikira viryahu virizholagwa ni Baba. Ela kabila vizho, kalani haha Jerusalemu muhaka mundihovikwa nguvu za kula dzulu mulunguni."
42024050	Badaye akialongoza kuwombola wo mudzi muhaka kadzidzi ka Beth'ania, marihofika kuko Jesu akinula mikonoye na akiahasa.

42024053	Nao makala kahi za ro Hekalu siku zosi kumulika Mulungu.
43001001	Haho chaho kwakala neno, na iye Neno wakala kwa Mulungu, na ye Neno wakala ni Mulungu.
43001002	Hangu ho chaho ye Neno were a kwa Mulungu.
43001003	Vit'u zhosi zhaumbwa kwa kukirira kwakwe. Na k'ahana kit'u hatha kimwenga kirichoumbwa hasiho kukirira kwakwe.
43001004	Iye Neno were nde chaho cha uzima, na uzima uu wareha mulangaza kwa anadamu.
43001005	Mulangaza uu, unang'ala kizani na kiza k'akiwadimire.
43001006	Bai kwereko mut'u mumwenga ariyehumwa ni Mulungu, dzinare ni Johana.
43001007	Mut'u yuyu wakudza kwamba aambirize at'u dzulu za wo mulangaza, kwamba kukirira kwa iye Johana at'u osi madime kukuluhira.
43001008	Iye mwenye were siye mulangaza bule, ela wakudzaambiriza at'u dzulu za uwo mulangaza.
43001009	Na uwo mulangaza wa jeri ung'alirawo kila mut'u, were unadza urumwenguni.
43001010	Iye were a urumwenguni, na uwo urumwengu waumbwa kukirira na iye, ela kidza o at'u a urumwengu k'amamumanyire bule.
43001011	Mut'u iye wakudza kwa a kwakwe enye, ela o mario akwe k'amamuhokerere.
43001012	Ela mwero wa osi aryahu mariomuhokera na kumukuluhira waap'a wadimi wa kukala ana a Mulungu.
43001013	Ana aa k'amazhalirwe kwa ngira ya kibinadamu, hedu kwa mahendzo ga mut'u, ela mazhalwa ni Mulungu.
43001014	K'uzhona zho, Neno akikala mut'u na akitoa hamwenga naswi. Bai hukiona ngumaye. Nguma ii were ni yakwe kwa kukala were nde Mwana wa h'akeye kula kwa babaye, naye were adzere nema na ujeri.
43001015	Kwa vizho Johana wamboza ushahidhi dzuluze, akiluta mumiro akiamba, "Yuyu nde yuyahu niriyekala ninamwamba nirihoamba kukala, 'Iye adzaye nyuma zangu be ni mubomu kuriko mimi, kwa kukala wakalako hatha kabila mimi sidzakalako.' "
43001016	Bai siswi hosi fwahokera nema ya kukup'ulirwa kula kwa uthimiri wa kwakwe.
43001017	Kwani Sheria yalazhwa kukirira kwa Musa, ela nema na ujeri zhakudza kukirira kwa Jesu Masihi.
43001018	K'ahana mut'u ariyemona Mulungu, ela ye Mulungu Mwana, ariye ni Mwana wa h'akeye ariye lagani hakwe nde ariyehumanyisa iye Mulungu.
43001019	Bai vivi ndizho Johana arizhoamba wakathi Ayahudi marihoahuma alombi na Alawi kula Jerusalemu kwamba makamuze maambe, "U h'ani we?"
43001020	Marihofika kuko, Johana k'akahalire kuadzigidzya, ela waambira lwazu-lwazu akiamba, "Mimi si iye Masihi bule."
43001021	Marihosikira vizho makimuza kaheri makiamba, "Vikara u h'ani? U Elija?" Johana akidzigidzya akiamba, "Mimi si Elija bule." Makimuza kaheri makiamba, "We u iye nabii?" Johana akiadzigidzya akiamba, "Hatha bule."
43001022	Mwisho kamare makimuza makiamba, "Vikara u h'ani? Hup'e jibu hukaambire aryahu at'u madziohuhuma. Vidze unaambadze dzuluzo?"
43001023	Johana akidzigidzya akiamba, "Here nabii Isaya arizhonena, Mimi ni mut'u alutaye mumiro ko nyika na kuamba, 'Mutengezereni Bwana ngira ya kugoloka.' "
43001024	O at'u mariokwenda kwa Johana, were madzahumwa ni Mafarisayo.
43001025	Bai makimuza Johana makiamba, "Kala k'u Masihi na k'u Elija, hedu ye nabii humutharizaye, mbona unabat'iza at'u?"
43001026	Johana akiadzigidzya akiamba, "Mimi ninabat'iza at'u kwa madzi, ela kahikahi zenu haimire mut'u musiyemumanya.
43001027	Na iye bai ndiye adzaye nyuma yangu ambaye mimi siv̱irya hatha kumuvula virahuzhe."
43001028	Maut'u gaga gahendeka kuko Beth'ania, nyangamo ya hiri ya muho wa Jorodani arikokala Johana anabat'iza at'u.

43001030	Yuyu ndiye niriyekala ninaamba haho nirihonena nikiamba, 'Iye mut'u adzaye nyuma zangu, ni mubomu kuriko mimi, mana wakalako hatha kabila mimi sidzakalako.'
43001031	Mut'u mimi sidimire kumanya kala andakala h'ani, ela nakudza nibat'ize at'u na madzi kwamba adime kuonyeswa kwa Aiziraeli."
43001032	Gonya Johana achamboza ushahidhi akiamba, "Naona ye Roho akitserera kula mulunguni dza here giya na akimuthulama.
43001033	Sikamumanyire, ela ye ariyenihuma nibat'ize at'u na madzi wanambira vivi, 'Ye mut'u ambaye undaona Roho anatserera na kumuthulama, be ndiye iye andebat'iza at'u kwa Roho Mweri.'
43001034	Nami nidzazhona na ninamboza ushahidhi kwamba yuyu nde Mwana wa Mulungu."
43001035	Bai siku ya hiriye kaheri, Johana were aimire haho na anafundzie airi,

43001039	Jesu akiamba, "Ndzoni muhaone hedu." Kwa vizho machenda naye na makiona ho akalaho na makikala hamwenga naye siku iyo. Ganakala gaga were ni murongo wa saa kumi za dziloni.

43001042	Gonya Anderea akimuhirika Simoni kwa Jesu. Bai Jesu akimulola na akiamba, "Uwe u Simoni mwana wa Johana, ela dzinaro rindakala K'efa." (K'efa manaye ni P'et'ero yani iwe.)
43001043	Siku ya hiriye akiona baha ende Galilaya. Bai akimona Filipu, na Jesu akimwamba Filipu, "Nithuwa hedu."

43001046	Nath'anieli arihosikira vizho akiuza akiamba, "Vino kuna kit'u kidzo kidimacho kwambola kula Nazareth'i jeri?" Filipu akimwamba, "Ndzo ulole."

43002010	na akimwamba, "Kawaida mut'u ni kumboza divai mbidzo kwandza ndo gonya kala at'u madzanwa zhomu zhenye, akamboza yo mbii-mbii, ela we vivi udzayika yo mbidzo hatha vivi ndo unayomboza."

43002015	Jesu akisuka kikotho cha nyugwe na akiainga osi mo Hekaluni hamwenga na zo ng'ombe na ng'ondzi zao. Na kidza akizipetula-petula zo meza zao, na zo p'esa zosi zikimwagika!
43002016	Akiadumulira o mariokala managuza magiya akiamba, "H'aya gauseni gaga mumu! Siigaluzeni nyumba ya Baba na kuihendya soko!"
43002017	Gonya o anafundzi marihoaza dzulu ya zho arizhohenda Jesu, makikumbukira viryahu virizhondhikwa kahi za Maoro zhaambazho, "Mulungu, hat'u ha kukuvoya ha moyoni mwangu zhomu hatha sina zha kuhenda."
43002018	Ndo o Ayahudi makimwamba, "Undafwanyesa muujiza wani hatha fumanye una wadimi wa kuhenda gaga?"

43002020	O vilongozi makimwamba, "Hekalu riri raakwa kwa muda wa miaka mirongo mine na mihandahu, undadima jeri kuriaka kwa siku t'ahu we?"
43002021	Ela Jesu were ananena vivi kuhusu Hekalu ra uwo mwiriwe.

43002023	Bai Jesu arihokala a kuko Jerusalemu wakathi uwo wa sikuk'uu ya P'asaka, wahenda miujiza minji kwa nguvu za Mulungu. Kwa ut'u uwo at'u anji makimukuluhira.
43002024	Ela Jesu k'aakuluhirire, kwani waamanya at'u osi t'ot'ot'o.
43002025	K'akukalire na haja ya mut'u kumwambira dzulu ya at'u, mana wamanya garigokala mioyoni mwao.
43003001	Bai kwereko mut'u mumwenga aifwaye Nikodemu. Nikodemu were ni kilongozi wa Ayahudi ariyekala kahi za chama cha Mafarisayo.
43003002	Siku mwenga wakwenda kwa Jesu na usiku, achendamwamba, "Rabi hunamanya kukala u mwalimu ariyehumwa ni Mulungu. Mana k'akuna adimaye kuhenda ii miujiza uhendayo hasiho Mulungu kukala hamwenga naye."
43003003	Jesu akimwamba, "Ninakwambira ujeri wenye, mut'u asihozhalwa mara ya hiri, k'adima kuwona uthawali wa Mulungu."
43003004	Nikodemu akiuza akiamba, "Mut'u adimadze kuzhalwa kaheri kala adzakala muthumia? Vidze anadima kwangira kaheri ndanini mwa mameye na akazhalwa?"
43003005	Jesu akimwamba, "Ninakwambira ujeri wenye, mut'u asihozhalwa kwa madzi na Roho k'adima kwangira kahi za uthawali wa Mulungu.
43003006	Kizhalwacho ni mwiri, ni mwiri na kizhalwacho ni Roho, ni roho.
43003007	Usangalale kwa zho nidzizhonena kwamba, 'Suthi muzhalwe lwa hiri.'
43003008	Lola p'eho nikuvuma kokosi ihendzako. Unadima kuisikira ivumazho, ela k'udima kumanya ilako hedu yendako. Bai ndo virizho na kila mut'u azhalwaye ni Roho."
43003009	Nikodemu akiamba, "Maut'u gano ganadima kukaladze?"
43003010	Jesu akiamba, "U mwalimu wa Iziraeli, ela ko maut'u gaga k'ugamanya?
43003011	Ninakwambira ujeri, hunanena humanyago na hunamboza ushahidhi wa hurigogaona, ela hatha hamwenga na vizho ninwi at'u k'amukubali ushahidhi wehu.
43003012	Nidzamwambira maut'u ga urumwenguni na k'amukuluhira. Vidze, ela mundakuluhira nikimwambira maut'u ga mulunguni?
43003013	"K'akuna mut'u ariyekwenda mulunguni, hasihokala iye ariyethima kula mulunguni ambaye ni Mwana wa Mudamu.
43003014	Here Musa arizhomwanula ye nyoka wa ng'andu ko nyika, ndizho Mwana wa Mudamu arizho suthi anulwe,
43003015	kwamba kila mut'u amukuluhiraye akale na uzima wa kare na kare.
43003016	"Kwa mana Mulungu wauhendza urumwengu zhomu hatha akimulazha Mwanawe wa h'akeye ili kila amukuluhiraye asingamike, ela akale na uzima wa kare na kare.
43003017	Mulungu k'amuhumire Mwanawe urumwenguni ili adze auhukumu, ela uokolwe kukirira kwa iye.
43003018	Kila amukuluhiraye ye Mwana k'ahukumiwa, ela kila asiyemukuluhira adzahukumiwa kare, kwa kukala k'amukuluhirire Mwana wa h'akeye wa Mulungu.
43003019	"Bai chausa cha hatha at'u mahukumiwe ni kiki; wo mulangaza wakudza urumwenguni, ela o at'u makihendza kiza kuriko wo mulangaza kwa kukala mahendo gao ni mai.
43003020	Kwani kila mut'u ahendaye mai nikuutsukirirwa wo mulangaza, na k'andakudza ho mulangazani sidze mahendoge gakaoneka.
43003021	Ela kila mut'u ahendaye ga hachi nikudza mulangazani kwamba adzigogahenda gaoneke lwazu kukala adzagahenda kukirira kwa Mulungu."
43003022	Bada ya gaga, Jesu na anafundzie mambola Jerusalemu na akikala hamwenga nao kwa muda kahi za jimbo ra Judea na akibat'iza at'u.
43003023	Johana naye were anabat'iza at'u kuko Enoni hehi na Salimu, kwani were kuna madzi manji kuko, na at'u manadza makibat'izwa.
43003024	Wakathi uwo Johana were k'adzangwe kwangizwa jela bule.
43003025	Bai kuchambola h'uwoh'uwo kahi za anafundzi a Johana na Muyahudi mumwenga dzulu za adha ra kuoga.
43003026	Ndo makidza kwa Johana na makimwambira, "Rabi, unamukumbukira yuya mut'u ariyekala nawe nyangamo ya hiri ya Jorodani, yuya uriyenena dzuluze? Lola vivi anabat'iza na kila mut'u anamuthuwa!"
43003027	Johana akiamba, "K'akuna adimaye kukala na kit'u hasiho kukigerwa kula mulunguni.
43003028	Ninwi enye mu mashudhia gangu kukala naamba, 'Mimi si Masihi,' ela naamba, 'Nahumwa mbereze.'
43003029	Mimi ni here muhiriki wa bwana harusi. Ye bwana harusi nde mwenye bibi harusi. Muhiriki wa bwana harusi nikuima na kusirikiza, na nikufwahirwa asikiraho sauthi ya bwana harusi. Vivi ndo hatha nina raha zhomu.
43003030	Vinav̱irya ngumaye ingezeke na yangu ihunguke.
43003031	"Ye mut'u adzaye kula dzulu ni mubomu kuriko at'u osi; naye mut'u wa haha ts'i ni wa haha ts'i, na nikunena maut'u ga haha ts'i. Ela iye adzaye kula mulunguni ni mubomu kuriko osi.
43003032	Mut'u iye anena vizho arizhoona na kusikira, ela k'akuna akubaliye ushahidhiwe.
43003033	Kila akubaliye ushahidhiwe anathibitisha kukala Mulungu ni jeri.
43003034	Bai iye ahumwaye ni Mulungu nikunena maneno ga Mulungu, kwa kukala Mulungu nikumup'a unji wa Rohore.
43003035	"Iye Baba anamuhendza Mwanawe na adzazhika vit'u zhosi mikononi mwakwe.
43003036	Kila amukuluhiraye ye Mwana yuna uzima wa kare na kare, ela kila amukahalaye k'andawona uwo uzima uwo, ela k'oro za Mulungu zi dzuluze."

43004003	Bai Mafarisayo masikira kukala Jesu anapata na kubat'iza anafundzi anji kuriko Johana. (Ingahokala Jesu mwenye were k'abat'iza, isihokala anafundzie.) K'uzhona zho Jesu arihomanya kukala Mafarisayo magasikira gago, akiuka kula Judea na akiuya Galilaya.
43004004	Na kahi za charoche akikala k'ana budhi akire na Samaria.
43004005	Ndeye vivi hatha mudzi mumwenga wa Samaria uriwoifwa Sikari. Mudzi uu were u hehi na munda wa Josefu ariwogerwa ni babaye Jakobu.
43004006	Na haho were hana kisima cha Jakobu, bai kwa kukala were Jesu adzatsoka kwa charoche, wakelesi k'anda-k'anda ya cho kisima akioya. Na wakathi uu were ni here saa sitha za mutsana.
43004007	Bai Jesu arihokala a ho kisimani, kukidza mwanamuche wa Kisamaria kudzaheka madzi. Arihofika haho Jesu akimwamba, "Nisaidhia na madzi ninwe hedu."
43004008	Ganakala gaga were o anafundzie k'amaho, madzambola-mbola masokoni kwendagula chakurya.

43004010	Jesu akimwamba ye mwanamuche, "Kala unamanya kigerwa cha Mulungu na iye akuvoyaye madzi ni h'ani, ungamuvoya iye naye angakup'a madzi ga uzima."

43004013	Jesu akiamba, "Kila anwaye madzi gaga andasikira k'ihu kaheri,
43004014	ela iye andiyenwa go madzi nindigomup'a k'andasikira k'ihu hatha kare na kare. Go madzi nindigomup'a mimi gandakala here kidzuho ndanimwe, na kidzuho kiki kindakala kinamup'a madzi ga uzima wa kare na kare."
43004015	Ye mwanamuche akiamba, "Bwana, nip'a gago madzigo, ili nisisikire k'ihu kaheri, hedu hatha kudzaheka madzi kaheri haha."
43004016	Jesu akimwamba, "Enda ukamuhale mulumeo hedu udze naye."
43004017	Ye mwanamuche akiamba, "Sina mulume mino." Jesu akimwambira, "U mujeri kuamba k'una mulume.
43004018	Kwani uwe udzafisha alume atsano mariokuhala na mukirichana, na hatha haha ninenaho, iye mulume uriye naye si wa hilali."
43004019	Ye mwanamuche akiamba, "Bwana, naona uwe u nabii!
43004020	Babizehu a Kisamaria mamuvoya Mulungu kahi za murima uu, ela nwi Ayahudi mudzasita kuamba Jerusalemu ndo hat'u hav̱iryaho kuvoywa Mulungu."
43004021	Jesu akiamba, "Kuluhira gaga ninenago m'ama, wakathi unadza ambawo k'amundamuvoya Baba Mulungu kahi za murima uu hedu hatha Jerusalemu kaheri.
43004022	Ninwi Asamaria munavoya, ela k'amumanya kala munamuvoya h'ani, ela siswi Ayahudi bai hunamumanya ye humuvoyaye, kwa kukala wokolwi unaadzirira at'u kukirira kwa Ayahudi.
43004023	Ela wakathi unadza na hatha udzire kare ambaho o avoyi a jeri na jeri mandamuvoya Baba Mulungu kahi za Roho na ujeri. Na aa be ndo avoyi mamalwao ni Baba.
43004024	Kwani Mulungu ni roho na ao mamuvoyao manav̱irya kumuvoya kahi za Roho na ujeri."
43004025	Ye mwanamuche akiamba, "Namanya iye Masihi andakudza, bai haho akidza andafung'aziza gosini."
43004026	Jesu akiamba, "Mimi ninenaye nawe, ndimi iye."
43004027	Bai Jesu arihokala anasumurira na ye mwanamuche, anafundzie makiuya na machangalala kumona anasumurira na mwanamuche. Marihoona vizho, k'ahambolere hatha mumwenga ariyemuza ye mwanamuche kala anamalani hedu hatha kumuza Jesu kwanoni anasumurira naye.

43004029	"Ndzoni mulole hedu yuno mut'u adziyenambira gosini nirigogahenda. Mut'u yuno akale nde Masihi?"
43004030	Bai at'u makimbola ko mudzini na makiandza kudza kwa Jesu.
43004031	Bai wakathi uu o anafundzi makimurenga-renga Jesu makiamba, "Rabi, rya chakurya."
43004032	Ela Jesu akiamba, "Mimi nina chakurya musichokimanya bule."
43004033	O anafundzie marihosikira vizho makiuzana-uzana makiamba, "Vidze hakale hana mut'u adziyemurehera chakurya kare be zho?"
43004034	Jesu akiamba, "Chakurya changu mimi ni kuhenda zho ahendzazho ye ariyenihuma na kumarigiza kaziye.
43004035	Ninwi munaamba, 'Vinahala miezi mine ndo huvune.' Ela namwambira muilolet'o yo minda, kwani ni myaruhe tse na i thayari kuvunwa.
43004036	Ye mut'u avunaye nikuhokezwa mushahara kalaho anagakusanya mavuno kahi za uzima wa kare na kare, kwamba iye mut'u alayaye na iye avunaye mafwahirwe hamwenga.
43004037	Bai vizho ni jeri kukala 'mut'u mumwenga ni kulaya na mungine akavuna.'
43004038	Namuhuma mukavune mavuno kwenye munda ambawo k'amuuhendere kazi, angine mahenda kazi kuko nanwi munafaidhi kazi yao."
43004039	Bai Asamaria anji kahi za wo mudzi wa Sikari mamukuluhira Jesu, kwa kukala ye mwanamuche were adzaashuhudia na kuamba, "Adzanambira kila kit'u nirichokihenda!"
43004040	Kwa vizho ao Asamaria marihokudza kwakwe mamuvoya akale haho hamwenga nao, naye akihenda vizho, akikala kuko siku mbiri.
43004041	Bai Jesu akinena na o at'u, na anji angine makimukuluhira.
43004042	Makimwamba ye mwanamuche, "Hunakuluhira vikara, si kwa viryahu urizhofwambira thu, ela kwa kukala siswi enye hudzamusikira na hunamanya kamare kukala ni jeri ni mwokoli wa urumwengu."
43004043	Bada ya kukala haho siku mbiri, Jesu wauka na achenda Galilaya.
43004044	Kwani Jesu mwenye were waamba, "Nabii k'aishimiwa kahi za ts'i ya kwao."
43004045	Ela arihofika Galilaya at'u makimuhokerat'o, mana were makwenda kwa sikuk'uu ya P'asaka ko Jerusalemu na makiona kila kit'u arichokihenda kahi za sikuk'uu iyo.
43004046	Ndo Jesu achenda kaheri K'ana ya Galilaya, arikokala wagaluza madzi gakikala divai. Bai kuko kwere na mubomu ariyekala ana muthanawe Kaperinaumu ariyekala ni mukongo.
43004047	Arihosikira kukala Jesu were adzire kula Judea hatha Galilaya, wakwenda kwakwe na akimuvoya ende Kaperinaumu akamuhoze mwanawe ariyekala k'amanyikana kuthia.
43004048	Jesu akiamba, "K'ahana hatha mumwenga wenu andiyekuluhira muhaka muone miujiza na maut'u ga kungalaza."
43004049	Iye mubomu akiamba, "Bwana, hinde kabila mwanangu k'adzamarigizika."
43004050	Jesu akimwamba, "Enda, mwanao andakala moyo!" Bai ye mut'u akikuluhira maneno ga Jesu na achenda.
43004051	Arihokala akwendani ko mudzini, ahumikie makimuthungana na uv̱oro uu, "Muthanao ni muzima!"
43004052	Akiuza chamba ni wakathi wani iye muthanawe arihoandza kupata baha. Makiamba, "Ramuricha dzana, murongo wa saa fungahe za mutsana."
43004053	Badaye ye babaye muthana akikumbukira kukala ni wakathi uryahu Jesu arihomwambira, "Muthanao andakala moyo." Kwa vizho iye na adamue osi makikuluhira.
43004054	Uu were ndo muujiza wa hiri ariouhenda Jesu kuko Galilaya bada ya kudza kula Judea.
43005001	Badaye Jesu wambuka Jerusalemu kwa sikuk'uu ya Kiyahudi.
43005002	Vikara kuko Jerusalemu hehi na Muv̱irya wa Ng'ondzi kuna birika ambaro kwa Kieburania rinaifwa Betizath'a. Birika riri were rina ukuta uriwo na miryango mitsano.
43005003	Bai kahi za birika riri were hana akongo anji sana mahembelele, masoona, vidende, na akuholoza. [
43005004	Nao were manathariza madzi gatigwe, mana were wakathi kwa wakathi, malaika wa Bwana anatharamuka mo birikani na kugatiga go madzi. Vikara mut'u wa kwandza wa kwangira mo birikani bada ya madzi kutigwa wahozwa ukongowe ariwokala nawo.]
43005005	Bai haho were hana mut'u mumwenga ariyekala adzafisha miaka mirongo mihahu na minane analumwa thu.
43005006	Jesu arihomona na kumanya kukala adzakala haho kwa muda mure, wamuza akiamba, "Vidze unamala kuhola?"
43005007	Ye munyonge akiamba, "Bwana mut'u mimi, sina mut'u wa kunangiza birikani madzi gatigwaho, mana nikijeza kwangira thu, nakatw'a ni mut'u mungine."
43005008	Jesu akimwamba, "Uka, uhale godhororo wanende."
43005009	Haho henye ye mut'u akihola. Akihala godhoro ra kwakwe akinenda. Vinakala vivi were ni siku ya Sabato.
43005010	Bai o Ayahudi makimwamba ye ariyekala adzahozwa, "Rero ni Sabato na kulingana na sheria yehu k'uv̱irya kutsukula godhoro bule."
43005011	Iye mut'u akiamba, "Ye adziyenihoza adzanambira, 'Hala godhororo wende.' "
43005012	Bai makimuza makiamba, "Ni h'ani mut'u yuno adziyekwambira uhale godhororo na wende kwenu?"
43005013	Ela ye mut'u ariyehozwa k'amumanyire ye ariyekala adzamuhoza, kwa kukala hat'u haho were hana kundi ra at'u na Jesu were adzahenyeza akenda.
43005014	Badaye Jesu akimona kahi za ro Hekalu akimwamba, "Lola u muzima vikara. Usihende dambi kaheri, p'ore ukagwirwa ni ut'u uwi zaidhi kukira uu."
43005015	Ndo ye mut'u achenda na akiambira o Ayahudi kukala ni Jesu nde ariyemuhoza.

43005017	Jesu akiadzigidzya, akiamba, "Baba anahenda kazi kila wakathi, na mimi nami nav̱irya nihende kazi."
43005018	Neno riri raahendya o Ayahudi mazidhi kumala kumwalaga Jesu, kwa kukala were k'avundzire Sabato thu, ela were adzaamba kukala iye Mulungu be ni babaye mwenye, na kwa vivi wadzihendya kukala yu karakara na Mulungu.
43005019	Ndo Jesu akiadzigidzya akiamba, "Ninamwambira ujeri, Mwana k'adima kuhenda kit'u chochosi h'akeye. Mut'u iye anahenda go aonago Babaye anagahenda. Go ahendago Baba ndo ahendago Mwana.
43005020	Kwani Baba anamuhendza Mwanawe na anamwanyesa kila kit'u ambacho ye mwenye anakihenda. Andamwanyesa ye Mwanawe maut'u mabomu zaidhi ga kuhenda, nanwi mundangalala.
43005021	Here Baba afufulazho nyufu na kuzip'a uzima, Mwana naye dzazho ni kuap'a uzima aryahu amalao kuap'a uzima.

43005024	Ninamwambira ujeri, mut'u yoyosi asikiraye maneno gangu na kumukuluhira ye ariyenihuma, yuna uzima wa kare na kare. K'andahukumiwa, ela adzagonya kare kukira kifwani hatha uzimani.
43005025	Ninamwambira ujeri, wakathi unadza na udzire kare, ambaho nyufu zindasikira sauthi ya Mwana wa Mulungu na ao mandioisikira mandaishi.

43005028	"Musangalale kwa gaga, mana wakathi unadza ambawo osi mario mbirani mandasikira sauthiye,

43005030	"Mimi h'akiyangu sidima kuhenda kit'u chochosi. Mut'u mimi ninahukumu thu here Mulungu anambirazho, kwa vizho hukumu yangu ni ya ujeri, mana sihenda go nihendzago mimi, ela nahenda garyahu gamalwago ni iye ariyenihuma.
43005031	"Nikimboza ushahidhi dzulu yangu mwenye go ninenago si ga ujeri.
43005032	Ela kuna mungine anambozeraye ushahidhi hat'u hangu na ninamanya uwo ushahidhiwe dzulu yangu ni jeri.
43005033	"Mwahirika at'u kwa Johana, na akinena ujeri dzulu zangu.
43005034	Si kwa kukala nidzathumainia ushahidhi niupatao ula kwa mudamu, ela ninanena vivi kwamba mukuluhire.
43005035	Iye were ni taa riakaro na kung'ala, nanwi mukihendza kufurahi kwa muda kahi za mulangazawe.

43005037	Na ye Baba mwenye ariyenihuma anamboza ushahidhi dzulu zangu. Ela ninwi k'amudzamusikira sauthiye hedu hatha kumona umbore,

43005044	Munadimadze kukuluhira ikidzakala mwakubali kudzip'a nguma enye kwa enye na k'amuhenda chadi chochosi kupata nguma imbolayo kwa Mulungu h'akeye?
43005045	Hatha vizho musione kukala nindamushithaki kwa Baba, Musa nde andiyemushithaki ninwi. Naye ni yuyahu Musa ambaye mudzamutumainia.

43006001	Bada ya vivi Jesu wakwenda luhande lungine lwa ziya ra Galilaya ambaro pia ni ziya ra Tiberia.
43006002	Bai at'u anji makimuthuwa, mana maona yo miujiza ariyoahendera at'u mariokala ni akongo.

43006005	Bai Jesu arihonula matso waona kundi bomu ra at'u rinamudzirira. Akimuza Filipu, akiamba, "Vidze hundagulahi mikahe ya kuarisa at'u ano?"
43006006	Ela Jesu wamuza kumujeza thu, kwani were anamanya kare zho arizhokala andahenda ye mwenye.

43006008	Ndo mwanafundziwe mumwenga Anderea, ariye ni nduguye Simoni P'et'ero akiamba,
43006009	"Haha hana muvulana ariye na mikahe mitsano ya shayiri na makumba mairi. Ela zho be hatha ni noni kwa at'u anji namuna ino?"
43006010	Jesu akiamba, "Ambireni o at'u makelesi hedu." Hat'u haho were hana nyasi nyinji. Kwa vizho kila mut'u akikeresi. Nao were ni here at'u alifu ts'ano, alume.
43006011	Bai Jesu akihala yo mikahe achamboza muv̱era kwa Mulungu na akiagazhira o at'u mariokala makelesi haho. Akihenda vizho pia kwa go makumba, na osi makirya hatha makivilola.
43006012	Marihokala osi makusi, Jesu waambira anafundzie, "Tsolani-tsolani zho visiku vidzizhosala ili husitsuhe chochosi."
43006013	Kwa vizho makivitsola-tsola zhosi, na makidzaza k'ahu kumi na mbiri kula kahi za yo mikahe mitsano ya shayiri iriyoriwa ni o at'u.

43006015	Kidza Jesu akimanya kukala were manamala kudzamugwira mamuhendye muthawali kwa nguvu. Kwa vizho akiachimbira achenda murimani na akikala h'akeye.

43006020	Ela Jesu akiamba, "Sogoheni bule, ndimi."

43006022	Siku ya hiriye muthunganano uriwokala nyangamo ya ziya wakumbukira kukala ni dau mwenga h'akeye ririrokala haho. Kwa vizho makimanya kukala Jesu k'endere na anafundzie mo dauni ela makala madzamuricha.
43006023	Kidza madau mangine kula Tiberia gakidzaima hehi na ho hat'u ambaho at'u were marya mikahe bada ya Bwana Jesu kulazha muv̱era kwa Mulungu.
43006024	O at'u marihoona kukala Jesu hedu anafundzie were k'amaho, machangira madauni na machenda Kaperinaumu kumumala Jesu.

43006026	Jesu akiamba, "Ninamwambira ujeri, ninwi k'amunimala kwa kukala mwaona mana ya miujiza niriyoihenda, ela kwa kukala mwarya mikahe hatha muchakuha.
43006027	Bai musihende kazi kwa ut'u wa chakurya kidimacho kunongeka, ela kwa ut'u wa chakurya kitoacho na kilazhacho uzima wa kare na kare, ambacho ye Mwana wa Mudamu nde andemup'a. Iye nde ariye Mulungu Baba adzamup'a wadimi wa kuhenda vizho."
43006028	Kudzasikira vizho makimuza makiamba, "Huhendedze ili hukale hunahenda kazi ya Mulungu?"

43006030	Makiamba, "Vidze undahenda muujiza wani ili fuwone na fukukuluhire?
43006031	Kwani babizehu marya Mana kuko nyika, here Maoro gaambazho, 'Waap'a mukahe kula mulunguni makirya.' "
43006032	Jesu akiamba, "Ninamwambira ujeri, Musa k'amup'ire chakurya kula mulunguni, ela Baba nde amup'aye chakurya jeri kula mulunguni.
43006033	Kwani chakurya kilazhwacho ni Mulungu ni ye adzaye kula mulunguni na kulazha uzima kwa urumwengu."
43006034	Makiamba, "Bwana hup'e chakurya kiki kwenda-kwenda."
43006035	Jesu akiambira, "Mimi ndimi chakurya cha uzima. Mut'u andiyekudza kwangu k'andasikira ndzala kamare, na iye andiyenikuluhira mimi k'andasikira k'ihu ng'o.
43006036	Vikara here nidzizhomwambira mudzanona, ela k'amukuluhira.
43006037	Kila mut'u nindiyep'ewa ni Baba, andakudza ko kwangu, na iye andiyekudza kwangu sindamuinga bule.
43006038	Kwani sidzire kula mulunguni kudzahenda mahendzo gangu mwenye, ela nakudza ili nihende mahendzo ga iye ariyenihuma.
43006039	Bai iye ariyenihuma anamala nihende vivi: Kwamba niafufule o at'u osi arionip'a. K'endzi nangamize hatha mumwenga.
43006040	Kwani zho ahendzazho ye Baba ni vivi: Kwamba osi mamonao Mwana na kumukuluhira madime kupata uzima wa kare na kare; nami nindaafufula siku ya mwisho."
43006041	Ayahudi makiandza kumunung'unika kwa kukala were adzaamba, "Mimi ndimi chakurya kirichothima kula mulunguni."

43006043	Jesu akiambira, "Richani kunung'unikirana.
43006044	K'akuna adimaye kudza kwangu asihovufwa ni ye Baba ariyenihuma, nami nindamufufula siku ya mwisho.
43006045	Manabii mandhika kukala, 'At'u osi mandafundishwa ni Mulungu.' Kila mut'u amusikiraye ye Baba na kudzifundisha kula kwakwe, ni kudza kwangu.

43006048	Mimi ndimi chakurya cha uzima.
43006049	Babizenu marya Mana kuko nyika, kidza makifwa vizho.
43006050	Ela haha hana chakurya kitharamushwacho kula mulunguni ambacho mut'u anadima kurya na kutsafwa.
43006051	Mimi ndimi chakurya chenye uzima kirichotharamushwa haha ts'i kula mulunguni. Kila mut'u anderya chakurya kiki andakala moyo kare na kare. Mukahe uu ni mwiri wangu, ambawo ninaulazha kwamba urumwengu upate uzima."
43006052	Bai o Ayahudi marihosikira vivi, makinenezana enye kwa enye na kuamba, "Vinadimikikadze yuno mut'u kuhup'a mwiriwe huurye?"
43006053	Jesu akiamba, "Ninamwambira ujeri. Kala k'amundarya mwiri wa Mwana wa Mudamu na kunwa milatsoye k'amundakala na uzima ndani mwenu.
43006054	Kwani ye aryaye mwiri wangu na kunwa milatso yangu yuna uzima wa kare na kare, na nindamufufula siku ya mwisho.
43006055	Kwani wo mwiri wangu ndo chakurya jeri-jeri na milatso yangu ndo kinywaji jeri-jeri.
43006056	Mut'u aryaye mwiri wangu na kunwa milatso yangu andakala kit'u kimwenga nami.
43006057	Here Baba ariye moyo arizhonihuma, nami ni moyo kwa ut'u wa Baba, kwa vizho ye aniryaye andakala moyo kwa ut'u wa mimi.
43006058	Bai kiki ndo chakurya kirichotharamushwa kula mulunguni. Nacho si here kiryahu marichorya babizenu na makifwa. Ela iye andiyerya chakurya kiki nindichomup'a, andakala moyo kare na kare."
43006059	Jesu wanena vivi arihokala anafundisha kahi za sinagogi kuko Kaperinaumu.

43006063	Kilazhacho uzima ni Roho wa Mulungu, nguvu za mudamu k'azina faidha bule. Gago maneno nidzigomwambira ni Roho na uzima.
43006064	Kidza angine enu k'amukuluhira!" Jesu wamanya hangu chaho aryahu mario were k'amandamukuluhira na iye andiyemusaliti.

43008040	Nidzizhohenda mimi ni kumwambira ujeri niriwousikira kula kwa Mulungu, kidza munamala kunalaga. Burahemu k'ahendere kit'u dza kiki.
43008041	Ela ninwi munahenda vizho ahendazho babiyenu." Makiamba, "Mulungu h'akeye nde Babiyehu naswi hu anae."
43008042	Jesu akiambira, "Kalaho Mulungu nde babiyenu jeri munganihendza, kwa kukala nala kwakwe na vikara ni haha.
43008043	Kwanoni k'amuelewa zho nimwambirazho? Ni kwa kukala k'amudima kusikira uv̱oro wangu.
43008044	At'u ninwi mu a babiyenu Ibilisi na muhendzazho ni kuhenda mahendzoge. Iye were ni mwalagi hangu chaho na k'endzi kit'u chochosi kuhusu ujeri, kwa kukala k'amuna ujeri ndanimwe. Akikenga ananena here arizho, kwani ni mulongo na nde babe ulongo.
43008045	Ela kwa kukala ninanena ujeri k'amunikuluhira.
43008046	Ni h'ani kahi zenu adimaye kunamba nina dambi? H'aya ninanena ujeri, mbona k'amunikuluhira?
43008047	Iye ariye ni wa Mulungu ni kusikira manenoge. Ela ninwi k'amua Mulungu ndosa k'amundasikira."
43008048	Bai o Ayahudi makimudzigidzya Jesu makiamba, "Vidze were k'ahuajeri kuamba u Musamaria na una p'ep'o?"
43008049	Jesu akidzigidzya akiamba, "Sina p'ep'o. Ninamuheshimu Baba, ela ninwi k'amuniishimu bule.
43008050	Sidzimalira ishima, ela kuna mumwenga aimalaye na iye bai ndiye jaji.
43008051	Ninamwambira ujeri iye ahendaye here nilagizazho k'andafwa bule."
43008052	Kusikira vizho, o Ayahudi makimwambira, "Vikara hunamanya kukala jeri wenye una p'ep'o! Burahemu wafwa na o manabii nao dzazho, kidza unaamba kukala yoyosi andiyehenda go uhendzago k'andafwa bule.
43008053	Vidze we u mubomu kuriko babiyehu Burahemu na o manabii? Burahemu wafwa, na o manabii nao makifwa. Unadziona u h'ani we?"
43008054	Jesu akidzigidzya akiamba, "Nikidzip'a nguma mwenye, nguma yangu k'aina mana yoyosi. Baba ariye nanwi munaamba ni Mulungu wenu, ananipa nguma.
43008055	Vingahokala ninwi k'amumumanya mimi ninamumanya. Nikiamba simumanya nindakala mulongo here ninwi, ela ninamumanya na kugwira nenore.
43008056	Babiyenu Burahemu wafwahirwa kwamba adime kuyona siku yangu, naye akiyona na akifwahirwa."
43008057	O Ayahudi makimwambira, "K'udzafisha miaka mirongo mitsano na unaamba wamona Burahemu?"
43008058	Jesu akidzigidzya akiamba, "Ninamwambira ujeri, kabila ya Burahemu kuzhalwa mino were ni kuko kare!"
43008059	Ndo makitsola mawe mamukot'e, ela Jesu akizama na badaye achambola mo Hekaluni achenda ndze.
43009001	Bai Jesu arihokala yunatsembera, waona mut'u ariyekala k'aona hangu kuzhalwakwe.
43009002	K'uzhona zho anafundzie makimuza, makiamba, "Rabi ni dambi ya h'ani iriyomuhendya hatha azhalwe k'aona? Ni yakwe mwenye hedu ni ya azhazie?"
43009003	Jesu akidzigidzya akiamba, "Kutsaona kwa kwakwe k'akuhusiana na dambize hedu za azhazie. Iye avizho ili nguvu za Mulungu zidime kuoneka zikihenda kazi kwakwe.
43009004	Bai hunav̱irya kuenderera kuhenda kazi za iye ariyenihuma kukikala kuchere mutsana, kwani usiku unadza ambaho k'akuna adimaye kuhenda kazi.
43009005	Nirizho ni haha urumwenguni, mimi ni mulangaza wa urumwengu."
43009006	Bada ya kunena vivi Jesu watsuha mahe ts'i na akivuga-vuga ulongo na mahege na akimuhaka ye mut'u mo matsoni,
43009007	na akimwamba, "Enda ukaoge usowo kahi za birika ra Siloamu." (Mana ya Siloamu ni kuhumwa.) Bai ye mut'u achendaoga usowe na akiuya anaona.
43009008	Bai majirani a kwakwe na osini mariokala makimona anavoya-voya kabila ya vivi, mauza makiamba, "Vidze yuno se mut'u ariyekala akikelesi na kuvoya-voya?"
43009009	Angine maamba, "Ni iye" Ela angine makiamba, "Seye bule adzahenda kuhalana naye." Bai ye mut'u mwenye akiamba, "Ndimi iye."
43009010	Makimuza ye mut'u, makiamba, "Matsogo gapatadze kuona?"
43009011	Akiamba, "Ye mut'u aifwaye Jesu wavuga-vuga ulongo, akinihaka mo matsoni na akinambira, 'Enda Siloamu na ukaoge usowo.' Bai nichenda na nirihooga thu nikipata kuona."
43009012	Makimuza makiamba, "Vino a hiko ye mut'u ye?" Ye mut'u akiamba, "Simanya mino!"
43009013	Bai makimuhirika ye mut'u ariyezhalwa k'aona kwa Mafarisayo.
43009014	Vikara siku iryahu ambayo Jesu wavuga-vuga ulongo na kumuhendya matsoge gaone ye mut'u, yere ni siku ya Sabato.
43009015	Mafarisayo makimuza kaheri ye mut'u here arizhopata kuona. Akiambira, "Wanihaka ulongo matsoni, nichendaoga uso wangu na vikara ninaona."
43009016	Mafarisayo angine makiamba, "Ye mut'u ariyehenda vizho k'adima kula kwa Mulungu bule, kwa kukala k'agwira malagizo ga yo Sabato." Hatha vizho angine maamba, "Vidimikikadze mut'u ariye na dambi kuhenda kazi bomu dza zizi?" Na k'amakubalianire.
43009017	Bai Mafarisayo makimuza ye mut'u kaheri, "Unaamba kukala wakuhendya matsogo gaone. H'aya unaambadze dzulu ya ye?" Akiamba, "Ni nabii iye."
43009018	O Ayahudi k'amakuluhirire kukala were k'aona na wapata kuona muhaka marihohumiza azhazie.
43009019	Marihokudza makiauza makiamba, "Vidze yuno ni mwana wenu? Munaamba kukala wazhalwa k'aona, h'aya zhakaladze hatha vino anaona?"
43009020	Azhazie makiamba, "Hunamanya kukala yuyu ni mwana wehu, na hunamanya kukala wazhalwa k'aona.
43009021	Ela k'ahumanya kala zhaandzadze hatha anaona, na hatha ye ariyemuhendya aone k'ahumumanya. Muzeni iye mwenye, kwani ni mut'u muzima anadima kudzinenera mwenye!"
43009022	Azhazie manena vivi kwa kukala were manaogoha Ayahudi mariokala madzakubaliana kukala mut'u yoyosi andiyeamba kukala Jesu ni Masihi andaingwa mo sinagogini.
43009023	Vizho ndo hatha azhazie makiamba, "Ni mut'u muzima, muzeni mwenye."
43009024	K'uzhona zho makimwiha kaheri ye mut'u ariyezhalwa k'aona, na makimwambira, "Mup'e nguma Mulungu, mana siswi hunamanya kukala yuyu mut'u yuyu ni mwenye dambi."
43009025	Akidzigidzya akiamba, "Kala ni mwenye dambi hedu si mwenye dambi mino simanya. Nimanyacho ni kit'u kimwenga, were siona, ela vino ninaona."
43009026	Makiuza makiamba, "Wakuhenderadze? Wahendadze hatha matsogo gakiona?"
43009027	Akidzigidzya akiamba, "Nidzamwambira kare na k'amudimire kusikiza. Mbona munamala kusikira kaheri? Hedu hangine munamala mukale anafundzie nanwi?"
43009028	Makimuchemera makiamba, "Uwe ndiwe mwanafundzi wa mut'u iye, ela sino hu anafundzi a Musa.
43009029	Hunamanya kukala Mulungu wanena na Musa, ela kuhusu mut'u yuyu k'ahumanya hatha ko arikombola."
43009030	Ye mut'u akidzigidzya akiamba, "Kiki ni kit'u cha kwangalaza sana! K'amumanya arikombola, na wanihendya nione!
43009031	Hunamanya kukala Mulungu k'asikira enye dambi, ela iye nikusikira at'u mamuishimuo na kuhenda ahendzazho mahende.
43009032	Hangu wo urumwengu uumbwe, k'avidzangwe kuonewa kukala mut'u fulani wamuhendya mut'u ariyezhalwa k'aona aone.
43009033	Kalaho mut'u iye k'ambolere kwa Mulungu, be k'angadimire kuhenda kit'u."
43009034	Kusikira vizho makimudzigidzya makiamba, "Uwe wazhalwa na ukirerwa dambini na vino unamala kuhufundisha?" Bai makimuinga sinagogini.
43009035	K'uzhona zho Jesu akisikira kukala mamuthenga. Bai arihomona akimuza, "Vidze unamukuluhira Mwana wa Mudamu?"
43009036	Ye mut'u akiamba, "Nambira ni h'ani bwana ili nimukuluhire!"
43009037	Jesu akimwambira, "Udzamona kare na ni ye anenaye nawe vivi."
43009038	Ye mut'u akiamba, "Ninakuluhira Bwana," na akimuabudu Jesu.
43009039	Jesu akiamba, "Nakudza urumwenguni na hukumu kwamba masioona, maone na maonao makatsaona."
43009040	Mafarisayo angine mariokala hehi naye mavisikira vivi na makimwamba, "Vidze naswi k'ahuona?"
43009041	Jesu akidzigidzya akiamba, "Kala k'amuona ngere k'amuna dambi, ela kwa kukala munaamba munaona be dambi yenu i nanwi."
43010001	Bai Jesu akiamba, "Ninamwambira ujeri wenye kukala ye asiyengira chaani na muryangoni, ela anakwera na dzulu, be iye ni mwivi kidza ni jambazi.
43010002	Ela ye angiraye na muryangoni nde murisa wa zo ng'ondzi.
43010003	Ye murindzi ni kumuvugulira muryango ye murisa, na zo ng'ondzi nikusikira sauthiye kalaho anaziha na madzina na kuzilongoza ndze.
43010004	Akizamboza ndze, iye nikuzithangulia na zo ng'ondzi ni kumuthuwa, kwa kukala zinaimanya yo sauthiye.
43010005	Ng'ondzi zizo k'azidima kumuthuwa mut'u yoyosi mungine, hat'uhe zindamuchimbira ye mut'u, kwa kukala k'aziimanya iyo sauthiye."
43010006	Jesu waambira fumbo riri, ela k'amamanyire mana ya zho arizhokala anaambira.
43010007	Kwa vizho Jesu akinena nao kaheri, akiamba, "Ninamwambira ujeri wenye, mimi ndimi muryango wa zizo ng'ondzi.
43010008	Osini mariokudza mbere zangu were ni aivi na majambazi, ela zo ng'ondzi k'azisirikizire zizo sauthi zao bule.
43010009	Mimi ndimi muryango. Kila mut'u andiyengira kukirira kwangu andaokoka, andangira na kidza andambola na apate ndiso.
43010010	Mwivi akidza hat'u, nikukala adzire aiye, alage na anonge-nonge, ela mimi bai nakudza kwamba mupate uzima, na muupate thele kwa thele.
43010011	"Mimi ndimi murisa mudzo. Murisa mudzo yu thayari kufwa kwa ut'u wa zo ng'ondzi.
43010012	Ela mut'u wa kwandhikwa na ariye si murisa mudzo na kidza ariye zo ng'ondzi si zakwe, aonaho mbawa ni kuziricha zo ng'ondzi, na akachimbira. Bai mbawa ni kuzigwira zo ng'ondzi na nyingine zikatsamukana.
43010013	Ye wa kwandhikwa ni kuchimbira kwa kukala ni mwandhikwa na k'azijali bule zo ng'ondzi.
43010014	-
43010015	"Mimi ndimi murisa mudzo. Here dza Baba animanyazho mimi, nami namumanya iye, bai vizho ndo nami nimanyazho zo ng'ondzi zangu, nazo kidza zinanimanya mimi. Nami ni thayari kufwa kwa ut'u wa zizo.
43010016	Na kuna ng'ondzi zangu nyingine ambazo k'azi kahi za chaa kiki bule. Bai zizo nazo ninav̱irya nizirehe. Ng'ondzi zizo zindasikira sauthi yangu, na zindakala badhi mwenga na renye murisa mumwenga.
43010017	Iye Baba ananihendza kwa kukala ni thayari kulazha uzima wangu ili nidime kuuhokera kaheri.
43010018	K'akuna adimaye kuuhala kula kwangu uwo uzima wangu, ela ninahenda kuulazha kwa kuhendza mwenye. Nina wadimi wa kuulazha uzima wangu na nina wadimi wa kuuhala mwenye kaheri."
43010019	Marihosikira vivi o Ayahudi magazhikana kaheri.
43010020	Anji ao were manaamba, "Mut'u yuyu ana p'ep'o na kidza ana vilalu, munamusirikiza wani benwi?"
43010021	Ela angine were manaamba, "Mut'u ariye na p'ep'o k'adima kunena dza vivi. Adimadze p'ep'o kuhenda vipofu maone?"
43010022	Wakathi wa sikuk'uu ya Kukumbukira Kuhendywa Eri kwa ro Hekalu kuko Jerusalemu wafika. Nao wakathi uwo were ni wakathi wa mwaka.
43010023	Naye Jesu were anatsembera mo Hekaluni kahi za baraza riifwaro ra Selemani.
43010024	K'uzhona zho Ayahudi makimuzingira na makiamba, "We undahuhendya huaze-aze hatha rini? Kala ndiwe Masihi fwambire lwazu-lwazu thu."
43010025	Jesu akiadzigidzya akiamba, "At'u ninwi namwambira kare, ela k'amukuluhirire. Bai zo kazi zangu nihendazo kwa dzina ra Baba zinaninenera, zizo vizho zinanimanyisa kukala ni h'ani.
43010026	"Ela k'amukuluhira kwa kukala k'amu kahi za badhi rangu.
43010027	Mut'u mimi ninazimanya zo ng'ondzi zangu, nazo nikusikira sauthi yangu na zikanithuwa,
43010028	nami ninazigera uzima wa kare na kare, nazo k'azindafwa na k'akuna adimaye kunihoka bule.
43010029	Iye Baba ariyenip'a ni mubomu kuriko osi na k'akuna adimaye kuzinyagula kula mikononi mwa Baba.
43010030	Mimi na Baba hu kit'u kimwenga."
43010031	Kusikira vizho o Ayahudi makitsola mawe kaheri mamukot'e.
43010032	Jesu akiambira, "Nidzahenda mahendo manji madzo mbere zenu ambago Baba waniamba nigahende. Munamala kunikot'a mawe kwa hiro kahi za go?"
43010033	O Ayahudi makimudzigidzya makiamba, "K'ahumala kukukot'a mawe kwa mahendo madzo gogosi, ela kwa viryahu urizho unamukufuru Mulungu! Uwe u mudamu thu, ela unamala kudzihendya Mulungu."
43010034	Jesu akidzigidzya akiamba, "Zhaorwa kahi za Sheria yenu kukala Mulungu waambira angine, 'Ninwi mu milungu.'
43010035	Mulungu waaiha milungu aryahu ambao map'ewa uv̱oro na hunamanya kukala zho gaambazho go Maoro ni ujeri hatha kare na kare.
43010036	Vidze munamwamba iye ariyetsagulwa ni Baba na akihumwa urumwenguni, kukala anakufuru Mulungu kwa kukala naamba, 'Ni Mwana wa Mulungu'?
43010037	Kala sihenda kazi za Baba, k'ahana haja ya kunikuluhira.
43010038	Ela kala ninazihenda, ingahokala k'amunikuluhira munav̱irya kukuluhira zo kazi zangu, ili mumanye kamare-kamare kukala Baba yu ndani yangu, na mimi ni ndaniye."
43010039	K'uzhona zho kusikira vizho makijeza kumugwira kaheri, ela akihenyeza mikononi mwao.
43010040	Jesu akivuka kaheri nyangamo ya muho wa Jorodani hatha hat'u haryahu arihokala Johana wabat'iza at'u na akikala haho.
43010041	Na lola at'u anji makimudzirira makiamba, "Johana k'ahendere miujiza mibomu, ela gosi arigonena dzulu za mut'u yuyu were ni jeri."
43010042	Bai at'u anji kuko makimukuluhira Jesu.
43011001	Bai kwereko mut'u mumwenga ariyeifwa Lazaro. Mut'u yuyu were anaishi na nduguze airi a kiche mario were ni Maryamu na Marith'a ko mudzi wa Beth'ania. Siku mwenga akikala mukongo.
43011002	(Maryamu yuyu ni yuyahu ariyemumwagira mafuha Bwana maguluni na akigahangusa na nyereze. Bai iye ndiye ariyekala nduguye Lazaro k'adima.)
43011003	Bai ao nduguze a kiche makihuma uv̱oro kwa Jesu kuamba, "Bwana musenao wa kurya na kuusa ni mukongo."
43011004	Ela Jesu arihosikira akiamba, "Ukongo uu si wa kifwa, ela ni wa kumup'a nguma Mulungu. Na kwa ut'u wa ukongo uu, Mwana wa Mulungu andaluta nguma."
43011005	Jesu wamuhendza Marith'a hamwenga na Maryamu na ndugu yao Lazaro.
43011006	Gonya ko, arihosikira uv̱oro wa ukongo wa Lazaro k'aukire kare kwenda, ela watoa haho siku mbiri nyingine zaidhi.
43011007	Halafu ndo akiambira o anafundzie akiamba, "Hindeni Judea kaheri."
43011008	O anafundzi marihosikira vizho makimudzigidzya makiamba, "Rabi, dzuzi-dzuzi Ayahudi mamala kukukot'a mawe, na vino unamala kuuya kuko kaheri mbona?"
43011009	Jesu akiamba, "Mutsana una masaa kumi na mairi, hedu sozho? Bai mut'u akitsembera na mutsana k'akwala, kwa kukala anaona mulangaza wa urumwengu.
43011010	Ela akitsembera na usiku andakwala, kwa kukala k'ana mulangaza ndanimwe."
43011011	Jesu bada ya kunena vivi, achangeza akiamba, "Musena wehu Lazaro arere, ela nindakwenda nikamulamuse."
43011012	Kusikira vizho o anafundzi makiamba, "Kala arere andauka."
43011013	Ela Jesu were anaamba kukala adzanongeka, ela ao maona kukala arere uts'indzizi.
43011014	Bai Jesu akiambira lwazu-lwazu, "Lazaro adzafwa,
43011015	ela kwa ut'u wenu ninafwahirwa kukala sikalireho ili mudime kukuluhira. Ela nafwende ko kwakwe."
43011016	T'omasi aifwaye "P'ats'a" akiambira anafundzi andziye akiamba, "Hindeni nanwi, hukafwe naye."
43011017	Jesu arihofika Beth'ania akithekeza kukala Lazaro were wafwa na hatha were wazikwa kare siku ne zirizokira.
43011018	Mudzi wa Beth'ania were u hehi na Jerusalemu, kiasi cha maili mbiri vivi.
43011019	Bai Ayahudi anji mere madzire kuap'a p'ore Marith'a na Maryamu kwa ut'u wa cho kifwa cha ndugu yao.
43011020	K'uzhona zho Marith'a arihosikira Jesu anadza wambola kumudhana, ela Maryamu ye akisala mo nyumbani.
43011021	Ndiho Marith'a akimwamba Jesu, "Bwana kalaho were u haha ndugu yangu k'angafwere,
43011022	ela hatha vizho ninamanya kukala Mulungu andakup'a chochosi undichomuvoya."
43011023	Jesu akimwamba, "Nduguyo andafufuka."
43011024	Marith'a akidzigidzya, "Ninamanya kukala andafufuka siku ya mwisho."
43011025	Jesu akimwamba, "Mimi ndimi ufufulo na ndimi uzima. Iye anikuluhiraye mimi hatha akafwa kidza andakala moyo kaheri,
43011026	na ye ariye moyo na akinikuluhira, k'andafwa bule. Unagakuluhira go?"
43011027	Marith'a akiamba, "Ee Bwana, ninakukuluhira kukala ndiwe Masihi Mwana wa Mulungu ariyeambwa andakudza urumwenguni."
43011028	Marith'a arihogonya kunena vivi, wauya na achendamwiha nduguye Maryamu k'anda. Akimwamba, "Mwalimu adzire na anakurunga."
43011029	Bai Maryamu arihosikira vizho, akiuka haraka na achendamudhana.
43011030	Jesu were k'adzafika ho mudzini, ela were achere haryahu arihothunganana na Marith'a.
43011031	O Ayahudi mariokala manamuhuriza Maryamu mo nyumbani, marihoona viryahu adzizhombola haraka na kwenda ndze, makimuthuwa, makiona kukala anenda akarire ko mbirani.
43011032	Bai Maryamu arihofika haho arihokala Jesu, na kumona thu, akigwa maguluni hakwe. Akiamba, "Bwana, kalaho were u haha ndugu yangu k'angafwere."
43011033	Jesu arihomona anarira na o Ayahudi mariokudza naye nao manarira, achangirwa ni mbazi na akibudzyika moyoni mwakwe zhomu.
43011034	Akiuza akiamba, "Mwamulazahi kwani?" Makimwamba, "Bwana, ndzo uhalole!"
43011035	Jesu akirira.
43011036	Bai o Ayahudi makiamba, "Lolani zho arizhokala anamuhendza."
43011037	Ela ko angine makiamba, "Vidze ye ariyemuhendya mut'u asiyeona aone, vidze were k'angadimire kumuhendya yuno akatsafwa?"
43011038	Jesu akidzalwa ni mbazi kaheri, achenda ko mbirani. Yo mbira were ni p'anga iriyo na iwe ririrokinganywa ho mulomoni.
43011039	Bai Jesu akilagiza akiamba, "Usani ro iwe hedu." Marith'a nduguye ye mufwa akidzigidzya akiamba, "Kundakala na muruk'e mui Bwana, mana rero ni ne hangu azikwe."
43011040	Jesu akimwambira, "Vidze sikwambirire kukala undaona nguma ya Mulungu ukikuluhira?"
43011041	Bai makirusa ro iwe. Jesu akilola ko dzulu na akiamba, "Ninakulazhira muv̱era Baba, kwa kukala unanisikira.
43011042	Ninamanya kukala unanisikira siku zosi, ela ninanena vivi kwa ut'u wa aa haha ili makuluhire kukala wanihuma."
43011043	Bada ya kunena vivi akiluta mumiro kuiha. Akiamba, "Lazaro mbola kuno ndze!"
43011044	Ye mufwa achambola ndze na zo sandzaze na usowe were udzafungwa na kithambaa. Jesu akiamba, "H'aya muvuguleni athuwe shuhulize."
43011045	Bai Ayahudi anji mariokala madziremutsemberera Maryamu na mariokala mazhona vizho arizhohenda Jesu mamukuluhira.
43011046	Ela angine ao makwenda kwa Mafarisayo na machendaambira zho Jesu arizhokala adzahenda.
43011047	Bai alombi abomu na o Mafarisayo makiiha mukut'ano wa Baraza ra athumia na makiuzana-uzana makiamba, "Hundahendadze? Kwani mut'u yuyu anahenda miujiza minji.
43011048	Hukimuricha vivi andaenderera na kila mut'u andamukuluhira, na o Arumi mandakudzanonga-nonga ro Hekalu rehu na ts'i yehu yosi."
43011049	Kusikira vizho mumwenga wao aifwaye Kayafa ariyekala ndiye Mulombi mubomu mwenye mwaka uwo akiamba, "K'amuna mumanyaro.
43011050	K'amumanya kukala baha mut'u mumwenga kufwa kwa ut'u wa o at'u kuriko ts'i yosi kwanongwa?"
43011051	K'anenere vivi kwa akiliye mwenye, ela ni kwa kukala were nde Mulombi mubomu mwenye mwaka uwo, naye were anatabiri kukala Jesu were andafwa kwa ut'u wa Ayahudi.
43011052	Hatha vizho si kwa ao thu, ela pia kwamba aakundzumanye hamwenga at'u osi a Mulungu mariotsamukana makale kit'u kimwenga.

43015023	Mut'u adziyenimena mimi adzamumena hatha Baba naye.
43015024	Kala k'amayonere yo miujiza niriyohenda iriyo, k'akuna mut'u mungine ariyepata kuihenda kimbere, ngere k'amadima kupigwa ulongo kwamba ni adambi. Ela hatha bada ya kuona yo miujiza niriyoihenda, manimena mimi hamwenga na Baba.
43015025	Vivi zhakala ili ripate kuthimira neno ririroorwa kahi za Sheria yao, riambaro, 'Manimena bila chausa!'
43015026	"Ela andihokudza ye Mwavizi, nindiyemuhuma mimi kula kwa Baba, ambaye ni ye Roho wa ujeri, andamboza ushahidhi dzulu zangu mimi.
43015027	Hatha ninwi nanwi mundakala mashahidhi angu, kwa kukala ninwi ndinwi mudziokala hamwenga nami hangu chaho.
43016001	"Nidzamwambira maut'u gaga ili musiuye nyuma.
43016002	Kwani mandamuthenga kula kahi za masinagogi gao, na kidza zaidhi ya vivi kundakudza wakathi ambawo vindakala mut'u akikwalaga andaona here kwa kuhenda vizho anamuhumikira Mulungu.
43016003	Kidza mandahenda vizho, kwa kukala k'amamumanya Baba na k'amanimanya hatha mimi.
43016004	Ela nidzamwambira maut'u gaga kimbere ili wakathi wao wa kuhenda vivi ukifika mudime kukumbukira kukala namwambira kare. Simwambirire maut'u gaga hangu chaho, kwa kukala were ni hamwenga nanwi."
43016005	"Ela vivi ninenda kwa iye ariyenihuma, kidza k'ahana hatha mumwenga wenu anuzaye, 'Unendahi?'
43016006	Ela kwa kukala dzanena vivi, bai mioyo yenu idzadzalwa ni kigondzi.
43016007	Hatha vizho ninamwambira ujeri wenye, vindakala vidzo kwenu nichenda, mana kala sindakwenda ye Mwavizi k'andakudza kwenu, ela nichenda nindamuhuma kwenu.
43016008	Na andihokudza andauhenda urumwengu ung'alirwe lwazu-lwazu dzulu za dambi na ueri na hukumu.
43016009	Andaahendya mang'alirwe o at'u a urumwengu uu, kukala ni enye dambi kwa kukala k'amanikuluhira mimi.
43016010	Andaahendya mang'alirwe o at'u a urumwengu kukala ni muhachi kwa kukala ninenda kwa Baba nanwi k'amundanona kaheri.
43016011	Andaahendya mang'alirwe o at'u a urumwengu kukala Mulungu nde jaji kwa kukala wagonya kare kumuhukumu muthawali wa urumwengu uu.
43016012	"Mut'u mimi nina maut'u manji zaidhi ga kunena nanwi, ela gandakala manji nanwi zhomu kwa wakathi uu.
43016013	Ela ye Roho aung'azaye ujeri akidza andamulongoza kwenye ujeri wosi, mana k'andanena kwa wadimi wa kwakwe mwenye, ela andanena kila kit'u andichosikira kula kwangu na kidza andamwambira maut'u gandigokudza.
43016014	Iye andanip'a nguma, kwa kukala andahala go nindigonena na amwambire ninwi.
43016015	Gosi garigo ga Baba ni gangu, ndosa namwambira kukala Roho andahala maneno gangu na amwambire ninwi."
43016016	"Kwa muda muchache k'amundanona kaheri, na kidza bada ya muda muchache mundanona kaheri."
43016017	Bai anafundzi a kwakwe angine makiuzana-uzana, makiamba, "Ni noni vino afwambirazho kukala, 'Kwa muda muchache k'amundanona na kidza kaheri kwa muda muchache mundanona,' na gonya anaamba anenda kwa Babaye?"
43016018	Makienderera kuuzana-uzana, makiamba, "Mana ya kuamba, 'Muda muchache' ni noni? Siswi be hatha k'ahumanya mana ya vivi ni noni."
43016019	Bai Jesu akimanya cho marichokala manamala kumuza akiamba, "Vidze vino ndizho muuzanazho enye kwa enye kukala manaye ni noni kuamba, 'Kwa muda muchache k'amundanona na kaheri kwa muda muchache mundanona kaheri?'
43016020	Ninamwambira ujeri wenye kukala kwa muda muchache udzao mundarira na kubagarikwa ni matsozi, ela at'u a urumwengu mandafwahirwa. Mundashononeka, ela kaheri kwa muda muchache kushononeka kwenu, kundagaluka furaha.
43016021	Wakathi wa utsungu wa mwanamuche amalaye kuzhala ukifika, ye mwanamuche nikukala ana kigondzi. Ela agonyaho kuzhala mwanawe ni kusahau wo utsungu. Vivi ni kwa sababu ya iyo furaha ya kureha mwana dhuniani.
43016022	Ninwi vivi muna kigondzi, ela mimi nindamona kaheri na mioyo yenu indadzala furaha, furaha ambayo k'akuna adimaye kuyusa kwenu.
43016023	Siku iyo ikidza mimi k'amundanivoya kit'u, kwani ninamwambira ujeri kukala ye Baba andamup'a chochosi mundichovoya kwa dzina rangu.
43016024	Ninwi hatha warero k'amudzangwe kuvoya chochosi kwa dzina rangu, bai voyani nanwi mundapata ili furaha yenu ikamilike.
43016025	Vivi nidzanena nanwi kwa mafumbo, ela wakathi unadza ambaho nindanena nanwi, lwazu-lwazu dzulu za ye Baba.
43016026	Siku iyo ikidza mundavoya kwa dzina rangu, nami siamba kukala nindamuvoya Baba kwa ut'u wenu bule.
43016027	Kwani Baba mwenye anamuhendza, kwa kukala ninwi enye munanihendza na munakuluhira kukala nambola kwa Baba.
43016028	Nambola kwa Baba na nikidza haha urumwenguni na vino kaheri ninauka urumwenguni, na ninauya kwa Baba."
43016029	Ndo anafundzie makiamba, "K'ona zho, vikara k'unena naswi kimafumbo kaheri, ela unanena naswi lwazu-lwazu.
43016030	Vikara hunamanya kukala unamanya kila kit'u, na kwamba k'umala mut'u akuze maswali, kwa ut'u uu hunakuluhira kukala wala kwa Mulungu."
43016031	Ndo Jesu akiadzigidzya akiamba, "Vidze vikara munakuluhira?
43016032	Bai wakathi unadza, na hatha udzafika kare, ambawo mundatsamukana kila mut'u kwao-kwao na muniriche h'akiyangu. Ela hatha vizho si h'akiyangu bule, mana Baba a hamwenga nami.
43016033	Bai nidzamwambira vivi ili mukale na dheri kwa kukala kit'u kimwenga nami. Kahi za urumwengu uu, mundapata thabu, ela dzip'eni moyo mana mimi nidzaushinda urumwengu."
43017001	Bada ya Jesu kugonya kunena vivi, walola dzulu mulunguni na akivoya, "Baba wakathi udzafika. Bai mup'e nguma Mwanao, ili iye Mwanao naye akup'e nguma.
43017002	Mana wamup'a wadimi dzulu za at'u osi kwamba adime kuap'a uzima wa kare na kare osi uriomup'a.
43017003	Vikara uzima wa kare na kare ni uu, kwamba makumanye uwe Mulungu wa jeri na wa h'akeye na Jesu Masihi uriyemuhuma.
43017004	Mimi nidzakurehera nguma dhuniani kwa kuimarigiza yo kazi uriyonip'a niihende.
43017005	Vikara Baba, nip'a nguma, nip'a nguma iryahu niriyokala nayo nirihokala hamwenga nawe kabila urumwengu k'audzaumbwa."
43017006	"Mut'u mimi nidzaahendya ao at'u urionip'a kula kahi za urumwengu makumanye. At'u ao were ni ako nao ukinip'a nao makirigwira nenoro.
43017007	Vikara vivi manamanya kukala kila kit'u niricho nacho kila kwako,
43017008	kwani mimi naambira maneno urigonip'a na makigakubali. Kwa vizho madzamanya kwa hakika kukala nala kwako, na madzakuluhira kukala ndiwe uriyenihuma.
43017009	"Bai ninaavoyera. Siavoyera at'u a urumwengu, ela naavoyera aryahu urionip'a, mana ni ako.
43017010	Osi nirio nao ni ako na osi urio nao ni angu, nami ninap'ewa nguma kwa ao.
43017011	Vikara mimi si mumu urumwenguni kaheri, ninadza kwako uwe Baba uriye mueri. Ela aa machere mumu urumwenguni, bai arinde kwa nguvu za dzinaro, riryahu dzina urironip'a, ili makale kit'u kimwenga here mimi na uwe hurizho kit'u kimwenga.
43017012	Bai nirihokala ni hamwenga nao nakala nikiarinda kahi za dzinaro. Naarinda osi urionip'a na k'ahana ariyengamika isihokala ye ariye were suthi angamike ili Maoro gathimire.
43017013	Ela vikara ninadza kwako, ela ninanena maut'u gaga vivi nirizho nichere haha dhuniani, ili furaha yao ikamilike ndani mwao.
43017014	Nidzaap'a nenoro, na at'u a urumwengu uu, madzaamena mana ao si at'u a urumwengu kaheri here mimi nirizho si mut'u wa urumwengu.
43017015	Voyo rangu si kwamba uause kula haha urumwenguni, ela uarinde na ye Mui.
43017016	Ao si at'u a urumwengu here mimi nirizho si mut'u wa urumwengu.
43017017	Ahende aeri kwa wo ujeri, mana nenoro ndo ujeri.
43017018	Nidzaahuma kwa at'u a urumwengu here uwe urizhonihuma kwa at'u a urumwengu uu.
43017019	Na kwa ut'u wa aa ninadzilazha kwako ili ao nao madzilazhe kwako kamare-kamare."
43017020	"Mimi siavoyera aa h'akiyao, ela naavoyera na aryahu mandionikuluhira kukirira kwa neno ra aa,
43017021	ili ao osi makale kit'u kimwenga h'ewe Baba, here urizho uwe u ndani yangu na mimi ni ndani mwako. Bai nao makale ndani yehu ili urumwengu udime kukuluhira kukala uwe ndiwe uriyenihuma.
43017022	Mimi naap'a nguma dza iryahu uriyonip'a, ili makale kit'u kimwenga here siswi hurizho kit'u kimwenga.
43017023	Mimi ni ndani yao na uwe u ndani yangu. Bai ao nao makale kit'u kimwenga kamare, ili urumwengu udime kumanya kukala uwe ndiwe uriyenihuma. Kidza madime kumanya kukala unaahendza here unihendzazho mimi.
43017024	"Baba, ninahendza aryahu osi urionip'a makale hamwenga nami ho niriho na maone nguma yangu. Ii ndo nguma ambayo wanip'a kabila urumwengu k'audzaumbwa, mana wanihendza.
43017025	Baba uriye muhachi, idzahokala at'u a urumwengu k'amakumanya, mimi ninakumanya na o at'u angu manamanya kukala uwe ndiwe uriyenihuma.
43017026	Mimi nidzaamanyisa uwe, na nindaenderera kukuhendya makumanye ili go mahendzo urigo nago kwangu, gakale mioyoni mwao, na mimi nami nikale kit'u kimwenga nao."
43018001	Bai bada ya Jesu kugonya kunena maneno gaga, waahala o anafundzie na akiuka hat'u haho. Machenda na makivuka det'e ra Kidironi kurikokala kuna chunga kithithe cha mizeituni na machangira mumo.
43018002	Vikara Juda ariyekala andamusaliti Jesu, were anahamanya hat'u haho, mana Jesu na anafundzie makala makithunganana haho mara kwa mara.
43018003	Bai Juda akidza haho kuno analongoza kundi ra at'u. Kahi za kundi riro kwere kuna arindzi a ro Hekalu mariokala madzambola kwa o alombi abomu na Mafarisayo. Angine kahi zao ao mere ni shikari a Kirumi. Bai kundi riri were ridzatsukula mataa na zhenje na silaha.
43018004	Jesu were anagamanya kare gago gandigohendeka kwakwe. Bai akiasongerera na akiuza, "Munamumala h'ani?"
43018005	Makimudzigidzya makiamba, "Hunamumala Jesu wa Nazareth'i." Akiamba, "Ni mimi!" Bai Juda, musaliti were a hamwenga nao o at'u.
43018006	O at'u marihosikira Jesu akiamba, "Ni mimi," makiuya na nyuma na makigwa.
43018007	Akiuza kaheri akiamba, "Munamumala h'ani?" Makiamba, "Hunamumala Jesu wa Nazareth'i."
43018008	Jesu akiamba, "Nidzamwambira kare kukala ni mimi. Vikara kwa kukala munimalaye ni mimi, aricheni aa anafundzi angu mende."
43018009	Jesu wanena vivi kwamba Maoro gathimire kukala, "O urionip'a singamizire hatha mumwenga."
43018010	Simoni P'et'ero were ana mushu. Akiwamboza chowani mwakwe na akimutosa sikiro ra kurya ye muhumiki wa Mulombi mubomu mwenye. Muhumiki yuyu dzinare were ni Maliko.
43018011	Ela Jesu akimwambira P'et'ero, akiamba, "Wudzye chowani mwakwe wo mushuwo. Baba adzanip'a kikombe kiki cha dhiki, vidze nisikinwe?"
43018012	Gonya yuyahu kilongozi mubomu wa o shikari akiambira o shikarie hamwenga na o arindzi a Hekalu mamugwire Jesu. Nao makimugwira makimufunga.
43018013	Gonya makimuhirika kwa Anasi. Anasi were ni mutsedza wa Kayafa ariyekala ndiye Mulombi mubomu mwenye mwaka uwo.
43018014	Kayafa yuyu ndiye mut'u aremboza ojo kahi za mashauri ga Ayahudi kwamba vinav̱irya mut'u mumwenga afwe kwa ut'u wa anji.
43018015	Bai Simoni P'et'ero hamwenga na mwanafundzi mwandziwe makimuthuwa Jesu. Mwanafundzi yuyu mungine were manamanyana na ye Mulombi mubomu, kwa vizho iye achangira hamwenga na Jesu ho muhalani ha ye Mulombi mubomu mwenye.
43018016	Ela P'et'ero k'afikire ho muhalani, waima ko ndze muv̱iryani. Ndo yuyahu mwanafundzi mungine ariyekala anamanyana na ye Mulombi mubomu mwenye arihomona P'et'ero aimire ndze, wamuuyira na akidzanena na musichana ariyekala zamu ho muv̱iryani. Bai ndizho P'et'ero naye akiruhusiwa kwangira ho muhalani.
43018017	Yuyahu musichana akimulolat'o P'et'ero na akimwamba, "We k'umumwenga wa anafundzi a Jesu bule?" Ela P'et'ero akiamba, "Hatha si mwanafundzi wa mut'u yuyahu mino."
43018018	Bai ahumiki angine na arindzi were madzaasha makala na maimire haho kuoha wo moho, kwa kukala were kuna p'eho. P'et'ero naye akiima hehi nawo akioha.
43018019	Bai yuyahu Mulombi mubomu mwenye akimuza-muza Jesu maswali dzulu za mafundishoge na dzulu za anafundzie.
43018020	Jesu akimudzigidzya akimwamba, "Mimi nidzakala nikiafundisha at'u kila wakathi lwazu-lwazu. Nafundisha kila wakathi kahi za hat'u ambaho Ayahudi ehu kwa kawaida ni kuthunganana hasa kahi za masinagogi na kahi za mihala ya ro Hekalu. Sidzangwe kufundisha at'u kisiri.
43018021	Kwanoni unanuza mimi? Kala unamala umanye mafundisho nifundishago, auze ao marionisikira. Ao ndo mamanyao mafundisho gangu."
43018022	Jesu arihogonya kunena vivi, mumwenga wa o arindzi ariyekala aimire hehi naye wamwangiza mbalahi ya usoni, akimudumulira akiamba, "Zho ndo at'u mamudzigidzyazho Mulombi mubomu mwenye?"
43018023	Jesu akimwamba, "Kala dzanena neno rii, nambira, ni hiro. Ela kala sinenere rii, bai udzanipigirani?"
43018024	Gonya ndo Anasi akimuhirika Jesu kwa ye Kayafa, Mulombi mubomu mwenye kuno adzafungwa.
43018025	Ela iye Simoni P'et'ero were achere anaoha moho. Bai at'u makimuza makiamba, "We k'umumwenga wa anafundzi a yuya mut'u?" P'et'ero akikanaiza akiamba, "Hatha!"
43018026	Gonya mut'u mungine akinena. Naye were ni muhumiki wa ye Mulombi mubomu mwenye. Mut'u yuyu were ana umanyi wa hehi na yuyahu mut'u ariyetoswa sikiro ni P'et'ero. Akimuza naye, akiamba, "We sikonere hamwenga na Jesu kurya chungani?"
43018027	Ndo P'et'ero akikanaiza kaheri na haho henye jogolo rikiika.
43018028	Kidza dzuwa ririhokala ridzaandza kwombola makimuhala Jesu kula kahi za nyumba ya Kayafa hatha ko nyumbani kwa luwali P'ilato. O Ayahudi k'amangirire bule mo nyumbani kwa kugoha masidzangize nyenye, sidze makakosa kurya P'asaka.
43018029	Ndo P'ilato achambola mo nyumbani akiathuwa ho marihokala akiauza akiamba, "Vidze ni ut'u wani hasa uwi ambawo munaamba wauhenda?"
43018030	Ao Ayahudi makidzigidzya makiamba, "Kala mut'u yuyu k'ahendere uwi k'ahungamurehere kwako!"
43018031	P'ilato akiadzigidzya akiamba, "Muhaleni enye mumuhukumu kuthuwirizana na sheria yenu." Ela aryahu Ayahudi makikahala makiamba, "K'ahuna amulo ra kulagiza mut'u alagwe."
43018032	Vivi zhahendeka ili neno arirokala Jesu warinena dzulu za andizhofwa ripate kuthimira.
43018033	Kidza P'ilato achangira kaheri mo nyumbani mwakwe. Akimwiha Jesu akimuza akiamba, "Vidze we ndiwe muthawali wa Ayahudi?"
43018034	Jesu akimudzigidzya akiamba, "Unauza swali riri kitswacho hedu unanena kwa kukala udzambirwa ni at'u vizho?"
43018035	P'ilato akidzigidzya akiamba, "Unaona kukala ni Muyahudi mino? Ni o alombi abomu, na o at'u akwenu ndo madziokureha kwangu."
43018036	Jesu akidzigidzya akiamba, "Uthawali wangu si wa urumwengu uu. Kalaho uthawali wangu ni wa urumwengu uu, at'u angu, kwa hakika ngere madzaheha na aryahu Ayahudi ili masinigwire. Ela bai uthawali wangu si wa urumwengu."
43018037	Kidza P'ilato akimuza akiamba, "Kwa vizho u muthawali uwe?" Jesu akiamba, "Uwe ndiwe uriye unaamba kukala ni muthawali. Mut'u mimi nakudza urumwenguni na nikizhalwa kwamba nifundishe ujeri. Kila mut'u adzekusudhia kumanya na kuthuwa ujeri, andanisikira."
43018038	P'ilato akiuza akiamba, "Ujeri ni noni?" Arihogonya kunena vizho, achambola ndze, achenda kwa o Ayahudi mariokala madzamushithaki Jesu akiamba, "Mut'u yuyu simona na kosa!
43018039	Ela ni adha renu wakathi uu wa sikuk'uu yenu ya P'asaka humuvugulire mufungwa mumwenga yoyosi mundiyeamba. Vidze munahendza nimuvulire yuno muthawali wa Ayahudi?"
43018040	Ela o Ayahudi makipiga londzo na kuamba, "Si mut'u yuyu, k'ahuna v̱ata naye, hat'u ha yuyu muvugule Baraba!" Yuyahu Baraba were ni jambazi.
43019001	Gonya P'ilato akilagiza Jesu apigwe vikotho.
43019002	Kidza ao shikari, makitengeza kiremba cha miya na makimuvika Jesu kitswani. Kidza makihala riguwo ra rangi ya zambarau makimuvika.
43019003	Na makiamba, "K'una ut'u muheshimiwa muthawali wa Ayahudi?" Na makimupiga makofi.
43019004	P'ilato achambola mo nyumbani kaheri na akiambira o Ayahudi akiamba, "Nindamwambozera haha ndze yuyu mut'u, mumanye kukala siona kukala adzahenda kihendo kii chochosi."
43019005	Bai Jesu achambola ndze kuno adzavala kirembache cha miya na riguwo ra zambarau. Gonya P'ilato akiambira o at'u, "H'aya thiyuno!"
43019006	Bai o alombi abomu na arindzi ao marihomona Jesu, mapiga k'ululu na kuamba, "Musulubishe! Musulubishe!" P'ilato akiadzigidzya akiamba, "Muhaleni enye, mumusulubishe. Kwani mino simona na kosa rorosi."
43019007	Aryahu Ayahudi makimujibu makiamba, "Siswi huna sheria, na kulingana na sheria iyo vinav̱irya afwe, kwa kukala wadziamba ni Mwana wa Mulungu."
43019008	Bai P'ilato arihosikira maneno gaga, wakaza kungirwa ni woga zaidhi.
43019009	Kidza achangira kaheri mo nyumbani mwakwe, hamwenga na Jesu. Gonya akimuza akiamba, "Kwenu ni hiko we?" Ela Jesu akinyamala zii.
43019010	Ndo, P'ilato akimuza akiamba, "Mbona k'unidzigidzya? Unamanya mino nina wadimi wa kukuricha huru hedu kukusulubisha?"
43019011	Jesu akimudzigidzya akiamba, "K'ungere na wadimi wa kuhenda kit'u chochosi kwangu, kala kup'ewerwe wadimi uwo kula dzulu mulunguni. Kwa vizho ye mut'u adziyenireha kwako adzahenda dambi bomu kuriko uwe."
43019012	Neno riri ra Jesu ramuhendya P'ilato alole ngira yoyosi ya kumuricha Jesu huru. Ela aryahu Ayahudi makipiga londzo kudzigidzya, "Ukimuruhusu mut'u yuyu akale huru be hundamanya kukala k'u musena wa Kaisari. Unamanya kukala mut'u akidziamba ni muthawali haha, be a kinyume cha Kaisari."
43019013	P'ilato arihosikira vizho akimwamboza Jesu ko ndze kaheri. Kidza akikelesi kahi za kihiche cha hukumu kiricho were ki hat'u haifwaho Muhala wa Mawe ambaho kwa luga ya Kieburania hanaifwa Gabath'a.
43019014	Siku ii were ni siku ya Kuthayarishira P'asaka, saa here sitha vivi. P'ilato akiambira o Ayahudi akiamba, "H'aya Muthawali wenu siye!"
43019015	Ela ao makipiga k'ululu makiamba, "Muse! Muse! Musulubishe!" P'ilato akiauza akiamba, "Vidze munamala nimusulubishe muthawali wenu?" O alombi abomu makimudzigidzya makiamba, "Siswi k'ahuna muthawali mungine isihokala Kaisari."
43019016	Kidza P'ilato akimulazha Jesu kwao mamusulubishe.
43019017	Bai makimuhala Jesu na machenda naye kuno adzatsukula musalabawe muhaka hat'u haifwaho Ribeshe ra Kitswa hedu kwa Kieburania Gologoth'a.
43019018	Haho makimusulubisha hamwenga na at'u angine airi, mumwenga kuku na mungine kuku, na Jesu akikala a ho kahikahi yao.
43019019	Kabila ya vivi P'ilato were adzalagiza kukala maore kibao. Kidza akilagiza kwamba cho kibao makilunganye na wo musalaba na kukiora vivi: Jesu Wa Nazareth'i, Muthawali Wa Ayahudi.
43019020	Haryahu hat'u marihokala mamusulubisha Jesu were ni hehi na wo mudzi. Ndosa Ayahudi anji makishoma cho kibao, nacho chere chaorwa kahi za luga ya Kieburania na ya Kiyunani na ya Kilatini.
43019021	Kidza aryahu alombi abomu a Kiyahudi makimwamba P'ilato, "Usiore 'Muthawali wa Ayahudi,' ela ora kukala yuyu mut'u wadziamba, 'Mimi ni Muthawali wa Ayahudi.' "
43019022	Ela P'ilato akiamba, "Vizho nidzizhondhika ni vizho."
43019023	Shikari aryahu marihogonya kumusulubisha Jesu magazha mavwaloge kahi za mafungu mane, ili kila shikari apate fungu. Ela k'amatharurire valore ra ndani bule. Riryahu valo ra ndani rere k'arigwizanyirwe na ringine mana rere rashonwa rere mwenga.
43019024	Ndosa shikari makiambirana, "Nahusiritharure, hat'uhe nahuripigire k'ura hulole chamba rindahalwa ni h'ani." Vivi virihokala zhathimiza garyahu Maoro gaambago, "Magazha nguwo zangu na valo rangu ra ndani makiripigira k'ura."
43019025	Bai vizho ndizho marizhohenda o shikari. Hehi na ho musalabani were haimire mameye Jesu na nduguye iye mameye na Maryamu mukaza Kilopa, na Maryamu Magidalena.
43019026	Kidza Jesu arihomona mameye na ye mwanafundzi ariyemuhendza aimire hehi, akimwamba mameye, "M'ama, lola yuyu vikara nde mwanao"
43019027	Gonya akimwambira yuyahu mwanafundzi akiamba, "Vikara yuyu nde mameyo" Bai yuyahu mwanafundzi bada ya vivi akimuhala ye Maryamu mameye Jesu na achenda naye mudzini kwakwe.
43019028	Badaye Jesu kuno akimanya kukala adzagonya kaziye yosi, akiamba, "Nina k'ihu" Bai Maoro gakithimira.
43019029	Na haho were hana kiya kithele siki. Bai makihala buwa makirivika mo sikini, gonya makimugolozeza Jesu anyunye.
43019030	Bai Jesu akinyunya ro siki, na akiamba, "Vidzagoma." Gonya akizanya kitswache akitoka roho.
43019031	Vikara kwa kukala were ni siku ya kuthayarishira Sabato, o Ayahudi were k'amendzi yo miri isale ho misalabani kahi za yo siku ya Sabato, mana yo Sabato iyo were ni bomu. Bai machendamuvoya P'ilato kukala go magulu ga o asulubiwa gabandwe.
43019032	Kwa vizho shikari machendabanda magulu ga yuyahu wa kwandza na ga yuyahu wa hiri,
43019033	ela marihofika kwa Jesu makiona kukala adzagonya kufwa, kwa vizho k'amabandire maguluge.
43019034	Ela shikari mumwenga akimudunga fumo ra lwavuni. Bai vichache zhenye milatso na madzi vichambola kula kahi za ro ranga ra lwavuni.
43019035	Ye muori wa maut'u gaga waona gakihendeka naye adzanena dzulu ya ut'u uu ili ninwi nanwi mukuluhire. Go arigoganena ni ga ujeri naye anamanya kukala ananena ujeri.
43019036	Bai vivi zhathimiza go Maoro gaambago, "K'amandabanda musozawe hatha mumwenga."
43019037	Na kidza kuna Maoro mangine gaambago, "Mandamulola iye mariyemudunga fumo."
43019038	Bada ya vivi mut'u mumwenga wa mudzi wa Arimath'ea aifwaye Josefu achendamuza P'ilato, kala anadima kuuhala mwiri wa Jesu akauzike. Yuyu Josefu were ni mwanafundzi wa Jesu wa kisiri-siri, kwa kukala were anaagoha o Ayahudi. Bai P'ilato akikubali. Kwa vizho Josefu achendamuhala Jesu.
43019039	Kidza Nikodemu ariyekala ho chaho wamwendera Jesu na usiku wakwenda na marashi manji sana garigo uzihowe were ni here rathili gana mwenga. Marashi gaga were ni mutsanganyiko wa manemane na udhi.
43019040	O anaalume airi mauhala wo mwiri wa Jesu na makiulinga-linga ts'andza ya kitani na go marashi here adha ra Kiyahudi ra kuthayarisha lufu lukazikwe ririzho.
43019041	Vikara haho Jesu arihosulubiwa were hana munda na kahi za wo munda were hana mbira mbisha ambayo were k'aidzazikwa mut'u.
43019042	Bai kwa kukala were ni siku ya Kiyahudi ya Mathayarisho na kwa kukala were yo mbira i hehi, makimwika Jesu mumo.
43020001	Bai siku ya kwandza ya wiki irihofika, Maryamu Magidalena wakwenda ko mbirani arikozikwa Jesu wakathi kurihokala kuchere kimidhimidhi. Arihofika haho, akiona ro iwe ririroikwa ho mulomoni mwa yo mbira ridzauswa.
43020002	Arihoona kukala mwiri wa Jesu k'aumo, akiuya nyuma malo. Na achendamona P'et'ero na yuyahu mwanafundzi ariyehendzwa ni Jesu sana. Akiambira, "Madzamuhala ye Bwana wehu kula mo mbirani! K'ahumanya chamba madzakwendamwika hiko."
43020003	Kidza P'et'ero na yuyahu mwanafundzi mungine makiuka haraka na machenda malo kuko mbirani.
43020004	Osi makot'a malo, ela yuyahu mwanafundzi mungine akimukira P'et'ero. Iye nde ariyefika ho mbirani kimbere.
43020005	Bai akizama na akitsungurira mo mbirani. Akiona zo nguwo za ts'andza haho, ela ye mwenye k'angirire mo mbirani bule.
43020006	Badaye Simoni P'et'ero naye akidza. Achangira mo mbirani haraka na akizona zo nguwo za ts'andza zi haho.
43020007	Iryahu nguwo iriyokala yafungwa Jesu kitswani yere i haho, nayo yere k'aihamwenga na zo nguwo nyingine, ela yere idzakundzwa t'ot'ot'o na idzaikwa k'anda.
43020008	Kidza yuyahu mwanafundzi mungine, ariyekala adzafika haho kimbere, wangira mumo na akikuluhira.
43020009	Vikara kufikira wakathi uu o anafundzi were k'amadzangwe kuelewa mana ya go Maoro, kukala Jesu were suthi afufuke.
43020010	Gonya aryahu anafundzi makiuya kwao madzumbani.
43020011	Maryamu arihouya ko mbirani waungarara ko ndze, kuno anarira. Bai arihokala anarira, akizama na akitsungurira mo mbirani,
43020012	na akiona malaika airi. Malaika ao were madzavala nguwo nyaruhe tse. Nao mere makelesi haho harihokala haikwa mwiri wa Jesu. Mumwenga were akelesi haho harihokala kitswa cha Jesu, na ye mungine were akelesi ho harihokala magulu ga Jesu.
43020013	Bai makinena na Maryamu makiamba, "Unarizwa ni noni, m'ama?" Akiadzigidzya, akiamba, "Bwana wangu adzahalwa na simanya chamba madzamwikahi!"
43020014	Kugonya kunena vizho, akigaluka. Bai arihogaluka akimona Jesu aimire haho, ela k'amumanyire bule.
43020015	Ndo Jesu akinena naye akiamba, "Unarizwa ni noni m'ama? Vidze una mut'u umumalaye?" Kwa kukala Maryamu waona kukala ye mut'u ni mutsundzi wa ho hat'u akimwambira, "Bwana, kala ndiwe udziyemusa nakuvoya unambire ko udzikomwika, ili nimuhale."
43020016	Ndo Jesu akiamba, "Maryamu!" Maryamu arihosikira vizho akinula kitswa akihika Kieburania, "Raboni!" (Raboni manaye ni mwalimu.)
43020017	Jesu akiamba, "Sinigut'e bule, mana sidzangwe kwenda dzulu kwa Baba. Uwe, enda kwa o ndugu zangu ukaambire vivi, 'Mimi ni hehi na kuuya kwa Baba ariye nanwi ni Babiyenu, ninauya kwa Mulungu, ariye nanwi ni Mulungu wenu.' "
43020018	Bai Maryamu Magidalena achendaambira o anafundzi, akiamba, "Nidzamona Bwana benwi!" Gonya akiathalira zho arizhokala Bwana adzaamba.
43020019	Siku iyo yenye kurihotswa aryahu anafundzi a Jesu mere madzakundzumanyika hamwenga ndani ya nyumba. Nao mere madzafunga muryango kwa kuaogoha o Ayahudi. Bai haho henye Jesu akiambolera. Akialamusa, akiamba, "Dheri narikale kwenu."
43020020	Bada ya kualamusa akianyesa go magandzage na lo lwavulwe. Bai o anafundzie marihomona Bwana mafwahirwa zhomu.
43020021	Gonya Jesu akiambira kaheri akiamba, "Dheri narikale nanwi. Dza here Baba arizhonihuma, bai nami ninamuhuma."
43020022	Gonya akiasohera na akiamba, "H'aya hokerani Roho Mweri.
43020023	Mukimusamehe mut'u dambize, bai Mulungu andamusamehe dambize. Musihomusamehe mut'u dambize, bai Mulungu k'andamusamehe mut'u iye dambize."
43020024	Vikara wakathi Jesu arihoonana na anafundzie T'omasi were k'ahamwenga nao. Yuyu T'omasi were ni mumwenga wa anafundzi kumi na airi a Jesu. Dzinare ringine were anaifwa P'ats'a.
43020025	Badaye aryahu anafundzi angine makimwambira T'omasi, makiamba, "Hudzamona Bwana bewe!" Ela iye akiamba, "Sindakuluhira kamare muhaka mimi mwenye nione go makushu ga misumari mo magandzani na nigagut'e na chala changu, kidza niike gandza rangu dzulu za ro kushu ra lwavuni mwakwe."
43020026	Bada ya siku nane, anafundzi a Jesu mere madzakundzumanyika kaheri kahi za nyumba iryahu. Wakathi uu T'omasi were a hamwenga nao. Vichache zhenye Jesu akidza akiima mbere zao, ingahokala were madzafunga miryango na ndani. Akialamusa akiamba, "Dheri narikale nanwi."
43020027	Gonya akimwamba T'omasi, "H'aya lola gano magandza gangu hedu, gut'a hano na chalacho kidza goloza wo mukonowo hedu ugut'e lwavu lwangu. Richa mioyo miri-miri na ukuluhire."
43020028	Bai T'omasi akiamba, "Bwana wangu na Mulungu wangu!"
43020029	Jesu akimwamba, "Udzakuluhira kwa kukala udzanona, ela baha at'u aryahu makuluhirao hasiho kuona."
43020030	Vikara Jesu wahenda miujiza minji mingine mbere za anafundzie ambayo siihadzire kahi za chuwo kiki.
43020031	Ela nidzaora dzulu ya miujiza ii michache kwamba mudime kukuluhira kukala Jesu nde iye Masihi, Mwana wa Mulungu na kwa kukuluhira, mukale na uzima wa kare na kare kahi za dzinare.
43021001	Badaye Jesu waambolera anafundzie kaheri kahi za ziya ra Tiberia. Nazho zhakala kivivi:
43021002	Simoni P'et'ero, na T'omasi ambaye dzina ringine waifwa P'ats'a, na Nath'anieli ariye kwao were ni K'ana ya Galilaya, na ana a Zebedayo na anafundzi airi angine, were ma hamwenga.
43021003	Ndo Simoni P'et'ero akiambira o andziye akiamba, "Nenda nikavuhe makumba." Aryahu angine nao makiamba, "Hunakuthuwa." Kwa vizho machangira dauni. Were ni usiku ho marihokwendavuha makumba. Makichesa kuvuha makumba, ela k'amagwirire kit'u.
43021004	Kurihokala kunang'ala-ng'ala, Jesu waima ko ngokani, ela anafundzi k'amamanyire kukala ni Jesu.
43021005	Jesu akiluta mumiro akiamba, "Anangu, muna makumba ko?" Makidzigidzya, "Ii hatha!"
43021006	Ndo Jesu akiambira, "Tsuhani kimia chenu mukono wa kurya wa ro dau na mundagwira makumba kuko." Ndo makitsuha cho kimia mukono wa kurya wa dau. Bai makumba manji gachangira mo kimiani na gakigwirwa hatha k'amadimire kukivuha cho kimia na kuchangiza mo dauni kwa go makumba manji!
43021007	-
43021008	Bai yuyahu mwanafundzi ariyehendzwa ni Jesu arihoona kit'u kicho, akimwamba P'et'ero, "Yuyahu ni Bwana bewe." Bai Simoni arihosikira maneno gago, akidzifunga yo nguwoye ya ndze mo chununi, kwani were adzaivula. Bai P'et'ero akidzitsuha mo madzini, ela aryahu anafundzi angine makidza na ro dau, kwani were k'amakure na yo ts'i furufu, kula ho marihokala na ko ts'i furufu were ni here ure wa mikono gana. Bai o anafundzi were manakivuha cho kimia kidzichodzala makumba na ro dau.
43021009	K'uzhona zho marihofika k'anda-k'anda ya ro ziya makiona moho wa makala na makumba garokala ganakanjwa, na ho k'anda were hana mikahe.
43021010	Ndo Jesu akiambira, "Nireherani sehemu ya go makumba murigo mula kugwirani hedu."
43021011	Bai Simoni P'et'ero akikivuha cho kimia muhaka ko k'anda-k'anda ya ziya. Cho kimia were kithele mikumba mibomu-mibomu, gana na mirongo mitsano na mihahu; na ingahokala were ni minji namuna iyo cho kimia k'akitharukire bule.
43021012	Gonya Jesu akiambira, "Ndzoni mufungule hano." Na k'ahana hatha mumwenga kahi za o anafundzi ariyethatha kumwamba, "We u h'ani," kwani mamanya kukala iye ni Bwana.
43021013	Bai Jesu achenda ho mohoni, akihala yo mikahe akiap'a, gonya akihala makumba nago akiap'a.
43021014	Ii were ni k'ana ya hahu ya Jesu kuambolera anafundzie bada ya kufufukakwe.
43021015	Marihogonya kufungula, Jesu akierekeza manenoge kwa P'et'ero kuamba, "Simoni mwana wa Johana, vidze unanihendza kuriko aa?" P'et'ero akiamba, "Ee Bwana! Unamanya kukala ninakuhendza." Kidza Jesu akiamba, "Be risa anang'ondzi angu."
43021016	Kidza Jesu akimuza lwa hiri, akiamba, "Simoni mwana wa Johana, vidze unanihendza?" Akidzigidzya akiamba, "Ee Bwana, unamanya kukala ninakuhendza." Jesu akiamba lwa hiri, "Bai tsundza anang'ondzi angu."
43021017	Gonya Jesu akimuza lwa hahu akiamba, "Simoni mwana wa Johana, unanihendza?" Bai achangirwa ni kigondzi kwa kukala adzauzwa ni Jesu lwa hahu kala anamuhendza. Bai akiamba, "Bwana uwe, unamanya kila kit'u. Unamanya kukala ninakuhendza" Gonya Jesu akiamba, "Bai risa ng'ondzi zangu."
43021018	Gonya Jesu achangeza akiamba, "Ninakwambira ujeri wenye urihokala u muthana, were ukafunga ukanda mwenye na ukenda uhendzako. Ela nakwambira kukala undihothumika undagoloza mikonoyo na uhende kufungwa ukanda ni at'u na makuhirike kut'u uriko kw'endzi kwenda."
43021019	Jesu wanena vivi kunyesa kifwa cha P'et'ero kindizhokala na kindizhoreha nguma kwa Mulungu. Gonya akimwambira P'et'ero, "Nithuwa hedu."
43021020	P'et'ero akigaluka na akimona yuyahu mwanafundzi ariyehendzwa ni Jesu anaathuwa. Mwanafundzi yuyu ni yuyahu ariyekala hehi na Jesu marihokala manarya chakurya kabila kufwakwe na kidza nde ariyemuza Jesu akiamba, "Ni h'ani andiyekusaliti Bwana?"
43021021	P'et'ero arihomona mwanafundzi yuyahu akimwamba Jesu, "H'e yuno ye Bwana?"
43021022	Jesu akimudzigidzya akiamba, "Kala ninamala akale moyo hatha nindihouya kaheri, vidze zho vinakuhusu noni? Uwe h'e nithuwa."
43021023	Badaye, zhavuma kahi za o ndugu kukala yuyahu mwanafundzi k'andafwa bule. Ela Jesu k'amwambire kukala k'andafwa, ela waamba, "Kala ninamala akale moyo hatha nindihouya kaheri, vidze zho vinakuhusu noni?"
43021024	Yuyu mwanafundzi ahadzwaye nde iye ariyenena dzulu ya gaga gosi garigohendeka. Na kidza ndeye ariyegaora maut'u gaga na hunamanya kukala zho arizhonena ni ujeri.
43021025	Bai kuna maut'u mangine manji garigonenwa ni Jesu. Kala vinadimikika kukala at'u maore kila kimwenga arichokihenda Jesu, naona kukala yo dhunia ndzima k'aingakalire na nafasi ya kuthosha ya kuika zho zhuwo vingazhoorwa.
44001001	Kwa muheshimiwa Th'eofilo. Kahi za kiryahu chuwo changu cha kwandza naora dzulu za go maut'u gosi arigogahenda Jesu na arigogafundisha hangu mwandzo,
44001002	muhaka arihohalwa achenda mulunguni. Naye kabila k'adzangwe kuhalwa kwenda mulunguni, waap'a malagizo kwa nguvu za Roho Mweri o ahumwie ariokala waatsagula.
44001003	Bai bada ya kufwakwe, wadzionyesa lwazu kwa at'u aa k'ana nyinji zenye, kwa muda wa siku mirongo mine kunyesa kukala wafufuka jeri. Naye lola waonewa ni o at'u ao na akinena nao dzulu za wo uthawali wa Mulungu.

44002001	Bai irihofika siku ya sherehe ya Pentekote, o anafundzi osi mere makundzumanyika hamwenga.
44002002	Na lola haho henye kuchambola londzo kula mulunguni dza here luv̱utho lwa kikukuzi na lukidzadzala yo nyumba yosi marimokala makeresi.

44002009	Mana angine ehu haha ni, Aparithi, Amedi, na Aelamiti. Angine o ni at'u makalao Mesopotamia, Judea, na Kapadokia, P'onito na Asia.

44002011	Na angine kaheri ni Ak'irete na Arabu. Na kahi zehu hosi, angine ni Ayahudi na angine si Ayahudi bule, ela mangira dini ya Kiyahudi. Ela ut'u wa kwangalaza nikukala, hosini funaasikira mananena na kufwambira dzulu za maut'u mabomu garigohendwa ni Mulungu!"
44002012	K'uzhona zho mamaka na machangalala kidza makiuzana-uzana makiamba, "Ut'u uno be manaye ni noni?"
44002013	Angine o makiatsea makiamba, "H'aa, at'u aa madzarea thu."
44002014	Ndo P'et'ero akiungarara hamwenga na aryahu ahumwi kumi na mumwenga na akinena na o at'u kwa sauthi bomu akiamba, "H'enwi Ayahudi andzangu na ninwi nyosini murio munatoa Jerusalemu, nisirikizani hedu nimung'azize ut'u uu.
44002015	Kwani at'u aa si kwamba madzarea dza here muonazho, kwandza vivi hatha ni saa t'ahu zenye za madzach'a!
44002016	Ela vivi muonazho be ni viryahu virizhonenwa ni nabii Joeli ho kapindi, kukala
44002017	'Mulungu yunaamba kukala kahi za siku za mwisho nindaadzaza at'u osi Roho wangu. Ana enu a kilume na a kiche mandamboza unabii. Athana enu mandanyeswa maono, na athumia enu a kilume mandaloha ndoso za kimulungu.
44002018	Siku zizo nindaadzaza Roho wangu ahumiki angu a kilume na a kiche, nao mandamboza unabii.
44002019	Nindahenda maut'u ga kwangalaza kuku dzulu mulunguni na ko ts'i, kundakala na milatso, na moho, na maingu ga mosi.
